can// nyi ma'i spu gri glad la bskor// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ chu yi skyar las sprul pa ste// gser dngul 'bar ba'i slag pa la// mu tig 'bar ba'i shar bus brgyan// zla ba'i 'khor lo lag
na thogs// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig nam mkha'i mdangs las sprul pa ste// dpag bsam shing gi sked pa nas// gser mkhar ni ser po la// gser sgo ni thabs se thabs// g.yu bad ni sngon pos
bskor// de yi ni nang shed na// sku la sprin dkar g.yang gzhi can// gzha' tshon 'bar ba'i mtha' chag can// 'dir byon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba la// rin chen ni stegs

bu la// lcags kyi ni mu khyud can// srid pa ni zhing 'dzin te// lcags kyi ni slag pa la// rdo rje ni ha yis brgyan// lag na mdung dmar zangs se zang// tshe srog ni glud bzhes shig/ dpag bsam shing gi rtse lkog

na// lcags mkhar ni sngon po la// bse yi ni mtha' bskor can// zangs kyis ni sgo stsal lo// ma hA de wa lha chen po// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'i na bza' la// thod pa 'bum gyi mtha' bskor can// be con 'bar
ba lag na thogs// srid pa gsum gyi mthu mo che// 'byung rigs spun dgu'i 'khor gyis bskor// mdos bdag chen pos mdos bzhes shig/ sgod ma kha yi sprul pa ste// sa bdag phag chen mi bzad pa// chu srin
'bar ba'i slag pa la// mu tig shar bu'i ga shas brgyan// lag na chu srin rgyal mtshan thogs// mdos bdag chen pos mdos bzhes shig srid pa'i mtsho bdun nang shed nas// phung byed dregs pa'i gzugs su

snang// dbu+u la yid bzhin nor bus brgyan// phyag na don yod zhags pa bsnams// mkhar la yid bzhin char 'bebs shing// rgya mtsho mtha' bzhi rba rlabs nas// klu bran thams cad cho nge brdung// 'dir byon

tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ nam mkha'i khams na gnas pa ste// ma hA de wa lha chen po// btsun mo u ma 'khor dang bcas// baiDUr sngon po'i slag pa la// gza' skar thod phreng phreng bas brgyan// lag na dung gi zo

ba thogs// nor lha chen po'i ming nas byung// mdos bdag chen pos mdos bzhes shig/ rgyal po chen po sde bzhi yang// 'jig rten skyong bar mtshan grags pa'i// lha mi yongs kyi 'khor skyong zhing// lha ma yin
gyi g.yul bzlog pa// kha dog las bzhi'i mdog tu gsal// rgyan rnams rin chen shar bus mdzes// dbu+u la sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes// phyag na rin chen phyag rgyas mdzes// mdos bdag chen
pos mdos bzhes shig/ nyi ma byang shar mtshams shed nas// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// keng rus brtsegs pa'i gdan steng na// dam rdzas lnga la longs spyod cing// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i slag pa
la// rak+ta'i thig le 'bar bas brgyan// thod pa tshar gsum sku la brgyan// rigs bzhi sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// srin mo 'bum gyi dbus nas 'gying// mdos bdag chen pos mdos bzhes shig/ nyi ma
byang shar mtshams shed nas// bse mkhar ni khra bo la// dngul gyi ni mtha' bskor cing// zangs kyis ni sgo gsal la// de yi ni bdag mo la// lus la zangs kyi slag pa la// dung gi thig phran phreng bas
brgyan// g.yon pa lcags kyu 'bar ba la// g.yas pas spu gris gsod cing gcod// mdos bdag chen pos mdos bzhes shig/ srid pa'i bskang lung las pho skong gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa lo//// phra
men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// brtan ma'i bye brag gang lags pa// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mo brtan ma'i bye brag rnams// ngas bstan pa la
sems thud cig/ dkyil 'khor bzhi yi byang shar du// maN+Dal gru gang 'khor rgyud las// dbus su yab yum bskyed byas te// dpal gyi gtor ma btegs byas te// bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mdzad pa mthar

phyin che ba'i sku mnga' ba// thugs rje rgyun gyis 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// yab yum gnyis med bka' yi gtor ma bzhes// thod pa rlon pa'i phyag rgya mdud la/ oM shrI he ru ka kro ng+hI shwa ri sa ma ya a mr-i ta ba

liM ta khA hi/ zhes bstab bo// bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// dkar mo bcu gsum 'khor gyis bskor ba ni// thugs rje las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// muM daM Sh+ta yo gi nI a mr-i ta khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal

chen he ru la// nag mo bco brgyad tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// thugs rje las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ kha mun pa ti ya hUM b+h+yo khA hi zhes bstab// bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// sku yi khro bo bcu drug

bskor ba ni// sku mchog 'bar ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// oM shrI he ru ka A gats+tsha ya shAn+tiM khA hi/ zhes bstab/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// gsung gi khro bo bcu drug bskor ba ni// gsung mchog 'bar

ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// oM shrI he ru ka b+ha ga bAn gar+b+ha ba liM khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// thugs kyi khro bo bcu drug bskor ba ni// thugs mchog 'bar ba'i phrin las mdzad du gsol// oM shrI

he ru ka tsit+ta kha s+t+wa mA ra ya khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// rdzogs chen khro bo bcu drug bskor ba ni// yon tan 'bar ba'i 'phrin las mdzad du gsol// swA shrI he ru ka rat+na ke tu puSh+tiM khA hi/

bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// sprul pa'i bu mo brgyad kyis bskor ba ni// bka' yi gtor ma 'di 'bul gyi// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod/ kro tI shwa rI ba sA ta rag ta khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he

ru la// ser mo lnga bcu rtsa drug tshogs kyis bskor ba ni/ bka' yi gtor ma 'di 'bul na// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// kro tI shwa rI tsit+ta rag sha de ba kha dur ni khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru

la// shwa na mu kha'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// sku yi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// kA ya du ra ka to ya ti khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// gsung gi pho nya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// ku ma rA tsa kha dur tri

ka nar khA hi/ bcom ldan dpal chen he ru la// thugs kyi pho nya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ni// thugs kyi phrin las 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI ta ri ka ta ra khA hi/ 'jigs byed yab yum 'khor
bcas la/ kha 'bar rtsa 'dren brgyad kyis bskor ba la// thugs kyi phrin las grub par mdzad du gsol// tsa dur kha sa ba ti rag ti rag dur khA hi/ de nas dpal chen yab yum la// bdud mo bzhi dang gnod
sbyin bzhi// sman phran bzhi yis bskor ba rnams// bka' yi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// srid pa'i phra men rgya mtsho la sogs pa la// srid pa gsal ba'i don du gtad

pa'o// sgrub mchog rnal 'byor rnams dang 'phrad par shog/ srid pa'i brtan ma las kyi rgya mtsho'o// srid pa mtsho bzhi'i le'u tha ma ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po srid pa mtsho bzhi'i
rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so//// ! bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol na/ sems can thams cad sems mya ngan las bzla ba
dang/ the tshom bcad pa bcad pa'i phyir/ rdo rje sems dpas gsol pa/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams la// sems nyid mya ngan ji ltar bzla// rtag chad mtha' nyid gang du
bsdu// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// snod kyi 'jig rten kun bzang zla// bcud kyi 'jig rten sangs rgyas rgyu// phyi nang snod
bcud rnam par dag/ rtag chad mtha' gnyis mya ngan 'das// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ston pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// sdud pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// gnas zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// gnas la
nges pa du zhig mchis// dus zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// dus la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ston pa rnam gsum rig pa'i
gter// 'pho 'gyur med pas gnas zhes bya// yang dag don rtogs dus zhes bya// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// lha la rnam pa du zhig mchis// 'khor la rnam pa du zhig mchis// lung la rnam pa du zhig
mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// lha la rnam pa gsum du bstan// 'khor la rnam pa gsum du bstan// lung la rnam pa gsum du bstan// gnod 'dul lha yis

yang gsol pa// rgyud ces bya ba ji ltar lags// lung zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// man ngag bgyi ba ji ltar lags// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rgyud ces bya ba 'brel pa'i don// lung zhes bya ba ston
pa'i bka'// man ngag bya ba la bzla'o// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// yum gyi dbyings zhes gang la bgyi// yab kyi mkha' zhes gang la bgyi// 'khor ba'i gnas 'di mi 'tshal na// klong zhes bya ba ji
lta bu// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'du 'bral med pa yum gyi dbyings// skye shi med pa yab kyi mkha'// blang dor med pa bde ba'i klong// bde ba chen po don rtogs na// blang dor med pa de yis
grub// gnyis med don rtogs de yi ngang// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// chos nyid rtogs pa g.yung drung lha// sems nyid rtogs pa'i la dor ba// 'gyur med don chen brjod pa gang// de skad gsol pa
gsan nas kyang// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// chos nyid rtogs pa'i g.yung drung ba'i// sems nyid don gyi ngo bo la// rdzogs pa'i lta ba la dor ba'o// gnod

'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma zhes bya ba gang gi mkha'// mo zhes bya ba gang gi klong// ma mo'i gtan tshigs ji ltar lags// 'byung ba lnga po gang las grub// sangs rgyas rgyu nyid gang gis grub// bde ba chen
po ngang nyid las// rgyu rkyen gnyis kyis bskyed lags sam// 'gyur ba lha yi rang nyid las// 'di la 'pho 'gyur mchis lags sam// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// che bas che ba zab mo 'di// shes

rab thabs la brten te grub// ma dang mo yi don rtogs na// ma bgrod sa rnams nges par thob// yid bzhin nor bu ma btsal rnyed// ye shes nyi ma rang la shar// chen po lnga yi ngang nyid du// thams cad ma lus
sangs rgyas so// hUM hUM hUM/ gsang ba'i mgur chen po'i le'u ste dang po'o//// ting 'dzin dbang chen dkyil 'khor bskyed// bdag nyid che mchog skur bsgoms la// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu// man
ngag mdzub tshugs don la rnam pa drug tu bstan// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// sems can dus min 'chi ba rnams// de la bzlog na ji ltar bzlog/ bskang ba'i gnas lnga ji ltar
lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// de skad gsol pa gnas [\[]gsan [\]]nas kyang// sems can dus min 'chi ba'i tshe// bskang ba'i gnas rnams 'di rnams so// hUM snang srid thams cad yum gyi b+ha
ga ste// dus gsum bde gshegs yum gyi dbyings nas bskyed// dbus kyi yum dang che mchog yab yum tshogs// mu mkhar khyab pa'i thugs gsum bdag skong na// thams cad skongs nas dbang dang dngos grub

gsol// hUM shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// rdo rje dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi gtso// rin chen dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal

pa'i thugs dam bskang// nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi gtso// pad+ma dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi gtso// las kyi dbyings phyug mi phyed

ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// dbyings kyi ma chen brgyad rnams dang// yul gyi sring mo brgyad rnams kyang// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// bskal le chung ngu gsang ba mgur chung gi
le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed pa// sems can kun la gnod byed pa'i// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems
can rnams// lus sems so sor dbral ba'i phyir// lha dang dbye ba ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag
tu gdug pa'i sems can rnams// lus sems so sor phral ba'i phyir// dbye ba'i las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'go ba'i lha dang bral ba'i phyir// bya rog 'ug pa'i dang ru

la// a dang nr-i yi yi ge bri// dme ba mgar gyi dreg pas bslan// shog shog tshon gang gru bzhi la// lha dang mi yi ming bris la// tshon skud sna lngas byad du gzhug/ rkang du dza dur bcug nas ni// 'og ti phyin

phyogs dag tu bstan// du+u ra nag po'i rta rkang bsdam// gong ma'i las rnams bskyar la bya// des ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// des kyang mtshan ma ma byung na// 'da' ra pa ti'i sog pa la// maN+Da la yi dar gyis
dkri// a ti ra yi thag pas bcings// da ra ba ti rgyud pas gdags// sba ma ti yi dud pas bdug/ 'brig sha shing la btags nas kyang// dad [\[]dar [\]]la phyar te sdang mig blta// a ta ra yi lcags kyis
brab// rba na ti yi dud pas bdug/ a ra ma ti'i mda' yis brdeb// gu pa ra yi mgul tu btags// ma la ti yi mdoms nas dbyung// sa 'bar ma yi snying po bzlas// rna mnyan phra ma'i gzugs

bris la// lha dang mi yi bar du gzhug/ ma ra Na yi sngags kyi dbye// mtshon ma'i phyag rgya bcas nas su// gzugs la rnam par brdeg par bya'o// rak+Sha tu'i drag sngags kyis gdab// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya gnyis

bcings nas// aM ku sha yi sngags kyis drang// zhags pa'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// pA sha hUM gi sngags kyis bcings// lcags sgrog phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// s+pho Ta baM gyi sngags kyis bsdam// dril

bu'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// g+haN+De hoHyi sngags kyis gdab// bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms te// spro ba drug rnams gnad la gdab// gong ma'i las rnams bskyar la bya// des ni mtshan ma 'byung bar
'gyur// des kyang mtshan ma ma byung na// 'da' ra bi ti'i sog pa la// nu ta ma yi khrag gis bris// 'da' na nag ni sa dong du gzhug/ che mchog yab yum bsgoms nas ni// sman mo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas
gdab// bskul ba'i phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// nye 'byed kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed cing// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed
pa// sems can kun la gnod byed yid// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur la// nan tur las rnams ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha
yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur te// sems can kun la gnod pa la// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srog lus rtsa nas skam pa'i phyir// ra sog

gro ga shing shun nam// g.yam pa sngon po'i ngos dag la/ khyi khrag ra khrag gsol ba yis// dgra bo'i gzugs dag bris nas ni// tsher ma can gyi shing dag la// rdzas kyi br-ik+Sha'i shing bu la// dmar ti dmar po'i

lcag 'bras gdags// dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg par bya'o// yang na ka sa'i shun pa la// na sa ku ru ta yis ni// 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro lnga po yang// tsa ra ma ti ti yis ni// lte bar chags 'dzin spun gnyis

bri// rkang pa gnyis la ma bdun ni// g.yas pa'i dum bu bzhi po la// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi ni// g.yon pa dum bu bzhi po la/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po ni// gsang ba'i yum bzhi klad pa la// nyi zla thod

phreng snying gi dkyil// phra men rgya mtsho mkha' la'o// phung gi bdag mo bzhugs su gsol// phyi ma'i dman mo 'khor rnams kyis// gung rtsibs 'khor dang lo re la'o// a phyi chen po gzhungs pa la'o// dus drug rgyu

ba'i dgra bo ni// shwa ba gnyan dang ba glang ngo// 'di rnams nam gyi gung la rgyu// rta dang lug dang ra gsum ni// 'di ni nyin bzhin rgyu ba'o// rje khol drug cu rtsa brgyad dang// dus drug rgyu ba de
bzhin no// myur du bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ni// gong gi sngags rnams bzlas pa yin// sngags nyung dag la khri 'bum du// bzlas nas dgra la brdeg par bya// g.yon gyi dme lag bcad nas ni// rang
gi dpral ba'i dbyes su bzhag/ bdud kyi chas su zhugs nas ni// skra bshig mi gnas mchi ma phyung// de phyogs nyid du bstan pas ni// nga ro drag tu bzlas nas kyang// g.yas pa'i phyag rgya sdigs

mdzub kyis// sngags 'di drag tu bzlas la brdeg/ snying la zo zhing lA mA sha/ rol sha khrag 'thung kang ka sha zan/ yang ta sa ra la ho// sha la kyi spyang kra he kra he/ badzra ban+d+ha b+h+yo ru lu ru lu/
sha khrag skams pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dam las 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang// 'jig rten mtshan ma byol pa dang// lha 'dre rdzu 'phrul drag g.yos na//
ngan sngags rdzu 'phrul ji ltar bzlog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' bstsal pa// dam las 'das pa'i sngags gzer dang// 'jig
rten mtshan ma byol ba dang// dregs myos pa yi rdzu 'phrul dag/ bzlog pa'i las rnams ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngan sngags par bu bzlog pa'i phyir// gtan tshigs man ngag

'di gsungs so// ba ko 'dra ba'i maN+Dal byas// 'jig rten mtshan ma byol ba dang// maN+Dal mchod pa gzhung bzhin bya// sAts+tsha ca ti mang du gdab// phyi yi bshags pa gzhung bzhin bya// de nas gsang ba'i

mtshams kyang bcad// de nas dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya// nang gi rU pa sarba btang// bskang gso spang skong grangs kyis gdon// bskang ba'i gnas lnga gzhung bzhin bya// ma hA shAn+tiM mchod par bya// ma
mor gyur pa kun kyang bskang// yo byad nag po gzhung bzhin btang// rtags dang mtshan ma zhib tu brtags// rtags dang mtshan ma zin pa dang// skong zlog cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// des ni mtshan ma bzlog
par 'gyur// de nas bskyar te yang gsungs pa// bskang ba des kyang ma skong na// dbang gi rgyal mo'i skur bsgoms la// rtsa ba gang yin ma mo de// ku sha la ni gzugs byas la// yan lag bsdus te rgya yis
bsdam// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa gsum yang// shing shun dag las gzugs byas la// dar ba ti yi rgyud pas gdags// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi yang// che mchog sku ru bsgoms nas ni// mgo lus bsnol te
gdan du gding// des ni ngan sngags bzlog par 'gyur// des kyang las rnams ma grub na// brtags te rtsa ba gang yin la// shog shog dag la gzugs byas la// mchog gi phur pa dag gi
brdeg/ sman mo lnga bcu rtsa gsum yang// 'jag ma dag la gzugs byas la// zangs kyi phur pa dmar pos gdab// dbus kyi ma mo rnam gsum yang// zhing gi shun pa'i ras ma la/ khrag dang mtshal gyi
gzugs byas la// gser ram ser po'i phur pa gdab// des ni ngan sngags zlog par 'gyur// gal te las su+u ma gyur na// dbus kyi che mchog yab yum gnyis// spra tshil dag la gzugs byas
nas// lcags sam nag po'i phur pa yis// thugs ka nyid du gdab par bya// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// kI la ya yi sngags brjod nas// chos nyid dbyings su gdab par bya// che mchog rtags
kyi phyag rgya yis// 'gyur med dbyings su phur pas gdab// ngan sngags par bu zlog pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// de ltar par bu bzlog nas ni// sngon du sngags kyi
sngags gzer des// tshe srog nyams pa ji ltar gso// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// sngon du sngags pa'i sngags gzer des// tshe srog nyams pa gso ba'i phyir// gso ba'i cho ga ngas
bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de dbus su// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad bri// pad+ma chen po de dbus su// rin chen 'bar

ba zur brgyad bri// de dbus zla gam zlum po la// b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa bzhag/ rin chen 'bar ba'i zur brgyad la// lnga la rtags pa'i rgyal mo lnga// gnyis pa sma sha pra mo ha// gcig la tshe yi snying po bri//

pad+ma chen po'i 'dab brgyad la// phyogs bzhir khros pa'i dbang chen bskyed// mtshams su gsang ba'i yum bzhi dgod// 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad la// phyogs bzhir phyag mtshan chen po bzhi// gnyis par rgya

mtsho thod phreng dgod// gcig la tshe yi snying po dgod// sman mo phyi ma don gyis sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du// bkra shis brgyad kyang dgod par bya// sgo bzhir khro bo bzhi yang dgod// til chen me
mar rgyun mi gcad// yo byad chen po'i zas rnams la// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab la bzhag/ ma mo byon gyis sngags rgyas gdab// u ta'i bya ba'i sngags kyis gdab// dngos grub rtags dang sbyar nas ni//
gso bskyed bzang zhing gtams par bya// tshe sgrub pa'i rim pa ste le'u drug pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dpa' bo thig le nyams pa dang// thig le'i spyod pa nyams
pa rnams// las de slar la zlog pa'i phyir// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de las slar la zlog pa'i phyir// nges pa'i

man ngag ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe// bsdam pa'i phyag rgya bkrol nas ni// dgra bo'i yul phyogs bstan pa ni// gro ga shing shun ras la sogs//
mi de'i ming rus bris nas ni// de yi lag tu bskur bya'o// shugs sgrol ma yi sngags kyis gdab/ khrag dang dug gi gtor ma yang// rabs chad thod par bshams nas ni// yul sa'i phyogs su gtor ma

gtang// snying gi phur pa phyung nas ni// a mr-i ta yis mchod byas nas// dam rdzas tshang ba'i gtor ma la// ku pa ra yi rak+tas sbreng// gang yin phyogs su kha bltas la// gtso bo gzhung bzhin bskul nas ni// lus
kyis bsig cing phyag rgyas bsdam/ bdag nyid dbang gi skur bsgoms la// dbang drag phyag rgya bcas nas ni// gzugs de nyid la tsham rngams bya// drag shul dbang gis bskyod la btang// 'di ltar ma mo drag

shul gyi// dpal gyi dbang gis bsdus la btang// las kyi mi 'grub mi srid do// bsdams pa'i phyag rgyas bkrol nas ni// 'brig sha'i shing gi lcags kyis bsdam// gong ma'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// rdo rje gnon
'gros gong ma yis// phyogs der gom pa bdun 'gro'o// yab yum sngags kyis btab nas ni// gong gi phyag rgya drag bskul lo// des ni mod la las rnams 'grub// lan gsum byas na na bar 'gyur// lan lnga

byas na 'chi bar 'gyur// snying gi phur pa phyung nas ni// lan gsum drag tu dril nas ni// spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdab par bya// lcags sna lnga yi phur bu la// dbang drag las rnams gzhung bzhin bya'o// des ni 'chi

bar gdon mi za// mon nam rabs chad thod pa la// nang du ma bdun snying po bri// spyi gtsug nyi zla thod phreng bri// chags 'dzin spun gnyis rna ltag go/ tshon skud gnyis su mig nas gdags// rag sha rU hra'i sngags kyis gdab//
gong gi phyag rgya gnyis spel te// drag tu bskul te 'phangs la gtang// zhing gi sha tshil ro sogs kyis// ma mo rnams la gtang rag gtang// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// ngan sngags par bus bsad
pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyen po 'jig byed cing// lu gu rgyud la 'gal byed pa// sems can kun la gnod bgyid pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems
can la// nan tur las rnams ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur pas// sems
can kun la gnod gyur der// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ji ltar yid 'thad gnas su ni// 'bru sna tshogs pa'i mi gzugs la// mkhar thabs

mda' yis rab brgyan nas// gling bzang dar dkar chas kyis brgyan// yo byad tshogs pa'i gter cha dang// za 'og mda' yis rnam par brgyan// phyi yi ma hA shAn+tiM bya// ma hA shAn+ting gzhung bzhin brjod// pho
rigs rnams la 'di skad skong// sol ba'i dong ni khru gang par// nang du glud phyi rgan du mnan la/ de'i nang du gser ram g.yu brdar la/ dgra gang yin par sogs la gzugs bris la khu bub tu mnan

no// de'i steng du rdo rje rgya gram gyis gnon/ des dgra bo'i gzugs bris te 'o dod bos la btang/ las myur bar 'grub bo// snyug rgod la dpag bsam shing gi gzugs byas la/ yang na gro ga la ming rus bris
la snying gar glan/ gser g.yu gnyis skos rje drang kar la bsngo/ de nas man da la'i dar du gtums la mda' spa tis gdags so// a ti pa ti thag pas gdags so// 'o dod drag tu 'bod/ des ni smyo 'bog
drag pos 'debs par 'gyur ro// lcags dang gser g.yu bsres la khol mo zhig 'dzin la bsngos te/ gong du bstan pa'i gzugs dang bsngo ba'i yas stags bsres la rus sbal shun pas gtums la pa ra ti'i
dong du gzhug go/ ye shes ma mo'i phyag rgyas gdab// de yis dbang po mi gsal ba dang// lce dig pa dang lkugs par 'gyur ro// lcags dang gser dang zangs dang gsum brdar la ya bdud chen po la bsngos

la/ gong du bstan pa'i gzugs dang bsngo ba'i yas stags bsres la mu la'i dong du gzhug go/ che mchog rtags kyi phyag rgyas gdab/ des ni glo bur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// 'bru zan bre gang la gling phran bcu

gnyis kyi gzugs byas la dkor chas brgyan la yar la shod kyi skyes to re la bsngo'o// de nas 'jag ma la gzugs byas la dgra bo'i ming rus bris la gzugs kyi snying gar glan no// zas la za ba'i tshul byed du
gzhug go/ 'o dod drag tu 'bod do// de ltar byas na glo bur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rus pa sna tshogs bsdus nas gshin rje la bsngos nas yas stags de'i gseb tu khams la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la ming
rus bris kha bub tu bstan la 'da' 'gengs pa'i tshul du bya'o// ci yang rung ba'i zhing lpags bskon la gshin rje nag po'i sngags kyis gdags so// des grir 'chi'o// mi nor du btags pa'i gzugs byas la/

sa la u ma de wa'i gzugs byas la/ u ma de wa'i steng du bskyon la 'dod chags spyod pa'i tshul du bya'o// ma e pa ni rba na tsa ma ni phaT/ bya ba'i sngags kyis gdab pa'o// mkhal sked na ba dang/ pho mtshan skrangs
pa dang/ chu 'gags nas 'chi'o// dung gser g.yu dang bswe dang mtshal la sogs pa'i yas stags sna tshogs pa dang dgra bo'i ming rus bris la/ ra ti tsha ra'i pags pas gtums la sa ti sa la ma

ran bzlas te de la gdab par bya'o// des ni myur du 'bog par 'gyur ro/ bse dang dung dang lcags dgra bo'i ming bsres te rdza nag po'i nang du bcug la/ ba ta ma na'i sngags kyis btab la bos shing gtad na

rbab dang g.yang du 'gro'o// cho ga byed pa'i dus su ma bdun gyi chas su zhugs la ngo khrag gis byugs te/ bdag nyid dbang chen ting 'dzin nam yum mu kha le'i ting 'dzin du zhugs la/ gzhung bzhin bskul la
las bcol lo// pho rigs phyi mal las bcol zhing gtad pa yod na 'khu ldog che la rgyang 'gyur bas 'dir ma gsungs so// dgra bo bdud nag po la gtad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// chu srin pir gyi
kha nang du// gre bar rin chen song ba ltar// bskal par bzhag kyang mi gtong ngo// rmongs pa 'phyar bas byin gyur na// dus med par ni srog zad nas// bskal pa bdun du rlag par 'gyur// gsang ba gtan
tshigs zhes bya'o// ma mo 'dus pa'i tan+t+ra rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du/ ma tr-I a lang b+ha ra gu h+ya ti la ka tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ ma mo srid pa zla gsang thig le'i rgyud/ dpal rdo rje
sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas khyab gdal chen po/ bde ba can dang pad+ma can du grub pa mos pa can du snang bar byed pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bla med he ru ka de ni/ nam mkha' chen po mi gnas pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rgyal po dang/ gang yang ma 'gags kun snang chen po

dang/ ma gsungs pa gsung ba'i gsung ba chen po mdzad pa dang/ gsang mchog bdag po blang dor med pa'i 'dod pa kun 'byung ba dang/ 'khor ba 'dren pa'i sangs rgyas chen po snang srid ston pa'i sgron ma dang/

dus gsum so so tha mi dad dbyer med par yum chen mo nyid gzhi mu kha le dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de dag yongs su 'dus pa ni/ ye shes nyid las mi gzhan pa/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo chen mo lnga dang/

rig pa sems las bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum dang/ ye shes 'khor du bsdus pa rje mo bcu bzhi dang/ byin rlab dbang du bsdus pa sman mo nyi shu rtsa bdun dang/ gzhan yang ye shes las grub pa dang/ las las
grub pa dang/ zhing las skyes pa dang/ sngags las skyes pa dang/ dam la gnas pa dang// bka' la btags pa dang/ mos pas 'dul ba du ma dang bcas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das yum gyi b+ha ga las
sku bzhengs nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros pas 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang la la ni skad cig tu dga' ba bzhi nyams su myong/ la la ni phyi'i gnas bzhir

dga' ba skyes/ la la ni nang gi gnas bzhir dga' ba skyes/ la la ni rnam rtog spang ba'i dga' bas log rtog spangs/ la la ni chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyams su myong ba'i dga' bas rtogs par shar/ kun kyang

gsang ba bla na med pa zla gsang thig le'i rgyud don rtogs par gyur pa kho nar spyod cing gnas so// de nas 'khor rnams kyis mchod pa dang rdzas dang phyag rgya bsgyur ba dang/ sngags dang dbyangs brjod pa dang/
ting nge 'dzin bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la bsngags pa brjod// phre men rgya mtsho mas sna drangs nas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// gsang ba rmad byung ye shes che// thabs chen zla
gsang thig le 'di// kye ho rab tu brtag dka' ba// dbang po ji ltar gnas pa spyi// gsang ba ye shes bgrod pa lam// rnam par mngon du gyur pa yi// thig le gsang ba'i theg pa rnams// gsal byed me long
sgron ma 'di// ji ltar gnas pa kye kye shod// 'dir 'dus ma 'ongs kun don du// bla 'og rang bzhin gnas pa yis// rgyud chen yang dag bshad du gsol// ces gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
gsungs so// 'khor bcas chos ni sems su 'dus// sems kyi cho 'phrul cir snang yang// sna tshogs sems la bsdu ba'i phyir// skal dang ldan pa thud la nyon// ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i zla gsang thig
le las/ rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu gleng gzhi dang/ rkyen gling slong ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad yongs su 'dus pa las kun 'byung ba zhes bya
ston pa po// sku gsum rim par snang bas na// thams cad kun gyi ston pa mdzad// ces gsungs so// ston pa po// sku gsum rim par snang bas na// thams cad kun gyi ston pa mdzad// ces gsungs so// ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// thams cad chos kyi rang bzhin ni// ye nas sangs rgyas rnam dag cing// ye nas sangs rgyas byang chub sems kyi rdo rje ste// mi 'gyur yongs su grub pa
yis// ma bcos de bzhin nyid kyi ngang// ye nas lhun gyis grub par gnas// snod kyi chos rnams rang bzhin ni// thams cad mnyam par bkod pa'i gnas// gsang ba bas kyang yang gsang zhing// kun gzhi
chos kyi pho brang la// gsang chen yum gyi mkha' dag pa// thig le brdal ba chen po'i klong// ye 'byams rmad du grags pa'i gnas// spros pa med pa'i gzhal yas khang// phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad
pa'i// chos dbyings chen po de kho na// de nyid kho na nges pa'i gnas// rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// bcud kyi rang bzhin chos rnams ni// ston pa chos kyi mnga' ba rdzogs// bcom ldan
'das de bzhin thams cad dpal// che ba'i yon tan thams cad la// dmas pa'i spyod pas spyod pa yis// ye shes de nyid kho na la// kun nas kun tu bzang po yin// thams cad chos skur sangs rgyas so// zhes
gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad la snang ba'i ye shes mi 'gag par shar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// thams cad ye nas

sangs rgyas kyang// mun pas bsgribs pas de ma shes// sems can rgyu yang sangs rgyas la// sangs rgyas rgyu yang sems can yin// rig pa stong pa chos sku la// ye shes 'od gsal chen po gsal// dbyings dang

ye shes yab yum sbyor// chos sku 'od gsal gnyis kyi sras// lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// 'jig rten rgan mo long ma 'dra// kye ho ku ku ra tsa ni// yid kyis kun tu 'tshol ba ni// min pa'i don la yin par
sems// de la nges par 'jog pa dang// log par yang dag gtan la 'bebs// 'jigs dgras tho la mir 'dzin 'dra// lus ngag yid kyi dge spyod pa// mtho ris gnas su skye ba'i rgyu// de ni mi ldan sdig la

gzhol// de ni ngan song 'gro zhes bshad// la la lung du ma bstan pa// rang skal tsam du snang ba yin// nyon mongs lnga la zhen spyad pas// snga phyi 'khor ba drug tu skyel// la la 'jig na la lar chags// la la

stongs na la lar gnas// lhun po gling dang mu khyud bcas// shi ba med pa'i bcud kyang grub// mkha' la 'phyo ba'i gnas kyang gsal// 'og nas brten pa'i gzhi yang grub// stong ni chung ngu zhes bya dang// de

bzhin stong gnyis bar ma dang// stong gsum gyi ni stong chen po// snod ces bya bar rgyal las bshad// de yang las kyi srid pa las// rdzus dang mngal las skyes pa dang// drod gsher sgo nga sogs pa dang// 'byung
ba dar gud ma snyoms pas// gcig gi gnyen por gcig me rgas// rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa yis// grang dang tsha ba'i zug rngu che// 'byung ba rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnams// thim par
yum chen ngang du rdzogs// ma rig chen po'i rdzir gyur pa// rnam shes rten dang bral ba yin// de min sdug bsngal gsum brgyad spyod// drug gi las bskal brjod mi lang// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs
rje chen po ye shes dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// ma bsags tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs pas// dge ba'i stobs la zad 'phel med// ma bsal sgrib gnyis rang dag
pas// sgrib par gyur pa thams cad dag/ ma sbyangs thams cad mkhyen grol bas// yon tan thams cad lhun grub rdzogs// de ni skye dang 'jig pa med// des na mya ngan 'das pa yin// ngo bo dag pa

chos kyi sku// rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs pa che// mdzad pa sprul pa'i skur byung bas// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bo nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ston pa yin// rdzogs sangs

rgyal ba rigs lnga ni// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan// sprul pa grangs med sna tshogs ni// 'gro ba'i bla ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le las 'khor 'das spy-i'i gnas lugs dang/ ma rtogs 'khrul
pa'i gnas lugs dang/ rtogs ldan sangs rgyas kyi gnas lugs bstan pa ste le'u gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen po rgyun 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms

par zhugs te/ log rtog nyid kyang byang chub sems// sangs rgyas nyid las mi gzhan phyir// dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du// chu bo lta bur chad pa med// thugs rje'i nyi ma kun la snyoms// me shel dag
la brten nas ni// rten 'brel 'dzom na me du snang// chu shel dag las chu 'byung ba// de bzhin sngon dang de rjes 'jug/ byad dang me long bzhin du gzigs// blang dor med pa'i mdzad spyod ni// yul dang
yul can kun las grol// gzung 'dzin chos la mi gnas yang// rang sems dag pa'i bsod nams yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa thams cad rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so//

nyon mongs stong phrag brgya cu yi// gnyen por chos kyi sgo mo spro// chos dang gang zag bdag gnyis kyang// de la sde snod rnam gsum spro// nyon mongs lnga la zhen pa yang// nyon mongs lam slong gsang
sngags spro// mos pa chung ngu'i don ched du// sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis dang// gang zag chos la bdag blta zhing// rtsa ba yan lag tshul khrims bsrung// lus ngag yid gsum dge
bcu spyod// bden pa bzhi yi don bsgrubs nas// 'bras bu rnam bzhi bsgrub par 'dod// dmigs pa phra ba 'dul don du// 'brel cing 'byung ba rten 'brel skor// gang zag chos la phyogs gcig rtogs// rang
goms shugs kyis dka' thub srung// rdzu 'phrul lus kyis 'gro don spyod// dge bshes mi ltos mngon goms bsgrubs// ne tsho bse ru lta bur gnas// zab cing rgya che 'dul ba ni// bden pa gnyis kyi sgor

zhugs nas// gang zag chos la bdag med cing// byang chub sems ldan bslab pa bsrung// tshad med bsdu ba'i dngos po spyod// pha rol phyin bcu sgrub par ldan// sa bcu bgrod nas sangs rgyas gnas// bya spyod
'dul ba'i don ched du// goms gyur sgom lugs byin rlabs skor// don rtags byin brlabs rje khol tshul// rang gi rtsa ba yan lag bsrung// phrin las khrus dang gtsang sbra spyod// dag pa gsum

dang ldan par bsgrubs// rigs gsum mgon po'i sa la 'gro// mnyam pas 'dul ba'i don khyed du// 'jug pa'i sgo tshul spyod pa ni// bya ba'i rgyud dang mthun par byed// lta ba sgrub thabs 'bras bu ni// rnal
'byor rgyud kyi rjes su bsgrubs// gnyi ga'i rgyud ces grags par bshad// rigs bzhi rdo rje 'chang sar gnas// zab mos 'dul ba'i don ched du// mngon par byang chub lnga yi sgor// don rtogs kun rdzob

grogs por blta// spyi dang khyad par dam tshig bsrung// phrin las bzhi la ting nges spyod// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par bsgrubs// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'grub par 'dod// tshogs kyi sgrub pas 'dul don
du// ting 'dzin rnam gsum sgor zhugs nas// dbyer med skye 'gag med par blta// rtsa ba lnga sogs yan lag bcas// sgrol dang sbyor la rab tu brtson// thabs shes gnyis med bsnyen bsgrub bzhi// yi ge

'khor lo tshogs chen po// mnyam pa'i spyod pas 'dul don du// yongs rdzogs ting 'dzin sgor zhugs nas// dbyings dang ye shes yab sras lha// spyi dang khyad par lhag pa bsrung// mtshan ma spyod med snod bcud

med// ma skyes brjod pa'i tshul du bsgrubs// pad+ma can gyi sa la 'gro// zhes gsungs so// ma mo'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las/ thugs rjes gzigs pa dang theg pa so so'i gnas tshul bstan pa'i
le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad yum gyi mkha' las shar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// yang dag ye shes de nyid

ldan// mtshan dang dpe byad rgyan 'od ldan// 'gro kun don mthun byed pa'o// de ni sku gsum zhes su bshad// kun gzhi sbyang dang nyon yid sbyang// sgo lnga sbyang dang rnam pa yin// de ni de rgyu gyur zhes bya// rang

bzhin dag dang ye shes dag/ ting nge 'dzin dang gsum yin no// de ni dag pa zhes su bya// las sgrib byang ba sprul pa ste// nyon mongs sgrib byang longs spyod rdzogs// shes bya dag pa chos kyi sku// de ni sgrib pa byang

ba'i rim// dang po ma nor yang dag sku// sku gnyis kyi ni gzhi yin no// sku gnyis btags pa tsam yin te// de nyid min pa'i sku med do// chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan yin// dper na me long chu zla bzhin// sku
gsum lhun grub ces kyang bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad yum gyi mkha' la gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// kun gzhi rin chen gzhong pa
ru// nyon mongs goms pa'i yid byung ba// gos pa med pa'i yid gnas te// 'dzin pa brda' sbyor sgo lnga las// chos dbyings me long mnyam pa nyid// so sor bya grub ye shes lnga// yum gyi mkha' la

sku shar bas// zhal gyi nang du gzugs su grub// thugs la ye shes rnam lnga shar// de phyir yum du bshad pa mdzad// ces gsungs so// ma mo rgyud lung zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las sku gsum dang ye shes lnga
bstan pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad kyi lam yongs su gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te 'di gsungs so// phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba// bkra shis yid

'thad gzhung mthun par// ston pa 'khor dang yo byad rdzas// dus dang bcas pa ldan nas ni// sa yi bya ba kun tu zin// dkyil 'khor bzhed dang chag chag gdab// thig dang tshon dang bri ba rnams// cho ga yan
lag tshang ba dang// rgyal chen bzhi dang khro bo yis// phyogs mtshams phur pas gdab pa dang// mgon po mchod dang phyogs gtor btang// bgegs la sogs pa zhi ba dang// swats+tsha mdo 'don srog skyob
cing// bskang bshags dam sri sgo byang rnams// tshogs kyi lam du bshad pa yin// dkyil 'khor steng du dam rdzas dgod// gnas khang rnal 'byor mchod pa'i rdzas// byin brlab nang mtshams bcad pa
dang// ting 'dzin gsum dang 'byung ba rim// gzhal yas gdan dang bcas pa la// rje mo bcu bzhi bting ba ni// sbyor ba'i lam zhes bshad pa yin// cho ga gsum las yab yum sku// brdas bskul mkha'
brlab sbyor ba bya// byang sems spro bsdus rgyal mo lnga// sku bskyed spyan drang bstim pa dang// sprul pa'i khro mos sman mo dgug/ dam btags mna' bor dal du bkod// phrin las bcol ba'i gnyer gtad
pa// bsgom pa'i lam du bshad pa yin// tshogs kyi phud kyis ma mo mchod// lhag ma sman mo'i tshogs la dbul// tshogs dang lhag ma la sogs te// lhag phud bsres la phrin las bcol// ting 'dzin bsar la

bzlas pa bya// rtags dang mtshan ma mthong ba dang// bzlas pa them par gyur pa ni// mthong ba'i lam du bshad pa yin// bsnyen pa them par gyur pa dang// rang gi 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang// slob ma'i tshogs
la dbang bskur ba// bya ba'i las rnams grub pa ni// mthar phyin pa yi lam du bshad// de yi don rnams yongs rdzogs pa// rig 'dzin sa la bgrod pa'am// yang na sangs rgyas sa la 'gro// bcu gsum sa la
gnas pa'o// zhes gsungs so// ma mo'i rgyud lung gsang ba'i thig le las/ lam lnga mthar phyin par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba rnam par dag par sbyong ba zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// 'byung ba sa yi dwangs ma ni// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// rnam snang gsal du mya ngan 'das// sa zhes rtag tsam ming gis
stong// chu ni pad+ma'i rigs yin te// gnyen gsal myang 'das ming gis stong// me ni rin chen rigs su bshad// mya ngan 'das stong 'od gsal 'bar// rlung ni las kyi ma mo che// yang gsal 'das stong rtag

tsam bral// nam mkha' kun gyi gnas gyur ma// bde gshegs yum chen bkrag gsal mnyam// 'byung lnga'i mkha' 'gro 'di lnga yang// ming ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga// dbang ni 'byung ba lnga la mdzad// las ni
'khor dang thams cad 'grub// sems can thams cad skyes par mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs par mdzad// theg chen sa ni ngang gis dag/ zhi gnas chu ni ting nge 'dzin// lhag mthong me ni nges shes

skye// g.yo 'dzin rlung ni las kun byed// ye shes nam mkha' rgas gud stongs// 'byung ba lnga dang stong pa nyid// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// rde rje 'khrigs pa'i
'od zer gyis// zhe sdang dmyal khams bco brgyad sbyangs// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// rin chen mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// rin chen 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// yi dwags sgrib pa sbyang bar
bya// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil gnas par// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// pad+ma 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis// 'dod chags mi yi gnas rnams sbyangs// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dkyil gnas pa// las

kyi mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// rdo rje rgya gram 'phro 'du yis// nga rgyal phrag dog lha min sbyangs// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// de bzhin mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// 'khor lo'i 'od zer 'bar
'phros pas// gti mug byol song rigs rnams sbyangs// lha klu mi las skyes pa yi// bu mo rab tu mdzes pa ni// pad can dung can glang sna can// ri dwags can dang ri mo can// byin brlab dbang bskur mnyam

'dod pas// rlung dang shes pa ting 'dzin gyis// bde ba chen po skyed byed pa// bcu drug dwangs shes ting 'dzin gyis// bde ba chen po skyed byed pa// bcu drug dga' ba myong bar bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha'
dang mnyam// bud med rigs kyi dngos grub 'dis// mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas su 'gro// gsang sngags gsang ba'i mdzad spyod ni// thabs chen zla gsang thig le yin// ma mo srid pa'i zla gsang thig le'i
rgyud las/ ma mo'i rang bzhin dbyings su bstan dang 'phro mo'i ting nges 'gro drug sbyang ba dang/ chags pa'i dga' bas sangs rgyas par 'gro ba ste le'u drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud

kyi don yongs su bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa 'di gsungs so// snang ba ngo bo nyid kyis stong// stong zhing gsal ba'i rig pa nyid// rang rig ma mo'i ngang du grol// de ni chos kyi sku
ru 'dod// de ltar rtogs na ma mo yin// dman pa'i spyod pa yongs mi spong// yang dag don la smad pa min// lus ngag spyod pa mtho dman rnams// ji ltar mthun par spyod pa yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor

chen po nas// gzugs brnyan dal du spyan 'dren cing// dkyil 'khor ting 'dzin sgrub pa ni// de ni ma mo'i dkyil 'khor yin// bum dbang rdul tshon dal du bskur// rig pa'i dbang lnga rdzogs par bya// gsang

dang shes rab bde chen po// rdzogs par bskur ba ma mo'i dbang// yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// skyon med bsrung dang nyams na bshags// rang gi srog ltar mi gtong ba// de ni ma mo'i dam tshig yin// zhi rgyas
dbang drag bdag gzhan don// de spyod ma mo'i phrin las yin// bsnyen pas ye shes ma mo la// bsgrub pas las kyi ma mo 'khol// mchog tu thun mong thob pa ni// de ni ma mo'i sgrub pa yin// ces gsungs
so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las// rgyud kyi dngos po bdun gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgrod pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// 'char nub rnam rtog rnal 'byor rtsa// skye 'gag ye shes dngos grub gnas// rgyu ni yid las byung ba las// de yi bdag po bsal bar bya// mdun du yul la dmigs

pa ni// bag chags de ma thag pa 'dres// rtsa nang lha mo rab tu sad// snang mched thob pas nyer gnas pas// yul drug la ni rnam par spyod// ye shes snang ba 'char ba'o// nub pa de dag zhan pa la// 'od zer
dang ni 'od 'phel dang// gzi brjid ma ni gsal ba dang// 'bar ma 'od can dmigs sogs rten// mun sel dang ni 'od ma dang// snang ba ma dang gsal mdzes ma// gsal byed ma dang 'od 'du+u ma// nyi mar
gsal drug gzugs sogs spyod// bcu gnyis yul la zhen pa log/ yid la byed pa rang la zhen// dbang po snying dkyil hUM ring la// sangs rgyas nyi ma'i grong khyer du// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang
rig nyid// ngang gis ma bcos ye gnas phyir// yongs kyi 'od kyis rab tu gsal// nyi ma'i snying po ltar gyur pas// 'char nub ye shes chen po ste// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// snang srid rnam
dag ngang du shes// phyi nang gzung 'dzin bgegs yin pas// pags pa rdo rje ba spu me// lus ngag yid kyis las byas pas// sgrib pa byang ba bshags bdag sems// thams cad
rten 'brel che bar gnas// de phyir bdud rtsi rak+ta bsham// chos rnams stong pa nyid las byung// de phyir dang po de bzhin nyid// nang du stong pa'i rtsis zin na// phyi rol snying rje yongs la
'char// don mdzad rang sems snang ba ste// de phyir rgyu yi yi ge gsal// sbyang bya snod kyi 'jig rten pas// sbyong byed rim pa 'byung bar brtsegs// bzhugs gnas chos kyi dbyings yin pas// ma
bsgrubs pho brang gzhal yas bskyed// bag chags sgrib sbyong dbang sdud phyir// mkha' 'gro bcu bzhi gdan du gding// rgyud dang dkyil 'khor kun byed pas// bla med mu ka yab yum rol// thams cad
chags pas rang bskyed pas// dga' dang rab dga' bral ba'i dga'// lhan cig skyes pas 'khor 'das kun// sgrib sbyangs thugs bskul mkha' 'gro'i rgyu// thig le 'bar ba'i sa bon las// rang rig
'byung ba nyid du skye// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal mnyam// sa yi mkha' 'gro rnam snang gsal// me yi mkha' 'gro 'od gsal 'bar// chu yi mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal ma// rlung gi mkha' 'gro yang

gsal g.yos// skye 'gro rtsi shing nags tshal dang// 'byung ba lnga las 'khor 'das grub// sku gsum dbang mdzad rgyal po lnga// spyan drang mchod bstod bzlas pa yis// thugs las sprul pa'i khro mo ni// bcu
gsum 'phros pas ma mo bkug/ dbang bsdus dam btags dkyil 'khor du// nyi shu rtsa bdun las la 'gyed// drod dang rtags dang mtshan ma yis// thun mong mchog gi dngos grub kun// sku gsung thugs
la thim gyur na// bum pa rnam snang chu yi dbang// cod pan 'od gsal mnyam pa nyid// rdo rje gnyen gsal 'dod chags dag/ dril bu yang gsal rlung gi rgyu// rdo rje ming ni bkrag gsal dran// kun 'dus
mu ka bla med skyed// 'dir sbyang bar ma dor dran pas// rig pa 'dzin nam gang mos sam// sangs rgyas thams cad thob pa yin// grol ba'i lam du brjod pa ste// rnal 'byor kun gyis bsgom
par bya// chags pas chags pa grol byed pa// lus kyi g.yas g.yon dbus gnas pa// gzung 'dzin med pa'i dngos po ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang// nyin mo

mtshan mo mtshams kyi cha// 'dod gzugs med pa'i khams gsum dang// rgyu lam 'bras bu'i rnal 'byor gsum// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje kun// pha las byung ba'i ga pur

pho// ma yis byin pa'i sa bla mo// rang gi skyed pa chang du yang chags su bshad// srog gi rnam pa 'di gsum du// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa grub// bcu tshan gsum dang de steng gnyis// rus mtsho klad pa de la
yod// rkang gnyis la ni skad rnams 'byung// de la zas kyi longs spyod gsol// bzhi gnyis rang gi snying yin te// de la 'khor 'das chos gnas so// bcu tshan drug dang de steng bzhi// ma ste bu ste

'brel bar sprul// me dang rlung gi gnas ni 'og/ de yang gru gsum 'od ma'i gzhu// g.yas kyi nyi ma dmar zhing gdangs// g.yon gyi zla ba dkar la gsal// dbus kyi ka ba bstan pa ni// pad+ma'i snal ma lta bur

phra// chu shing snying po 'dra bar drangs [\[]drang [\]]// til gyi mar me lta bur gsal// rgya skyegs me tog bzhin du dmar// spyi bo gdugs kyi rnam pa la// mgrin pa sbrul chun gcus pa ste// snying ga gru gu bsgril ba

'dra// lte zur gnyis ni ljon shing skyes// tshigs chen bcu gnyis skra shad 'dzings// stong phrag la sogs ba thag brgyangs// 'bar ba gzhung ring 'khor lo gsum// me chu mtshal gyi dbang pos mthong// mtshams

la g.yal byung mkhal mar mig/ rngam byed ma ni ro la spyod// mkhal ma'i nang gnyis nyam nga byed// kun tu rgyal ba dri la spyod// rang gsal sgrogs ma sgra yin te// byed pa chen po thams cad dgyes// rkang lag

mthe bong mya ngan 'das// de bzhin srin lag gdon dang 'dre// gsang ba rdo rje pad+ma 'dra// b+ha ga bde ba chen po longs spyod a// hUM mi shigs thig le chen po la// oM dkar sku ste A dmar gsung// swa ser yon

tan las ni ha// des shing zhi ba'i dkar po a// thabs dang ldan pa sngon po nr-i/ khro zhing gtum pa ser po suM// bkres shing skom pa'i dmar po pre// glen zhing lkugs pa smug nag tri// tsha grang du nag gnas rnams
sbyang// a raM yaM ni 'og tu bshad// kun la a li ka li sogs/ khyab par 'dres dang so sor gnas// b+ha ga yangs pa'i sdong po la// bsam gtan oM dkar shes rab A// dmar zhing zung 'jug mthing

ga hUM// snying po dbyibs kyi a dkar las// drag po phaT dmar hUM nag stobs// lha srin dbyibs nang srog dmar k+Sha/ khrag gi thigs pa bcu gnyis lhung/ khams kyi dri chen rnam snang la// chu yi thig le gnyen
gsal ma// ma ni khrag ste 'og gsal 'bar// rlung ni bsil ba byang sems yang// kun 'dus rtag pa'i mu kha le// ha gnas rdo rje rgya gram las// yang gsal g.yos ni rab tu 'bar// pad mdung ma lang ral
gri bzhi// phra rno gcod gsal chen po las// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i las kyis bskyod// 'od gsal 'bar ni rab tu khros// nam langs nyi shar zla ba ltar// zhi ldan rnam snang gsal yang bskul// bkrag
gsal bde ba'i ros gang ba// dang po rang nyid sbyang bar bya// bud med 'dod pa'i chags pas blta// rnam pa sna tshogs dga' ba la// pad+ma ling+ga mnyam sbyar bas// shin tu chags mes thig
le dbab// mi mkhas thig le myur du nyams// rus sbal 'gros kyis mkhas par bya// rnam par smin pa mchog tu dga'// 'bogs phyir thig le 'bar ba'i drod// bsrubs pas mi rtog bde 'bar
ba// rnam par 'joms pa bral dga' yis// g.yos pa'i drod la thig le gzung// mi mkhas bde ba yun thung bas// lus ngag 'gyur ba'i las rnams bya// rtags byung thig le zin pa na// pad+ma ling+ga kha sbyar

bas// bde ba g.yo ba brtan par sbyor// rgya mtsho ri rab ngos la sbyar// gling bzhi rang gi gnas su bsdu// ro 'dzin rang gi gnas la sbyor// dbang mchog nyi ma'i steng du bzhag hUM ring hUM phaT mda' gzhu bya// ske

rags bcang zhing zhags pa 'phang// bu chung spyod lam rab tu bya// mtshan nyid bral ba'i lhan cig skyes// bzlog pa ma shes chu dang bsdad// de phyir dud 'gro'i 'gyur ba bya// 'grims pa ma byas nad yin

pas// de phyir rnam grol phyag rgya bya// lus kyi khol bu phar cher ram// thams cad snang dngos bde ba phyi// nang gnas spyi mgrin lte snying gsang// bdag yum gzung 'dzin rtog gsum 'gog/ de phyir spang bya dral

ba yin// bde ba chung che mi rtog ngang// bde stong de yang lhan cig skyes// skra dkar bral dang stobs rdzogs gsal// mtshan dpe tshang zhing 'chi med pas// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag po ste// tshe yi rig 'dzin thob
pa'o// zhes gsungs so// ma mo rgyud lung zla gsang thig le las/ lam gyi rim pa ste le'u brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i ngo bor gyur pa 'di gsungs so// kun gzhi ma skyes mu kha

le// dbu lnga phyag drug zhabs brgyad la// 'khor bcas snod bcud ma lus kun// rang gi sku la bsdus la bsgom// oM nyid gzhi mu kha le kro tI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+ma bde klong 'dus na snying dz+nyA sha yu to hUM b+h+yo/ spyi gtsug
'khor lo rtsibs brgyad steng// bkrag gsal mnyam gyi ngo bo nyid// zhal gsum phyag drug rgyan dang bcas// bkrag gi rgyal mo chen mor bzhugs// mgrin pa pad+mar gnyen gsal ma// gsung gi mkha' 'gro rab
tu bsgom// snying ga dpal be'u rnam snang gsal// rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas// lte ba zur brgyad 'od gsal 'bar// yon tan mkha' 'gro rin po che// gsang ba rgya gram yang gsal g.yos// las kyi

mkha' 'gro rab tu bsgom// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste// nyon mongs 'byung ba ye shes dang// rnam pa rang bzhin mtshan nyid ldan/ ma hA lam te ha/ b+hi sha san+ti ha/ gri ba mu+u hUM ha/ dz+wa la ba raM ha/ b+hi yang

yang te ha// mkha' 'gro chen mo rtag pa mo// 'byung lnga'i ma mo rnams las sprul// skyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum rnams// 'od chen dwangs bzhi dwangs ma brgyad// dpag bsam byang chub sbu gu'i zangs// srid pa dbang
po'i mdo sdud gnyis// thabs shes srid pa 'jug byed las/ khros pa'i tshul du rang byung ba// dpal 'bar khro bo gsang yum bzhi/ khams gsum rtsad gcod skye shi gcod// dug gsum dbang sdud

pad+ma dbang// gnod sbyin srin po dam tshig khro// gsang ba'i khro mo dpal 'bar khro// ka ma le shwa rI ha d+ha d+hig ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang las ye shes kyi gtso mo sprul pa dang bcas pa

ste le'u dgu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi dgongs pa 'di gsungs so// rnal 'byor lus kyi ri rab la// srid pa bde 'gro chen mo dang// de sprul nyi zla 'od phreng dang// ri

rab phyogs bzhi'i dgyes sde bzhi// rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo bzhi// phung byed sas pa'i ma mo bzhi// gnyis ni srid pa yongs kyi dpal// bzhi ni dpal gyi gzungs ma mdzad// bzhi ni rnal 'byor chung ma

ste// 'jig rten skyed byed che mo bzhi// de dag dam tshig brjod pa 'di'o// oM badzra kro tI shwa rI ba ga pad+ma r+ya hUM hUM/ oM badzra shan+tiM pad+ma ga ru ti b+h+yo/ oM mu tri ni/ a g+han+t+ri ni/ ba ga dun+t+ri ni/ kha mun dan tri ni/ oM badzra

sur+ya byi rta ma to ye/ badzra pad+ma byi ta ma to ye// badzra kha rag byi ta ma to ye/ badzra sring 'gro byi ta ma to ye/ oM badzra kem badzra kem/ badzra ta kem badzra ta kem/ badzra ni la badzra ni la/ badzra lan+d+ha badzra lan+d+ha/ ma mo thams

cad chags pa che// a b+hi She ka tsa ri las// lus kyi rtsa rnams bum pa ste// sngags ni gsang ba zhes su bshad/ khams kyi bdud rtsi shes rab shes// snying po g.yo byed bde ba che// bum pa sa drug rdzogs
pa las// sa bzhi gsang ba'i dbang zhes bya// shes rab ye shes sa gnyis gcod// bde chen bzhi las byad du bgrod// dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa la// gnyis pa bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs// gsum pa las

kyi 'khor lo ste// bzhi pa rdo rje'i rba rlabs bstan// dang por sprul sku'i zhing khams dbang// gnyis par longs sku'i zhing khams la// gsum par de bzhin chos sku las// bzhi par ngo bo nyid sku thob// dang por
lus kyi dkyil 'khor mthong// gnyis par b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor yin// gsum par byang chub bdud rtsi sems// bzhi par dus gsum bde gshegs bcud// dang por 'khor 'das dbyer med pa// gnyis par
ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// gsum bzhir bde stong chung dang che// de dag mthong sbyor lam gnyis kyis// rgyud rtags 'bras bur bsdus pa las// nye dgu dbang dang lam gnyis las/ phyi nang rten 'brel rnam

gnyis dang// thig le rlung dang de kho na// phyi nang sems kyi rtags zhes bya// yang dag mya ngan 'das pa thob// de phyir ye shes rje mo yin// shes rab ye shes zhes bya ba// haM 'dus mgrin par dga' ba ni// nyon
mongs pa dang ma bzhi las// mos pa chung ba'i lam chod nas/ snying gar mchog tu dga' ba ni// gnyis gsum bzhi cha zhi ma yin// dmigs pa phra ba'i lam yang chod// gnyis pos

bde ba longs spyod sku// lte bar mi rtog zung chud brgyan// dga' bral kun gzhi byang chub lam// bag la nyal dang mi rtog pa// spros pa zhi ba chos sku ste// gsang ba'i gnas su sprul pa'i sku// rtogs pa'i ngo la

'khor 'das dag/ de nyid me long ye shes che// de bzhin mnyam pa nyid rtogs byed// kun+da mi rtog chos rnams rtogs// thams cad gnyis med ye shes grub// mi rtog don gyi chos kyi dbyings// ye shes rnam pa lnga

rdzogs byed// ye shes rnam lnga'i chu bo yin// bram ze mo dang g.yung mo dang// gar mkhan ma dang tshos ma dang// gtum mo lnga ni phyag rgya nyid// rigs ngan bud med lnga rdzogs byed// 'dod yon dam tshig ye shes

dang// ming don bla med he ru ka'i// ming bris bcu gnyis rdzogs pa dang// lha dang dkyil 'khor phyag rgya sngags// de nyid bzhi dang ldan gyur na// shes rab ye shes lam gyi mchog/ gsang dang bde ba bzhi
mthar phyin// shin tu rnam dag spros bral thob// ces gsungs so// ma mo srid pa'i zla gsang las// ye shes kyi rje mo thugs dgyes sde'i man ngag ste le'u bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis srid
pa'i ma mo rnams yongs su grub pa 'di gsungs so// ma mo srid pa chags byed ma// sbas pa'i bu mo cha snyoms ma// ral gcig ma dang ma mo bdun// rin chen srid 'degs re ma ti// gling bzhi spyi 'gro chen

mo dang// 'dod khams rdo rje pad+mo dang// rgyal chen chung ma gru 'degs bzhi// rgyal mo bzhi dang sring mo bzhi// gsang sngags rab tu bshad kyis nyon// oM badzra za 'gram mu raM shwa za 'gram mu raM shwa/ oM badzra

kha rag snying kha rag trag rag sha trag rag sha trag rag sha mu tra b+han/ kha mun tra pa tra tra ga rag sha spra ba na kha rag tiSh+ta b+h+yo/ pra g+h+ri wa g+hi shwa b+h+yo/ hUM b+h+yo ka ri ka ba dor ba dor/ ni la chu mi d+ha/ kha T+wAM ga la da la tsa

la/ pad+ma tsan+t+ra ma gu ra ga do/ ding paM ding paM/ e A ra li de wI ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rag sha A+oM a ti b+h+yo/ b+h+yi di b+h+yo/ bu ti b+h+yo/ A+oM badzra shan+tiM b+h+yo/ dun+ti b+h+yo/ ha ra ti b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ te pa b+h+yo/ a pa ra da la b+h+yo/ da la
rgyun b+h+yo/ d+hi na ma ma g.yas b+h+yo/ gang gis 'chi bar byed pa la// mchod dang tshogs rnams kun bsags nas// rang gi sgrib pa sbyang bar bya// las ngan snang ba lta

sgom dor// lha dang bdag gi shes pa sbyar// snang ba bsgyur na rig 'dzin thob// brgya dang brgya yi tshul zhes bya// sngon 'gro byas nas yul gnad bcad// snying ga mthe bong 'od byung bas// bshang lci lte ba kha sna
dang// mig dang rna ba mdzod spu dang// lte bar zla ba mthing nag hUM// stobs kyi hUM drag nyi shu yis// rim gyis drangs nas tshangs pa'i sgo// yi dam lha yi thugs kar 'gro// 'khrul 'khor tshogs
rdzogs rnal 'byor pa// yi ge'i sbyor bas sgo rnams dgag/ rlung lha hUM hig drangs nas ni// rig 'dzin sgyegs dang 'khrul 'khor bzhin// bum pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor mchog/ 'od gsal rlung gis bskyed pa
las// lus ngag yid gsum zhugs pa yis// bar do med par grub mtha' rtogs// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// gsang dbang mchog gi ston par byed// rtsa mdud bral nas bcud sems 'dres// dbu

ma'i nang du tshud pa yis// bde stong 'dres pa'i rdo rje pad// shes rab ye shes thob pa yang// yang gsal g.yos ni 'dris par bya// khug pa bcu bdun thun bzhi yis// nyer gcig tha mar so bdun bya// phri nas

phrin las nyer gcig tshang gyur te// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gyur pa na// yang gsal gsal dang nges pa 'byung// sbyangs pa thabs kyi phyag rgya'o// lus gnad h-ig sgra nyer gcig gis// thun bzhir ngal bso zhag
bdun sbyangs// sgo rnams sngags kyis yig 'brus dgag/ phyi yi snang ba dgag par bya// 'khor lo bzhi la tsaN+Da li// dkar dmar bcu drug gyen log blta// yang gsal phyi nang yas dang mar// thun bzhi zhag

bdun nges pa yin// rang nyid gang 'dod sgo de dbye// mi 'dod sgo rnams sngags kyis dgag/ rlung zla hUM sems sgra yis drangs// bde 'gro la ni sbyor bar byed// rma med na tshod mthun pa'i ro// bsangs dang
bgegs bskrad lhar bskyed lhar// dang por gnas srung bsrung 'khor bsgom// rten la gnas mchog mnyes par bya// sna nas gzhugs shing sbyang ba ni// rtags dang nges par ldan pa na// mi sems gcig la

lus gnyis par// na sa g.yas g.yon snying gang zhugs// gang du bcug pa'i gnas der song// gzhan gyi grong la zhugs zhes bya// sgo rnams yang ni dgag pa dang// tshangs pa stong par dbye ba dang// snying gar

hUM mthing drangs pa dang// drod gsher mngal sgo bde gnas su// mda' 'am sgyogs kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra// yang gsal g.yos ni phyi dang nang// haM zhes bya bas rim par ni// nyi ma zla ba rA hu la// gza' yis
zin par gyur pa na// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin thob// ces gsungs so// ma mo'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le'i rgyud las/ rnal 'byor 'chi kha'i lam ye shes su rol pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// de
nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas 'khor rnams kyis bstod pa/ e ma ho// rab tu bzang ba'i ye shes ni// dngos po kun la rab tu gnas// dngos por 'dzin pa log pa ste// log par shes pa skyon dang

bral// rdo rje lus kyi dra ba las// sprul pa'i sku byung ngo mtshar che// de nas sngags kyi yi ge ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa rmad byung chos// sems can lus bcud khams kyi bde// de nyid mi rtog chos sku

gnas// yang gsal rang bzhin snying po med// de nyid ngo bo nyid du dag/ sku bzhi'i snying por rang shar bas// rdo rje theg pa sku lnga'i bdag/ gsang sngags gsang ba'i rgyud las byung// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes

gang// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// bud med rgyud kyi don rnams ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyud las grub// gsang ba'i dbang phyug dpa' bo la// rig pa'i ye shes ngang du 'dus// de nyid bcom ldan rnal
'byor che// he ru ka la 'dud phyag bstod// ces gsungs so// de nas ston pas rgyud yongs su gtad pa 'di gsungs so// gang gis 'byung ba nam mkha' 'dzin// de ni bkrag gsal mnyam du gnas// sa ni

rnam snang gsal du bstan// me ni 'od gsal 'bar ba las// chu ni gnyen gsal ma yin te// rlung zhes bya ba yang gsal g.yos// 'byung ba lnga dag mu kha le// chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyud 'di yi// bud med stong pa

nyid du gnas// de mtshon thabs kyi phyag rgya che// dra ba'i nges pa rgyud 'di long/ thabs kyi sbyor ba'i stong nyid 'di// bde byad bud med lag tu byin// de zla gsang ba'i thig le nyid// mig ldan dbang phyug sgrom du

sbos// ye shes gsang ba'i rdo rje 'di// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po dang// ye shes ma mo mkha' 'gro dang// sku gsung thugs kyi mi zad rgyan// 'khor lo gsang ba'i ngang la bzhugs// zhes gsungs so// de

nas 'khor rnams dgyes te rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// ma mo srid pa'i rgyud lung zla gsang thig le bud med kyi rgyud las/ rjes su bzung ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// ma mo zla gsang thig le'i rgyud
ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta guh+ya gsang ba las/ 'brog mi dpal gyi ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//// ! thugs kyi yang snying ma mo 'bum tig gi rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka

rtag pa chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems khyab gdal ba'i rang bzhin la yum dngos grub chen por bstan pa dang// thugs kyi sgrom bu las phyung ba'i dgongs pa'i brnag pa mthar phyin pa'i don du
gsungs pa las/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams las// sems nyid mya ngan ji ltar bzla// rtag chad rnam gnyis gang du bsdu// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de

skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// snod kyi 'jig rten kun bzang po// bcud kyi 'jig rten sangs rgyas rgyu// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par
dag/ rtag chad rnam gnyis mya ngan 'das// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// ston pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// sdud pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// gnas zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// gnas la nges

pa du zhig mchis// dus zhes bya ba ji lta bu// dus la nges pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung
drung yang dag pa// ston pa rnam gsum ye shes sku// sdud pa rnam gsum rig pa'i gter// 'pho 'gyur med pas gnas zhes bya// yang dag don rtogs dus zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// lha la

rnam pa du zhig mchis// 'khor la rnam pa du zhig mchis// lung la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang

dag pa// lha la rnam pa gsum du bstan// 'khor la rnam pa gsum du bstan// lung la rnam pa gsum du bstan// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rgyud ces bgyi ba ci ltar lags// lung zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// man ngag bgyi

ba ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rgyud ces bya ba 'brel pa'i bka'// lung zhes bya ba ston pa'i bka'// man ngag ces bya la

bzla'o// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// yum gyi dbyings shes gang la bgyi// yab kyi mkha' zhes gang la bgyi// blang dor med pa gang gis 'grub// 'khor ba'i gnas 'di mi 'tshal lam// klong zhes bya ba ji ltar lags// de skad

gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'du 'bral med pa yum gyi dbyings// skye shi med pa yab kyi mkha'// bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na// blang dor med pa de yis

'grub// gnyis med don rtogs de yi ngang// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// chos nyid rtag pa'i g.yung drung la// sems nyid rtag pa'i blos bzhag na// 'gyur med don zhes rung lags sam// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal

pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// chos nyid rtag pa'i g.yung drung la// sems nyid rtag pa'i blo bzhag pa// rdzogs pa'i lta ba la dor ro// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// ma zhes bya ba gang gi dbyings// mo zhes bya ba gang gi

klong// ma mo'i gtan tshigs ji ltar lags// 'byung ba lnga po gang las grub// sangs rgyas dgongs pa gang gis 'grub// bde ba chen po'i ngang nyid las// rgyu rkyen gnyis kyis bskyed lags sam// 'byung ba lnga yi ngang nyid
las// 'di la 'pho 'gyur mchis lags sam// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ma mo'i don rnams rtogs pa'i phyir// ma mo'i sa rnams nges par thob// yid bzhin
nor bu ma btsal rnyed// ye shes nyi ma rang la shar// chen po lnga yi ngang nyid du// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas so// gsang ba gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis
yang gsol pa// theg pa dman pa'i 'og ma dang// skye bo dam med dam nyams la// mi bstan sba ba'i dam tshig gang// bdag gis nan tan ji ltar bgyi// mngon sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon sangs
rgyas kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// mngon sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// theg pa dman pa'i 'og ma dang// skye bo dam med dam nyams la// mi bstan sba ba'i dam tshig ni// the

tshom med par ngas bstan gyi// ngas gsung pa la rtse gcig sems skyed cig/ theg pa 'og ma rnams la gsang ba ni// rtogs pa'i lta ba chen po gsang// mdzad spyod ngo mtshar chen po gsang// rdo rje slob dpon
sgrub rogs gsang// ma mo brten pa'i dam rdzas gsang// sgrub par byed pa'i lag cha gsang// bzlas par bya ba'i sngags rnams gsang// bsgrub pa'i gnas kyang de bzhin no// bsgrub pa'i dus kyang de bzhin
no// bsgrub pa'i rtags kyang de bzhin no// dngos grub rtags kyang snga ma bzhin// blang ba'i thabs kyang gsang bar bya// dbang du bsdu ba'i thabs kyang rab tu gsang// bkol ba'i thabs kyang de bzhin
no// gdams pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// gdams pa bzhin du ma nyan te// gsang ba ma thub 'bras bu ni// til 'bru tsam yang thob mi 'gyur// dngos grub nyid kyang ring ba dang// de ni rigs kyang yod mi
byed// ces bka' stsal to// man ngag dam tshig gi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gdon 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// rnal 'byor zab mo'i don spyod la// lta ba'i don gyis phan gdags pa// bdag gis nan
tan ji ltar bskyed// rtag chen yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// rtag chen yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rtag chen yab kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor zab mo'i don spyod la// lta

ba'i don gyis phan gdags pa// yang dag nyid du ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi gtso// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// snod kyi 'jig rten shes bya'i yul// bcud kyi 'jig rten rig pa ste// yul

dang rig pa gnyis med don gyis blta bar bya// ma mo mkha' 'gro skyabs dang grogs su blta// snod kyi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings// bcud kyi 'jig rten ye shes che// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med don gyis

blta// thabs dang shes rab 'du bral med par blta// yab yum rol pa byang chub sems su blta// ma mo mkha' 'gro bran dang g.yog tu blta// sprul pa sna tshogs 'phro 'du dbyings su blta// snang srid thams cad
byang chub sems kyi thig ler blta// snod kyi 'jig rten byang chub sems// bcud kyi 'jig rten ye shes klong// gnyis med don gyi skye med sku ru blta// ma mo mkha' 'gro byang chub sems kyi sprul

par blta// snang srid thams cad thig le chen por blta// snod bcud gnyis med rtag chen g.yung drung sku// snang srid gnyis med ye shes thig le'i klong// 'phro 'du thams cad sems kyi 'bras bu ste// ma mo

mkha' 'gro ye shes 'phro 'dur blta// lung 'di nyid kyi blta ba ni// ma ni skye med sku ru blta// mo ni brjod med gsung du blta// ma dang mo ni gnyis med thugs su blta/ ma ni byang chub sems su blta// mo ni

ye shes klong du blta// gnyis med rtogs pa chen por blta// ma ni skye med rnam dag dbyings// mo ni 'gyur med ye shes te// gnyis med rtag pa'i g.yung drung sku// ma dang mo yi ngang nyid ni// gnyis su med

pa'i byang chub sems// ma dang mo yi ngang nyid las// ye nas gnyis med chos kyi sku// ma dang mo yi ngang nyid ni// ye nas rdo rje snying por blta// ma dang mo yi ngang nyid ni// ye nas 'bras bu gsum du

blta// ma dang mo yi ngang nyid ni// ye nas stong pa gsum du blta// ma dang mo yi ngang nyid ni// rtogs na rgyal ba'i sku yang yin// ma rtogs dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro// mdor na ma dang mo yi ngang nyid ni// 'tsho
bar byed pa'i sman yang yin// 'chi bar byed pa'i dug kyang yin// ces bka' stsal pa dang// 'khor rnams dmas nas ya mtshan skyes so// ma mo'i lta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis
yang gsol pa// sems can kun la phan gdags phyir// bsgom pa'i don la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bka'

stsal pa// bsgom pa'i don 'di ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngas gsung ba la sems ma yengs// de la dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ snang srid thams cad ma byung ma skyes par

bsgom/ de nas kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo ltar// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin ni// oM dkar po bkra sa le bsgom/ oM de las 'od 'phros

pas 'phags pa'i thugs kyi rgyud bskul/ 'gro ba sems can gyi don byas nas// slar 'dus pa las ye shes lngar gyur par bsgom mo// ye shes lnga yi 'od zer las// e taM maM su keM phyaM laM b+h+rUM// zhes brjod
pas// yi ge de rnams rin chen rtsar la brgyus pa bzhin dkar khrigs se bsgom mo// de nas e b+ha ga wa pad+ma maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ yi ge e las gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gcig tu
gyur nas snang srid kun la khyab par bsgom mo// de'i byin rlabs las 'og gi phyogs su taM taM zhes brjod pas rlung gi 'tshub ma la rdo rje rgya gram gyis kha bcad par bsgom mo// de'i steng du maM las

rak+ta maN+Dal zhes brjod pas// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dmar chil bar gyur par bsgom mo// de'i steng du su las badzra suM zhes brjod pas// gser gyi sa gzhi dper na mtsho la dar chags pa tsam

mam// 'o ma la spr-is ma chags pa'i tshul du khad kyis chags par bsgom mo// de'i steng du keM las keM ni ri dz+wa la maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ keng rus kyi ri rab gsar rnying brtsegs pa la/ gnam lcags kyi rdo rje rtse

gcig pa'i gzer gyis btab pas rtsibs la nyi zla 'char bar bsgom mo// de'i steng du phyi las ag+ni maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ 'byung ba me yi dal gyis 'byung ba thams cad cha snyoms te/ gro'i glum langs pa

bzhin myal gyis btang bar bsgom mo// de'i steng du suM las su badzra sum me zhes brjod pas/ ri rab rin po che sna lnga las grub pa shar shel ka ka ri yang sti ltar dkar ba/ lho bai DUr+ya ya ltar sngo ba/ nub pad+ma rA

ga ltar dmar ba/ byang in+d+ra nI la ltar ljang ba/ dbus su shar ka ltar ser ba/ dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du phyin pa/ kha khyer gyen du byung bas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched 'phang gcad par bsgom
mo// de'i steng du ma dmar mo gcig gsal nas/ de'i steng du b+h+rUM smug nag gcig bsgom mo// de las 'od zer 'phros pas 'phags pa'i thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul/ 'gro ba sems can gyi don byas nas slar

'dus pa las// b+h+rUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra b+han+d+ha b+h+rUM// zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi gzhal yas khang gru bzhi sgo bzhi dang lnga pa/ sgo khyud rta babs dang ldan pa gcig tu gyur par bsgom mo// gzhal yas khang de'i

nang du dur khrod kyi rgyan mang pos brgyan par bsgom mo// de'i steng du ma dmar mo gcig gsal bar bsgom mo// de las ma sUr+ya maN+Dal zhes brjod pas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsgom mo// de'i steng
du a dkar po gcig gsal ba las// a tsan+d+ra maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur par bsgom/ nyi zla'i steng du tsakra maN+Dal zhes brjod pas/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa gcig tu gyur par

bsgom mo// de'i steng du ma hA de wa pho mo bsgom la/ ma hA de wA u ma de wI kha T+wAM ga ti ra baM zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po gan rkyal du bsgyel nas gdan du bting bar bsgom mo// de'i steng du rgyu'i yi ge oM
dkar po bkra sa me bsgom mo// oM de las 'od zair 'phros 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems su gyur par bsgom mo// de yang snang srid sen mo tsam yang ma g.yos pa'i thig ler gsal bar bsgom mo/ thig le de
las oM gu ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka hUM// zhes brjod pas// bla med he ru ka'i skur sal gyis gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis lcogs tshad du dgu phyag bco brgyad par bsgom mo// de ltar mi gsal na sku
mdog mthing nag la g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ dbu gsum phyag drug pa zhabs bzhi phyogs bzhir gtams par bsgom mo// gshog pa phyogs bzhir brkyang ba/ glang po che'i rko rlon gyi stod g.yogs dang/ zhing

lpags kyi g.yang gzhi dang/ thod rlon gyi phreng ba tshar gsum gyis spras pa/ dbu rgyan mgur chu do shal byas/ klu rigs bzhis sku la brgyan pa/ mtshan ma rnam pa gsum gyis mtshan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs
kyis brgyan pa/ zhal g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ dbus sku dang mthun te mthing nag phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje rtse dgu pa thogs pa/ g.yas bar ma na ral gri bsnams pa/ g.yas tha ma na zhags pa

bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na dril bu bsnams pa/ g.yon bar ma na rnge'u chung g.yon tha ma na dgra s+t+wa bsnams par bsgom mo// de ltar gsal ba dang/ g.yon gyi phyogs su gu ya kro d+hI shwa rI hUM/ zhes brjod pas/

lus la grib ma byung ba'i tshul du yum nyid gsang ba'i yum chen mor sal gyis gyur par bsgom mo// sku mdog dang phyag cha gtso bo dang mthun par bsgom mo// zhal lnga phyag drug pa'o// g.yas dang po na dril bu

bsnams pa// g.yon dang po na b+han+d+ha rak+tas bkang ba thogs pa/ g.yas bar ma na zhags pa thogs pa// g.yas tha ma na bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga thogs pa// g.yon bar ma na b+han+d+ha ltag sprod kyi rnga bsnams
pa// g.yon na tha ma na g.yang gzhi bsnams pa// zhabs rnam pa brgyad dang ldan pa gcig gsal bar bsgom mo// de nas yab yum gnyis su med pa'i brdas bskul nas// sbyor ba mdzad nas byang chub sems kyi

'od zer 'phros pas lcags kyus srid pa'i ma mo kun bkug nas gdan tu bting/ dzaHhUM baM hoH kro d+hI shwa rI ti ra baM shan+ti ti ra baM/ mu tri ti ra baM/ shan+t+ra ti ra baM/ dun+ti ti ra baM/ dan+ti ti ra baM/ sUr+ya ti ra baM/ kha ra ra

ka bi ti ti ra baM/ sring 'gro ti ra baM/ badzra kreMkreM ti ra baM/ badzra ta keM badzra ta keM ti ra baM/ badzra ni la badzra ni la ti ra baM/ badzra lan+d+ha badzra lan+d+ha ti ra baM/ nan zhes brjod pas/ gan rkyal du ling ling 'gyel nas phyogs
phyogs su gdan du bting bar bsgom mo// yang yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las/ yi ge ha re re gsal bar bsgom mo// yi ge ha 'phros 'dus pa las/ byang chub sems su gyur par
bsgom mo// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// sgrol byed ma dang dkar mo mig gcig ma gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su byang chub kyi sems yi ge ha las/ oM g+h+r-i swa mu ma ha d+h+rig ces brjod
pas// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal gyi skur sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dkar mo la dbu gsum phyag drug par bsgom mo// g.yas dang po na rdo rje// bar pa na dgra s+t+wa// tha ma na seng ge

bsnams pa// g.yon dang po b+han+d+ha rak+tas bkang ba// bar ma na gtun shing rdegs pa'i tshul ston pa/ tha ma na mchog chen snyod par bsgom mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// byang phyogs

'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// dbang phyug ma dang ral gcig ma gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// byang chub kyi sems yi ge ha las// oM byi yang yang te ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ mkha' 'gro ma yang gsal

g.yos kyi skur sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog ljang gu la dbu gsum phyag drug par gyur to/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa// g.yas bar pa na dbyug tho chen po bsnams pa/ g.yas tha ma na spyang

mo bsnams pa/ g.yon dang po na b+han+d+ha bsnams pa/ g.yon bar ma na rgyu phreng bsnams pa/ g.yon tha ma na zhing chung bzung zhing bsnams nas snyod par bsgom mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom
mo// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ bdud rtsi mo dar dmar mo gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su// sems yi ge ha las// mkha' 'gro ma gnyen gsal mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dmar mo

la zhal gsum phyag drug par gyur to phyag g.yas dang po na pad+ma bsnams pa/ bar ma na zhags pa/ tha ma na ce spyang 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang bo na b+han+d+ha bsnams pa/ bar ma na tri shul bsnams pa/ tha ma na zhing
chen thogs nas snyod par bsgom mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su/ dbang sdud ma dang ral gcig ma gnyis bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ byang

chub kyi sems yi ge ha las/ oM dz+wa la raM ha ng+h+rig ces brjod pas/ mkha' 'gro ma 'od gsal 'bar gyi skur sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog sngon mo la zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgom mo// phyag g.yas dang po na

rin po che 'bar ba bsnams pa/ bar ma na me dpung 'bar ba bsnams pa/ tha ma na stag mo 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po na b+han+d+ha/ bar ma na dbyug tho 'bar ba/ tha ma na zhing chung sbram po bzung nas snyod par bsgom

mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na/ dpal chen mo bsgom pa'i g.yas phyogs su/ ma mo phra men ma rgya mtsho ma dang/ nyi zla thod phreng ma gnyis
bsnol ba'i gdan stengs su/ byang chub kyis sems yi ge ha las/ oM ma hA laM te ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ yum bkrag gsal mar sal gyis gyur te// sku mdog ser mo la zhal gsum phyag drug par bsgom
mo// zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ dbus ser ba/ g.yas dang po na 'khor lo bsnams pa/ bar ma na rgyal mtshan/ tha ma na 'ug pa 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang po na b+han+d+ha/ bar ma na spu gri

bsnams pa/ tha ma na zhing chung bzung nas snyod par bsgom mo// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum du bzhugs par bsgom mo// de nas bdag nyid dpal chen po'i thugs kar rin che smug po gur phub pa 'dra ba'i nang na

dwangs ma bzhi zhig yod de/ rtsa'i dwangs ma dang/ khrag gi dwangs ma dang/ dbugs kyi dwangs ma dang// 'od kyi dwangs ma dang bzhi las shar lho'i mtshams su rgyan gyi rgyal mo 'gyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ rtsa'i

dwangs ma las/ A+oM kA ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas gsang ba'i yum rgyas 'debs mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dmar skya la sku phyag gis gang ba/ zhal spyan gyis gang ba cig bsgom mo// lho nub tu

dbyings phyug ma bsgyel ba'i gdan gyi stengs su/ khrag gi dwangs ma las/ A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas gsang ba'i yum za byed ma'i skur sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog mthing nag la sku dbugs

kyis gang ba/ phyag zhag gis gang ba cig bsgom mo// nub byang bdud rtsi ma bsgyel ba'i stengs su/ dbugs kyi dwangs ma las/ oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ yum rmongs byed mar sal gyis gyur te/

sku mdog dmar mo la sku lus khrag gis gang ba/ phyag rlung gis gang ba cig bsgom mo// byang shar du gcig pu ma bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ 'od kyi dwangs ma las/ oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/

yum tshe 'phel mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog ljang gu la sku bad kan gyis gang ba/ phyag chu ser gyis gang bar gyur te/ de ltar gsal ba dang/ byang chub sems las 'od zer 'phros 'dus pa las/ dzaHhUM baM hoH

ma ma b+h+yo phaT nan/ ma ma duSh+tAM phaT nan/ ma ma trag rak+sha pra we sha phaT nan/ shan nan ti ra baM zhes brjod pas/ srid pa'i dbang chen rnams kha bub gan rkyal du bsgyel bar bsgom mo// yang byang chub

sems las sbas pa'i ma bzhi dang/ dgyes sde mo bzhi dang brgyad bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ bdag gi rnam par shes pa mig gi dwangs ma las/ A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ yum khams gsum
gdar gcod mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dkar bkra mar bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa zhal rngams pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag na 'ug pa dang khyung la sogs

pa'i rbod gtong bsnams par bsgom mo// e ka tsa ti spun drug bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ dag gi rgyungs pa las/ oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+r-ig ces brjod pas/ mdog dmar bkrar bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig phyag
gnyis pa/ zhal rngams pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par bsgom mo// srid pa chags byed spun gnyis bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ gsang ba'i byang chub sems

las/ A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ dus gsum dbang sdud mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dkar bkra la zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ zhal rngams pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa phyag na rbod gtong gi

phyag brnyan bsnams par bsgom mo// 'dod khams kyi gtso mo spun gnyis bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ bdag gi tsit+ta la A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ pad+ma shwa rIr bskyed/ dmar po zhal gcig phyag

gnyis bsgom/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis kyang gan rkyal bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ bdag gi srid pa mdo bsdus las/ A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ yak+sha kro tI shwa rI mar sal gyis gyur te/

sku mdog smug nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom mo// ma bdun bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa las/ A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ rag mo kro tI shwa rI mar sal gyis gyur

te/ sku mdog sngon mo la zhal gcig phyag gnyis par bsgom mo// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ thabs dang shes rab las/ oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ sa ma ya kro tI shwa

rI mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dmar mo la zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa bsgom mo// sring bzhi bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ steng 'og bshang lam sgo bzhi las// A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod pas/ bi shwa kro d+hI

shwa rI ma'i skur bskyed sku mdog ljang nag la/ zhal gcig phyag kyang gnyis par bsgom/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su/ nyon mongs pa'i yid las ni/ A+oM ka ma la shwa rI ha d+h+rig ces brjod
pas/ gu ya kro tI shwa rI mar sal gyis gyur te/ sku mdog dkar bkral zhal gcig phyag gnyis par bsgom mo// de ltar dpal chen po yab yum dang/ thugs ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid/ gsang ba thugs las bskyed

pa'i sras// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbang btsan du// lha rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang// ye shes rang gnas yin pa ste// byin brlabs dbang dang ldan bya'i phyir// spyan drang bstim par bya ba yin/ de nas 'byor

tshogs kyi mchod pa phul la/ 'dzab drang ba ni/ A+oM shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ raM maM ma ma yo gi nI/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo phaT/ de ltar bsgom zhing bzlas brjod nyis brgya 'bum sum 'bum bzlas te/ de ltar byas na ma
mo de dbang du bsdu 'am 'dul// bkol yang de ltar byas na ji ltar du bkol yang btub bo// 'grub kyang des 'grub bo// zhes dpal chen pos bka' stsal to// 'khor rnams spro bar gyur to// bsgom pa'i le'u
ste bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen ma rnams kun// gdan du gding na ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs
gyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid pa'i dbang chen mo rnams kun// gdan du gding ba ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi

gtso// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// drag po'i 'od zer lcags kyu yis// dbang can mo rnams bkug nas su// chags pa gnas su sbyang ba'i phyir// rgya mtsho nyi zla thod phreng gnyis// chags pa'i gdan du gding
