so// nub phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' gsher la rlan pas dbyar du byin gyis brlabs so// lho phyogs kyi gsang ba'i mkha' dro la 'jam pas ston du byin gyis brlabs so// dus bzhi yang de ltar chags so// cha

yang de ltar snyoms so// sku stod kyi zhal nas 'byung ba'i rigs lnga he ru ka'i sangs rgyas rnams/ sku smad gsang ba'i b+ha gar sbyor tshul phyed nub tsam du bzhugs pas/ skye ba bzhi'i rigs drug so sor yang der

'thon to// rigs so sor btul ba yang der btul lo// phyag bzhi la g.yas g.yon gyi dang po gnyis kyis khol mo bcu bzhi'i gtso mo srid pa bde 'gro ma dang/ nyi zla thod phreng can gnyis kyi snying rtsa ba gzung ba/

g.yas g.yon tha ma gnyis kyis khros pa'i dbang mo che gnyis kyi snying rtsa ba gzung ba/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i longs spyod mngon du mdzad pa/ zhabs brgyad kyis dbyings kyi ma bzhi
dang/ thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i snying brdzis pa dang/ dbus kyi zhal dpral ba'i dbyes nas mig zur gsum gcig gzigs pas/ ma mo bcu bzhi'i khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang/ shan shan ne'u dang/

e ka tsa ti ral gcig ma la sogs pa 'dar lcug lcug byed pa/ dbus kyi zhal nas rkan sgra brdabs pas/ he ru ka sni la sogs te/ srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi snying rtsar gyis 'byin pa'o// ma mo dbang du yang

de ltar 'dus so// dbus kyi zhal gyis mkha' yel yel ba yang de ltar rdzogs so// srid pa gsum gyi gtso mo yang der rdzogs so// sku gsang ba'i b+ha ga la yum gyi mkha' bde ba chen po'i klong zhes kyang de la

bya'o// rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi bcud len pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// sku rtag pa chen po'i g.yung drung du bzhugs pas/ skye shi 'das pa zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la sdug

bsngal mi 'byung bas// mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bya'o// de lta bu la blang dor med pas kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// 'byung ba lnga sku la rdzogs pas/ 'byung ba'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de

la bya'o// dus bzhi dbyings la shar bas/ dus bzhi cha snyoms ma zhes kyang de la bya'o// sku stod kyi zhal nas 'byung ba'i rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyang/ sku smad nas byung ba'i gsang ba'i b+ha ga la rub pas/ rigs

kyi yum zhes kyang de la bya'o// sbas pa'i phyag gnyis nas kyang bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i longs spyod mngon du mdzad pas/ bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// snang srid thams cad gtan la 'bebs pas/ srid

pa'i rgyal mo zhes kyang de la bya'o// sku gcig la mtshan dgu ma zhes kyang de la bya'o// de la thugs nas drang ba'i snying po ni/ nyid gzhi mu kha le'i kro shwa rI b+ha ga pad+mar+ya bde klong 'dus na snying dzaHsha yu ti hUM b+h+yo b+h+yo/

yang ma mo zhes bya ba ni/ ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi yum// mo ni srid pa kun gyi ma// ma ni skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma ni thabs mchog rtog med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med

klong// de lta bu'i yum chen mo la sku stod nas byung ba'i rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang// sku smad kyi b+ha ga sbyor ba mdzad pa'i sras mo lnga yod de/ gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal zhes bya ste/ sku mdog

dkar mo la shel gyi ral pa can/ gsang ba'-i mkha' shel gyi ga'ur 'khyil ba ma chags pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal ba 'bar zhes bya ste/ sku mdog sngon mo la rin po che'i
lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' rin po che'i ga'ur 'khyil ba mi len pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma zhes bya ste/ sku mdog dmar mo la byu ru'i ral pa can/ gsang ba'i

mkha' byi ru'i ga'ur 'khyil ba gnyis su med pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos zhes bya ste/ sku mdog ljang gu la/ rdo rje'i lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' rdo rje'i ga'u
'khyil ba grub pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// gcig ni rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam zhes bya ste/ sku mdog cir yang 'gyur ba la/ g.yu'i lan phran can/ gsang ba'i mkha' g.yu'i ga'ur 'khyil ba gnyis

med brten pa'i thabs la rol pa'o// 'di lnga ni mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga zhes bya ste/ rigs kyi yum lnga bya ba yang 'di yin/ sems can dus chen po las bab pa yang 'di lngas dbang byed do// tshe'i bdag

mo yang 'di lnga yin no// srog las drang ba'i snying po ni/ gri swa muM hUM ha/ dz+wa la pa ra raM ha/ byir sha sid+ha ha/ byi yaM yaM te ha/ ma hA laM te ha/ de ltar bdag nyid bsgom pa ni/ dang por de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin
gsal bar bsgom pa ni/ thugs ka nas yi ge oM dkar po gcig las/ ye shes lnga'i gzhal yas khang/ chos kyi dbyings ltar khyab gdal ba'i dbus su/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du
zhugs la/ snying gar mu kha le las/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo bsgom/ mig g.yas pa ha las/ mkha' 'gro ma rnam snang gsal bsgom mo// mi g.yon par ha las/ mkha' 'gro 'od gsal 'bar bsgom mo// rna ba
g.yas par ha las mkha' 'gro ma gnyen gsal 'bar bsgom// rna ba g.yon par ha las mkha' 'gro ma yang gsal 'bar bsgom/ sna la ha las mkha' 'gro ma bkrag gsal mnyam bsgom/ sku mdog dang phyag
mtshan ni/ 'og ma'i tshigs bcad dang sbyar/ ma mo rnams kyi gtso mo dang jo mo'i yang gsang thig le gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa'i dkyil 'khor
bsgoms pa dang// bdag nyid phyag rgyar bskyed bya ba// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid las// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas

kyang// mngon rdzogs dpal gyi bka' stsal pa// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid las// ji ltar dkyil 'khor bskyed bya ba// ngas bstan pa la gdon mi za// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yis gtso// 'byung ba spro
ba'i ngo bo la// 'jug pa bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid de// sa bon gyis ni bstan par bya// bdag nyid thig ler mnyam sbyar nas// rnam gsum rim gyis ting 'dzin bsgom// dmigs med ting 'dzin rnam dag

cing// skye med chos nyid dbyings su thim// dmigs med ma chags sa bon gyis// de bzhin nyid du rnam par drangs// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo ltar// blang dor med par snang ba yi// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon
gyis// kun tu snang zhes grags pa yin// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yis// 'og gi phyogs su sa bon brtan// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yis// de yi steng du sa bon brtan// bdag gi sa las gyur pa yis// sa
bon las ni spris ma brtan// bdag gi me las gyur pa yis// sa bon las ni drod du ldan// bdag gi nam mkha'i ngo bo las// sa bon gsum gyi snang srid bsgom// dbyings las 'byung lnga'i rgyu bskyed

do// mkha' la rlung brtan 'gro lnga gnas// b+ha ga nyid du gsal ba las// sa bon gyis ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad pa ru rnam par grags// gdan gyi sa bon rnam

sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad steng du bcu bzhi bskyed// dkyil du rgya mtsho thod phreng gnyis// shar dang nub tu mgo bsnol ba'o// sgrol byed dkar mo mig gcig gnyis// brgya byin phyogs su mgo bstan pa// dbang
sdud nag mo ral gcig gnyis// gshin rje'i phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o// bdud rtsi byed dang dmar mo gnyis// chu bdag phyogs su mgo bstan pa'o// gnas 'phrul ser mo las mkhan

gnyis// gnod sbyin phyogs su mgo bstan pa// rgyan gyi rgyal mo mi yi phyogs// dbyings phyug ma ni bden bral phyogs// bdag nyid ma ni rlung gi phyogs// gcig pu ma ni dbang ldan phyogs// rim gro bskyed phyir

'khor rnams bsgyel// b+ha ga bcu bzhi'i gdan steng na// bdag nyid byang chub thig le las// snying po ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun tu bzang// rnam par thar pa'i dbur ldan zhing// ye shes drug gi

phyag rgyar bcas// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rdzu+u 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dang ldan// bdag gi kun gzhi'i ngo bo la// rnal 'byor nyid gzhi bde mchog ma// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtag
pa thugs kyi dkyil// 'od zer mang po rtse nas 'phros// 'byung ba lnga yi zhal mnga' zhing// ye shes drug gi phyag rgyar bcas// phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyis// ma gshegs par ni srid par

phyin// dus bzhi 'char ba'i b+ha ga la// skye shi med pa'i klong du thim// srid pa gsum gyis sku brgyan cing// spyi dpal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi

dpal// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' klong kun gyi gter lags te// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro yongs kyi thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas yongs kyi re skong phyir// thar lam bde

ba'i longs spyod ni// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyi// dgyes pa'i rdo rje gsor nas kyang// re skong bdud rtsi'i char chen phob ho// hUM mnyam nyid ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// 'byung gnas skye 'gro thar

pa'i lam// rin chen dkyil 'jam klong yangs su// spyi dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i gter// re skong rdo rje char chen phob ho// hUM b+ha ga pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dab brgyad pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ldan// phyi
lcags nang stan sgo bar bcas// rin chen dkyil 'jam gdan bting ste// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// lcags khrol gdan phye gdan la bzhugs// rin chen brtsegs pa'i ga'u ru// bla med khrag 'thung sku
bsil nas// bdud rtsi chen po'i bum pa yis// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bag chags bkrus// mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa che// ma chags pa la chags pa che// thar lam bde ba b+ha ga'i dbyings// blang dor med

pa'i klong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags bkru ba'i phyir// spyi dpal bla na med pa yi// gsang ba'-i don ldan lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phyed ste// ye shes chu bos khrus chen mdzod// oM thabs las
dbyings byung thar pa'i lam// dbyings las thabs bzhengs bla med sku// bla med dbyings dang ye shes sbyor bas na// bdud rtsi chen po'i char chen srid par spro// phyogs bcu rgyal ba mnyes pa'i

mchod par spro// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro skong ba'i tshogs su spro// 'gro ba rigs drug sgrib pa sbyong ba'i phyag rgya chen por spro// mu stegs bdud 'dul khro rgyal tshogs su spro// sdug bsngal zad phyir bdud rtsi'i char

chen spro// dbang po gsal byed ye shes sgron mar spro// 'dod chags tshim byed gsang ba'i sems su spro// hUM byang chub sems kyi thig le las// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// thams cad thig le nyid kyi

ngang// gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le che ho// gnyis med sbyor ba'i 'od zer las// 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du byung// bdag gi sa yi ngo bo las// sa bon las ni sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro brtan 'bar sems
ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs pa yi dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dag pa'i
na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i

mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis/ khams gsum thig ler sgrol byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog las// ljang gu na bza'
baiDUr+ya// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// gnod sbyin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi chu las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro gnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ rol
pa chen po'i dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgrol byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog las// dmar mo dbang gi na bzas
brgyan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// chu bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi melas gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro 'od gsal sems ma'i mchog/ stobs ldan

mchog gi dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thig ler sgrol byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtong// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog las// rin chen sngon po'i na bzas brgyan// rdzu
'phrul bzhi yis zhabs dag gis// gshin rje'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi bkrag las gyur pa yi// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ mi 'gyur ba
yi dbu gsum gyis// skye 'gro mkha' la sgrol byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// mi mdzad pa yi sbyin pa gtong// cir yang 'gyur ba'i sku mdog las// btso ma gser gyi na bza'
gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// brgya byin gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi gab pa'i thig le 'di// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// bla na med pa'i yab yum gyis// sbyor ba'i gdan du
drug po 'ding// bdag gi 'od can sna tshogs las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// dpal 'bar khro mo nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dwangs ma bzhi po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// gsang ba'i yum bzhi'i
nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dwangs ma brgyad po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa/ khams gsum gdar gcod nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dpag bsam shing bu las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// skye shi rtsad
gcod nyid kyi sku// g.yang gzhi dag gi gdan steng na// bdag gi bde chen gsal ba las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// dug gsum dbang sdud nyid kyi sku// bdag gi dpag bsam shing bu las// sa bon

las ni skur bskyed pa// srid pa rtsad gcod nyid kyi sku// bdag gi zangs kyi bu gu las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// pad+ma shan ting dbang gi sku// 'dod khams chen mo gtso mo'i yum// bdag gi srid pa'i

mdo sdud las// sa bon las ni skur skyed pa// yak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI'i sku// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya// bdag gi dbang po mdog sdus

las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// rak+sha kro d+hI shwa rI'i sku// bdag gi srid pa 'jug byed la// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// g+hu ya kro d+hI shwa rI'i sku// de ltar rtag tu bsgoms pa ni// byed pa po dang bya ba

mo// pha ma med pa'i bu mo gnyis// srid pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// sangs rgyas bas kyang shin tu bgres// lnga las gyur pa'i bud med lnga// gnyen med srid pa'i g.yung drung yin// bskyed pa'i khro mo bcu gsum

ni// cir yang mi 'ong g.yung drung ste// rus med g.yung drung bcu gsum yin// mtshon du med pa'i nam mkha' la// gza' skar mang po 'bar ba ltar// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// rig pa'i phyag rgya cir

snang yang// skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings su thim// gsang chen bde ba'i rdo rje la// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga spros// rtse nas thim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i
bca' gzhi'i/ gab pa'i thig le'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'gro ba sems can thams cad kun// rtog pa'i nad kyis zin pa la// bdud rtsi sman btang ji ltar
lags// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// bla med dpal gyis bka' stsal pa// rtog pa'i nad gzhil sman chen no// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// ngas

bstan pa la gdon mi za// nyon cig yung drung yang dag pa// rgyu gcig dang ni rkyen gnyis las// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyong ba// stong gsum sbyangs pas dri mchog gyur// dug gsum nad kyi gnyen po yin// rgyu

gnyis dang ni rkyen gsum las// sa bon gyis kyang rnam sbyong ba// spro dang bsdu ba mthun pa las// rtog 'dul rnam rtog thams cad 'dul// nyon mongs lnga yi nad rnams zhi// rgyu gsum dang ni rkyen lnga las// sa

bon gyis ni yang dag sbyang// spro bsdu g.yos par gyur pa las// rnam shes brgyad ni kun tu rgyu// 'jigs pa'i nad rnams zhi bar byed// bdag gi dri ma chen po la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon

tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po gti mug yin/ bdag gi dngos po mAM sa la// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po nga rgyal yin// bdag gi khrag las

gyur pa yi// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po 'dod chags yin// bdag gi dri chu las gyur pa// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon tan gnyis dang
ldan// dngos grub chen po phrag dog yin// bdag gi gsang ba'i sa bon las// sa bon gyis ni rnam sbyangs te// zos na yon tan gnyis dang ldan// dngos grub chen po zhe sdang yin// kun 'dus gcig tu gyur pa

yin// phra mo stong dang sbom po brgyad// bsdus nas gong bur zin pa las// bsdu ba'i sa bon gyis sbyangs pa'i// spro bsdus 'od du gyur pa la// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya yis// zos nas dpal chen dngos

grub thob// mkha' 'gro ma rnams mgu bar byed// rgyu gsum rkyen lnga bdud rtsi chen po las// snod chen snang srid 'char ba'i rgyud// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi 'byung gnas te// mkha' 'gro dam can kun gyid

srog gi rgyun// rang bzhin bdud rtsi chen po'i 'byung gnas ni// rang byung rnam dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs// bdud rtsi lnga yi sdong por nyid bzhugs pas// dug gsum rtog pa'i nad kyi gnyen po yin// theg chen
sa gzhi chen po las// rtsi mchog mang po kun skyes te// 'gro ba'i gsos su gyur pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po'i bdud rtsi'i 'khor lo las// srog gis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad kun// rnam rtog nad
kyi gsos su che// rgyu gsum rkyen lnga'i bdud rtsi de// ma rig dmyal ba'i dong zhes bya// de skad ces bka' stsal pa las/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ lha gnod 'dul la sogs pa 'khor der 'dus pa rnams bdud
rtsi'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ gtan du tshims nas mi 'chi ba'i dngos grub thob bo// bdud rtsi rin po che lngas rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan ma bcom nas/ chos nyid du gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i bca' gzhi'i
le'u ste gsum pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa/ srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun// 'dod chags kyis ni khams gsum 'khor// zhe sdang gis ni ngan song ltung// de la nan tan ji ltar
bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ji ltar chags sdang rnam pa gnyis// dngos grub chen po ngas bstan gyis// nyon cig

g.yung drug yang dag lha// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// pha dang khu bo tsha bo dang// lha dang bu mo mdzes sdug dang// bran dang g.yog mo la sogs te// zhing bcu dag tu ldan pa la// phung po gsod byed snying

phyung na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma dang bu mo'i sring mo rnams// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan dang// bran mog g.yog mo la sogs te// gdol pa mo dang phyal

ba dang// tshul dgur sbyar ba dngos grub thob// ces bka' stsal pas/ lha g.yung drung la sogs pa ya mtshan du gyur nas sngangs te/ ci yang mi smra ba dang/ 'khor de dag las 'khor gyi gtso bo dpal rdo rje sems

dpa' stan las langs te/ ye shes bzhi'i phyag phyogs bzhir 'tshal te/ bag bzhi sa la brdabs te lus brkyangs nas/ rgyal po rdzogs pa'i zhabs spyi bo la blangs te/ dngos grub myur bar 'dod pa'i phyir/ phyag

rgya bcas nas gsol pa/ pha dang nyi bzhi zhing bcu dag/ bsad nas dngos grub thob pa yin// zhe sdang chen po'i ting 'dzin la// zhing bcu bsad na dngos grub thob// rtogs pa sna tshogs las bya'o// ma dang nye ba
phyal pa la// sbyar na dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dngos grub chen po bdag 'tshal na// spyi dpal chen pos bstan du gsol// zhes zhus te/ lus sa la lan
stong du brdabs pa dang/ bag bzhi sa la btud nas/ srid pa thams cad dus gcig tu g.yos te/ 'khor thams cad dus gcig tu khams 'khrugs nas/ thams cad bag bzhi sa la brdabs nas ya mtshan

te/ spyi dpal chen po ya mtshan to// rdo rje sems dpa' ya mtshan to// zhes tshig tu smras nas/ pad+ma ga'u kha 'bus pa ltar/ sor mo bcu spyi bor blangs nas/ mig mi ldog par mngon par rdzogs pa'i rgyal po la
rtog go/ de lta bu'i spyod pa thugs su gsol nas/ 'khor thams cad la dgyes pa ye shes kyi mdangs kyis gzigs te bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje 'khor la gdung ba dang// sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir// rdo
rje sems dpas zhus pa lags// kun kyang dran pa gnas su sdus// srid pa thams cad bde la 'khod// ngas kyang bdud rtsi'i snying po sbyin// sdu na sa ma ya s+t+wAM/ zhes brjod pas/ 'khor kun sems
rnal du phebs pa dang/ srid pa thams cad dus gcig tu bde ste/ rna ba'i dbang po blags nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya'i rjes su zhugs nas gus par nyan to// de nas spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/

gnyen sdug dang ni zhing bcu la// gsang ba'i phyir ni zhe sdang bsgom// spyod pa gsum gyis rnam sbyangs pas// srid pa'i bag chags ma lus 'byang// lnga yi tshogs su sa bon gyis// sgo lnga kug nas tshor ba

med// snying brtse ba yi shugs dag gis// bsdus na rgyal po ri lu bzhin// sgo 'byed pa yi sa bon gyis// bo d+hi tsit+ta'i sgo phye nas// rna brgyud byin nas bsgom bzhu blugs// mas yar zlog pa'i sa bon gyis// spar

te 'bru bzhi sa bon gyis// chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa bzhin// mya ngan 'das la phyag rgya yis// bcings na bde skyid g.yung drung yin// rkyen lnga sgo 'byed sa bon gyis// ri rab chen po'i sgo phye ste// lha mo yi ni phyag

rgya yis// lcags kyu'i sa bon sbyangs nas su// rgyu gcig dbyings nas phyung nas su// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// ye shes g.yung drung bdal ba la// spyi dpal chen pos mtshams sbyar nas// gser dang

dngul du bsres pa bzhin// sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar// yang na dkyil 'khor gsal spros te// phung po mngon rdzogs lha la mchod// rtsa ba gsang ba'i b+ha ga la// mtshams su sbyor ba'i sa bon gyis// sras
su bskyed na bsod nams mchog/ bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar ba yis// srid pa'i bud shing sreg pa ltar// sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar// ye shes me dpung 'bar ba yis// 'gro ba kun gyi bag chags

bsregs// me la shing gis bsnan pa ltar// sdig pa spyad kyang ye shes 'bar// ma sring dang ni phyal ba dang// sbyor ba'i phyir ni 'dod chags bsgom// lha yi sa bon gnas lnga la// gcig la lha yi tshom bur

sbyar// lam du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// b+ha ga la ni pad+mas brgyan// stan du bde ba'i sa bon gyis// klong chen bde ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs su bcas// las kyi sa bon g.yas g.yon gyis// dbu la mkha' 'gro lnga

po nyid// dril bu'i sa bon rkang mthil la// zhags pa'i sa bon lag gnyis la'o// bdag nyid snying po brtan pa'i sku// gnas lngar ral gri'i sa bon lnga// gcig la mkha' 'gro lnga lngas bskor// 'dren pa'i sa
bon sgal tshigs la// dgyes pa'i sa bon g.yas g.yon la// bsten pa'i sa bon gsang ba la// lcags kyu'i sa bon rkang gnyis la// lcags sgrogs sa bon lag gnyis la// bskyod pa'i sa bon mtshams su
ste// spros na gnyis su med pa'o// spros pa tshom bu kun bstim ste// mchod pa bzhi yi sa bon gyis// stong khams bka' ste mnyes mchod la// rigs drug 'gro ba'i sdig sbyangs nas// 'jug pa'i sa
bon chen po yis// bsdus nas kun bzang mkha' la bstim// gting dpag med pa'i rgya mtsho la// chu bran thams cad 'du ba ltar// bya spyod gnyis kyi rlung dkyil du// ma sring la sogs klu mo dang// gdol pa
rigs ngan phyal pa dag/ tshul dgur sbyar na bsod nams mchog/ ces bka' stsal pa dang/ 'khor thams cad kyis chags sdang gi dngos grub thob bo// ta na dang ga Na'i bca' gzhi'i le'u ste bzhi
pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa/ mngon spyod mchod pa chen po dag/ ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// spyi dpal mchog la bdag nyan 'tshal// rgyal po bde bas bka' stsal pa/ de phyir

nyon cig rdo rje sems// mngon spyod mchod pa sna tshogs te// bdag nyid mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor ldan// rgyan dang bgo ba'i longs spyod la// 'dom gang 'od kyi sa bon gyis// sbyangs na dkyil 'khor mnyes
pa yin// bza' dang bca' ba'i longs spyod la// bsreg pa'i sa bon mthar bzhag la// bdud rtsi'i sa bon mngon sbyangs te// gnyes shing dgyes pa'i sa bon gyis// mchod cing zos na dkyil 'khor

mnyes// btung bas tshims pa'i longs spyod la// bsreg pa'i sa bon gyis sbyangs te// chu yi sa bon chen po yis// sbyangs te 'thung na dkyil 'khor dgyes// phar gtong ba dang tshur len pa// pho dang mo yi sa bon

gyis// sbyangs na thabs dang shes rab thob// mchod pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor spro// rtags ka ni ngang tha do la// thabs dang shes rab sa bon gyis// sbyangs na sdig byang nyes pa med// 'di ltar byas na 'phags pa

mnyes// mngon spyod mchod pa chen po yis// chos kyi rang bzhin dngos med de// dngos med yi ge stong pas sbyangs// stong nyid stong pa ye nas dben// bsags pa'i snod kyang dngos kyis stong// rnam par smin pa
stong pas med// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// gdod nas stong pa'i 'bras bu yin// rtogs pas stong pa'i 'bras bu len// legs dang nyes pa gnyis med de// thig le chen po len pa med// gdod nas len pa'i
rgyal po yin// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i 'khor phun sun tshogs pa kun/ stong pa'i 'bras bu la sems mi yengs par rtog go// de nas lha gnod 'dul stan las langs
te/ spyi dpal chen po'i zhabs la 'jus nas/ gnod 'dul chen pos gsol pa/ dgongs shig bde chen ye shes lha// srid pa 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// sems kyi 'khrul pa ci mchims pa// zhabs la spyi bos
gtugs nas su// stong pa chen por bzod par gsol// 'bras bu chen por bzod par gsol// byang chub chen por bzod par gsol// de nas mi dmigs pa'i tshangs pa chen po thob bo// de nas
rdo rje sems dpa' des langs nas sku la thig le sbrul ltar 'khril// mdzes pa chen po'i mchod pa byas// phyi dbang chen po bdag la gsol// nang dbang chen po bdag la gsol// gsang dbang chen po bdag la
gsol// zhes zhus pa dang/ spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// nga yi gsang rgyud chen po 'di// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las mi mnga'

bas// gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang ba'i gter// gsang ba'i mchog gi spyod pa 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' khyed la gtad// 'gro ba kun la snying brtse'i phyir// nga yi spyod pa mtha' dag dang// nga yi byin brlabs
chen po rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' khyed kyis zung// deng nas rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// gsang ba kun gyi byed pa'o// gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang ba'i bdag/ sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba'i// gsang

ba'i dpal du+u dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ste// rnal 'byor kun la bde sbyin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyed kyis gzungs// gu ya rA tsa ma hA rA tsa sa ma yA laM ho ho// zhes gnang ba dang/ de

nas rdo rje sems dpa' des// rgyan dang cha lugs bkrol byas te// spyi dpal mchog la mngon par gtor// gsang dbang chen po btsal ba'i phyir// snying dang snying gi grogs mo de// spyi dpal mchog la yon du
'bul// rgyan dang cha lugs mang po kun// gsang dbang gnang nas yon du bzhes// mngon spyod kyi mchod pa chen po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// sa ma ya zhes bgyi ba
gang// sa ma ya la du zhig mchis// sa ma ya yi don rnams gang// de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// sa ma ya zhes bya ba ni// 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go/ dam
tshig grangs la bsam mi khyab// bsdu na rnam pa gsum yin no// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// sa ma ya zhes bka' stsal pa// ji ltar bdag gis nan tan bgyi// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan

'tshal// nyon cig dpal ldan rdo rje sems// ston pa bde gshegs kun gyi dpal// sku yi phyag rgya mi spang zhing// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams mnyan par bya// rdo rje spun la gdung ba bskyed// 'di ni lus kyi sa

ma ya// bskyed rdzogs sa bon rgyun mi 'chad// rgyal po phyag rgya gsal bar bsgom// 'di ni ngag gi sa ma ya// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i don// snod ngan rnams la spel ba min// 'di ni tsit+ta'i sa ma ya// tan
gan dang ni 'bras bu lnga// spang bar mi bya spyad par bya// 'di ni yan lag sa ma ya// dmigs med spyod pa mtha' dag kun// 'gro don rdzogs pa'i sa ma ya// sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// 'da' bar mi
mdzad rdo rje dam// bcol pa'i las rnams byed pa ni// mkha' 'gro rnam gsum sa ma ya// zhes dpa' bos bshad de// de skad ces spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa dang/ 'khor thams cad yi rangs te/ rdo rje
sems dpa' dang/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ni gsang ba'i bdag por gyur/ 'khor mang pos ni g.yung drung gi dngos grub thob ste/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i dam tshig can du gyur to// dam tshig bca' gzhi'i

le'u ste drug pa'o//// rnal 'byor gyi rgyud lung chen po/ ka ma la de wi sid+d+hi ma hA tan+t+ra las/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa dang/ bdud rtsi chen po'i bca' gzhi dang/ ting 'dzin phum sum tshogs pa'i bca' gzhi
dang/ sa ma ya'i bca' gzhi ste/ rin po che'i gter gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen mo rnams kun// spyan rnams drang na gang gis drang// dbang du
bsdu na ji ltar bsdu// las la bkol na ji ltar bkol// tshogs kyi mchod pa ji ltar dbul// de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag

pa// las rnams 'og ma 'di ltar bya// hUM srid pa thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong// dus gsum bde gshegs 'byung ba lnga yi ngang// skye 'gro ma lus 'byung ba lnga la rdzogs// 'das dang ma byon 'byung ba lnga yi

dbyings// 'byung ba lnga nyid b+ha ga yum gyi klong// bde chen yum gyi klong la phyag 'tshal lo// hU~M khams gsum thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i rgyan// snang srid thams cad 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad sgo bzhi b+ha

ga'i tshul du brgyan// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo sku bskyed cig/ hU~M/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su// ya bdud bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// yum gyi rgyal mo spyan 'dren te// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs

mtshams gnon// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// mkha' la dus bzhi cha snyoms ma// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// phyag drug phyag cha sna tshogs bsnams// dang po

rdo rje dril bu dang// bar ma b+han+d+ha zhags par bcas// tha ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhi 'bar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la// tshogs kyi
bdag mo gshegs su gsol// hU~M/ shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sna tshogs
'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rdo rje b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma dgra s+t+wa gtun shing rdeb// tha ma seng ge mchog chen
snyod// 'byung ba sa yi mnga' bdag mo// 'gro ba'i dus la mnga' mdzad ma// rus pa'i bdag mo bzhugs su gsol// hU~M/ byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs

su// byang gi mkha' 'gro khyung chen gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang gu shin tu 'bar// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po rgya

gram b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma khyung chen rgyu phreng 'dren// tha ma spyang mo zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba rlung gi mnga' bdag mo// 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// dbugs kyi bdag mo bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ nub
phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// chu bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nub kyi mkha' 'gro dur bya'i gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal ma// sna tshogs 'bar ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' dmar
mo dbang gis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po pad+ma b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shU la// tha ma ce spyang zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba chu la mnga'

mdzad mo// 'gro ba khrag la mnga' mdzad ma/ khrag gi bdag mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// gshin rje bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lho yi mkha' 'gro ba glang gdong// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal
'bar// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sngon mo bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin chen b+han+d+har 'bar// bar ma me dbal dbyug tho bsnams// tha ma stag mo

zhing chung snyod// 'byung ba me la mnga' mdzad ma// drod kyi bdag mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM/ dkyil mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// brgya byin 'gyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo
rje'i chu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ser po btso ma gser// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+d+ha 'bar// bar ma

rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma 'ug pa'i zhing chung snyod// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// bkrag gi bdag mor bzhugs su gsol// kun kyang ye shes mkha' 'gro

ma// mche ba can la gtsigs shing ha ha bzhad// 'jigs tshul che la snying rjer ldan// ye shes drug dang ldan pa ste// pha rol phyin pa de bzhin nyid// sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir// 'gro la phan phyir
gshegs su gsol/ !/ da ni ma mo dbang du bsdu ba'i bkol thabs bstan te/ nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// gtso mo la sogs drug po 'di// bdag nyid chen por bsgom par bya// bcu bzhi

man chad gdan du bting// bdag nyid chen por bsgom par bya// ma ni dgyes chen rtag pa'i mkha'// mo ni bde chen longs spyod klong// ma ni rtag chen g.yung drung mkha'// mo ni chags byed byang chub klong// ma
ni sku gsung thugs kyi mkha'// mo ni lus ngag yid gsum klong// ma ni rgyal ba kun gyi mkha'// mo ni 'gag pa med pa'i klong// ma ni thabs mchog gnod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong// ma

ni nam mkha'i dbyings nyid mkha'// mo ni sems kyi sems nyid klong// ma ni chos kyi chos nyid mkha'// mo ni bde chen b+ha ga'i klong// ma ni sku bzhi bde chen dbyings// mo ni rnam shes hUM chen 'bar// mkha'

klong gnyis su bdag bsgoms shing// thig le chen por blo brtan nas// lus la ma mo dbang du bsdus// zhes 'byung ste/ de la ma mo lus la ji ltar bsdu zhe na// tshig don du ni 'di skad ston// ye shes thig le chen
po dang// gsang chen bde ba'i lam mchog dang// man ngag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// yang gsang ma mo drug po de// chags pa'i gnad du bsgom par bya// 'od chen kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa'i bde

'gro thams cad dang// nyi zla'i thod phreng gdan du gding// thig le chen po'i rgyan bzhi yis/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po dag/ chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa'i dwangs ma brgyad po yis// sbas
pa'i ma mo bzhi po dang// thugs kyi dgyes sde bzhi rnams kyang// mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// bde chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// srid pa chags byed spun gnyis bkan// srid pa rang lugs gnyug
ma yis// e ka dza ti spun drug bkan// chags pa'i yum chen dmar mo yis// 'dod chags gtso mo spun gnyis bkan// srid pa spyi yi mdo sdud kyis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis bkan// dbang po spyi yi
mdog gsal gyis// srid pa'i mche na bdun rnams bkan// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab kyis// dmag gi rgyal mo spun gnyis bkan// srid pa'i 'jug byed 'phro 'du yis// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gan rkyal

mnan// de ltar gdan du bting bar bya// snying 'dren phyag rgya bcas nas su// drag po'i sngags kyis gnan par bya'o// hUM mu kha le ha na/ ha ha na/ hUM ha ha phaT/ kro d+hi shwa rI b+ha ga shan+tiM nan/ sUr+ya pad+ma kha rag sring

'gro nan/ su tri dun+ti nan/ ma du+u sa stan phaT/ keM ta keM ta ni la lad tran nan/ ma ma b+h+yo hUMM phaT/ na na ma ma duSh+tan phaT nan/ ma rag tra pra we sha na sha na/ nan nan/ de skad ces ni brjod pa yis// gdan gyi rgyu

rnams bskyed pa dang// bdud rtsi dmar chen khar blugs so// oM badzra a mr-i ta/ u tsi ta tsit+ta nan/ pra ta phaT nan/ 'di ni srog 'phrog pa'i sngags yin te/ gdan gyi snying khrag zhal du rngubs// lce

yi steng du gsal bar bzhag/ de nas gdan nas bkye nas su// bsgrub pa'i las rnams byed par bsgom// che ba'i nga rgyal 'di skad bskyed// hUM// nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni khro bo kun gyi yab// nga ni

srid gsum snying rje'i bdag/ nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// thams cad kun gyi snying khrag bdag khyed kyi snying khrag nga la yod// nga yi las rnams khyed kyis sgrubs// dzaHhUM baM hoHma ma b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo// hUM/

ye shes rtsal 'phang thig le yis// bsgom bya ma mo bcu gsum la// drug cu rtsa brgyad dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ zhes 'byung ste/ bdag nyid bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal bar byas la/ sems las skyes pa'i

ma mo bcu gsum dang/ ma mo drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi srog gi snying po bsdus la 'khor du bzhag go/ de nas rnal 'byor gyis 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa gzhung bzhin bshams la/ sna la ye shes lnga las bskyed

pa rnams mchod// hUM/ thig le dbyings las bskyed pa'i khro rgyal yum// ye shes thugs las bskyed pa'i khro mo'i skur ston pa// gnyis med ha ha bzhad cing rngam pa'i sgra yis hUM sgra 'byin// mche ba dmar mo

gtsigs nas snying 'dren rkan sgra can// skye shi rtsa ba gcod nas bde klong thugs la bsdu// kun kyang sku mdog khro mor bzhugs shing dbang chen dkyil 'khor rdzogs// phyag nas sprul pa gtong zhing dug gsum

dbyings su sbyor// ma tshogs 'khor du bsdus nas b+ha ga mnga' mdzad ma// drug cu rtsa brgyad tshogs kyis dus la babs kyi rngam pa'i sgra phyung zhig/ srid pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i thig le che// dgyes pa'i

bzhad pa sgra sgrogs rol pa'i tshul bzhin mdzod// rgyu las bskyed pa'i bdud rtsi chen po 'di// rnam rtog gzhom phyir khyod kyi sku la thim par mdzod// ha hU~M he ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo/ a la la ho/

oM ha ho/ sku las bskyed pa ston nas su// 'khor gyi drug po spyan drang ngo// hUM/ ma mo chen mo tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// kun 'byung dal la mnga' bdag mo// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad zhal lnga 'bar// mkha'
bzhi bde klong dbyings nas gsal// mkha' la srog gi mnga' mdzad ma// dkyil 'khor gtso mor bzhugs su gsol// hUM// ma mo chen mo rgyu bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum shar gyi
mkha' 'gro ma// hUM// ma mo chen mo dbugs bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum byang gi mkha' 'gro ma// hU~M/ ma mo chen mo rlan bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal
gsum nub kyi mkha' 'gro ma// hU~M// ma mo chen po drod bdag mo// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum lho yi mkha' 'gro ma// hU~M// ma mo chen mo bkrag gi bdag/ sna tshogs 'gyur
ba'i sku mdog la// zhal gsum nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma// yang sbas drug gis dkyil 'khor rnams// thugs dam chen po rjes dgongs te// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// de nas bcu bzhi man
chad kyang// rang rgyud lugs bzhin bskul bar bya// ma mo bkol thabs dang/ dbang du bsdu ba dang/ tshogs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yid yang gsol pa// ma mo kun gyi phyag rgya
rnams// don du ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad zhus pa gsan nas kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// ma

mo rnams kyi phyag rgya rnams// 'bru lnga don dang ngas bstan pas// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// a la la ho/ sa ma ya hUM ha ho s+t+waM/ lag gi 'du byed bsgom pa ni// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab

las// rdo rje gar du bskor ba las// shes rab mchog gi snying gar bstan// sbom po dbang mo rtse sprad de// thabs kyi phyogs mtshams bskor ba ni// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo'i rgya// rdo rje sder mo dam bsnol

te// o~M bsgreng rtse mor rgya bcing bya// ma mo rdo rje rus pa'i rgya// rdo rje khur tshur bcangs pa las// hU~M dang ha gnyis rtse sprad de// 'bru gsum brkyang nas gshog pa'i tshul// na ra ha sar gzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje

dbugs kyi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las// oM dang swa gnyis rgyab bsnol 'khyud// 'bru gsum rtse sprad sku gsung thugs// bzhad pa'i thad kar gzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje khrag gi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur

dam bcings nas// ha gnyis rtse sprad gyen du bsgreng// oM gnyis rtse sprad thad kar brkyang// swa bsgreng rtse sprad thur du brkyang// 'bru gnyis so sor dam bsnol nas// gu ya'i thad kar gzung ba ni// ma mo rdo rje me

yi rgya// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa las// A+o~M gnyis rgyab bsnol lu gu rgyud// 'bru gsum so sor brtse sprad de// hU~M gnyis drag tu g.yob pa ni// ma mo rdo rje bkrag gi rgya// rdo rje thal mo brkyang ba las// thabs kyi
o dang ha gnyis las// shes rab AHyis brten par bya// shes rab oM dang ha gnyis las// thabs kyi hU~M gis brtan par bya// shes rab oM dang hUM brkyang ste// thabs kyi oM dang sbas bkab pa// sems kyi
dkyil du bkan bkab pas// ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i// rdo rje tshogs chen rdzogs pa yi// phyag rgya min par dpa' bos bshad// gtso mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// gnod 'dul
lha yis yang gsol pa// sems nyid 'jig rten la bzla ba'i// phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags// dbang phyug gtso la bdag nyan 'tshal// dbang phyug gtso yis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa

gsan nas kyang// dbang phyug gtso yis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// thig le chen po'i phyag rgya ni// rdo rje khu tshur kha sprad de// shes rab mchog gi phyogs nas su// o~M aM ha gsum rtse sprad

pa// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rgya// thabs mchog spyod pa'i phyogs nas su// oM aM ha gsum rtse sprad pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i rgya// thabs kyi hUM gi sgo gsum ni// rang rig ye shes phyag rgya

yin// shes rab sra yis sku gsung thugs// thig le byang chub sems kyi rgya// shes rab hUM gi rtse mo ru// thabs kyis swa yis spyir mnan pa// thabs dang shes rab phyag rgya zhes// yang dag rdzogs kyis nges par
bshad// thig le chen po'i rgya bcings nas// ma hA su khar bsdams nas su// bla na med par gsal gyur nas// dug gsum nyes dmigs sel bar nges// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// dus gsum mgon
pos de skad gsungs// sems la bzla ba'i phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// gtso mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan lags na// bcu bzhi zhes ni bgyi ba yi// phyag rgya
rnams ni ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yangadag pa/ bcu bzhi zhes ni bya ba

yi// phyag rgya rnams ni ngas bstan no// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab la// shes rab mchog gi snying gar bsten// shes rab phyogs mtshams bskor ba ni// phra men rgya mtsho tshogs kyi rgya// rdo rje sder mo

brkyang ba las// ha gnyis rtse sprad phreng ba'i tshul// 'bru brgyad phyar nas gdengs pa ni// 'di ni nyi zla thod phreng rgya// thabs kyi oM ni gyen du bsgreng// oM dang swa dang aM dang ha// oM la sbyar te zur can du// rtogs

pa'i tshul du phyar ba dang// shes rab thal mo drang brkyang nas// sku yi kha ru brkyang pa ni// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i rgya// oM hUM swa gsum rtse sprad de// bsnol te dam du bsdams pa dang// oM dang hUM yang ha gnyis rtse

sprad nas// snying ga'i thad kar gzung ba ni/ khams gsum 'tsho byed khros pa'i rgya// rdo rje 'khor ba bsdus pa'i las// hUM dang ha gnyis gtor ba'i tshul// pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i rgya// thabs kyi rdo rje thal

mo gnyis// phyar te drag tu rgyab pa ni// srid gsum bde sbyor khros pa'i rgya// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni// gdong dang dpral bar rab gtugs te// gus pa'i tshul gyis lus btud pa// 'di ni ma bzhi'i phyag

rgya'o// ha dang hUM gnyis zhags pa'i tshul// phyi ma phyogs bzhir brkyang ba ni// 'di ni rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i rgya// thabs kyi phyag rgya khu tshur bcang// bsdigs pa'i thabs su phyar ba ni// 'di ni dbyings

phyug chen mo'i rgya// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas ni// sku yi thad kar gzung ba ni// 'di ni bdag nyid chen mo'i rgya// g.yas g.yon sor mo brkyang nas ni// ha dang hUM gnyis rtse sprad de// gshog pa'i tshul du brkyang ba

ni// 'di ni gcig pu chen mo'i rgya// yi ge 'bru lnga rtse sprad nas// rdo rje thod pa'i tshul du bya// 'di ni dkar mo mig gcig rgya// dpa' bo 'bru lnga dam bsnol te// ha gnyis brtsegs te hUM la gtad// thod pa sul
mdas tshul du bya// 'di ni nag mo ral gcig rgya// yi ge 'bru lnga dam bsnol te// ha gnyis brtsegs la hU~M la gtad// rtse mo so sor phyar ba ni// thod pa lcang lo'i tshul du bya// 'di ni dmar mo dbang

bsgyur rgya// thabs dang shes rab rgya bsnol te// hUM dang ha gnyis rtse sprad de// rdo rje thod pa'i tshul du bya// 'di ni ser mo las mkhan rgya// ma mo bcu bzhi'i phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////
gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten 'di la dbang byed pa// rim pa gang dang gang la gsal// yang dag rdzogs la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung

lha yi gtso// 'jig rten ji ltar dbang bgyi ba// ngas bstan pa la sems thud cig/ 'byung ba lnga las bskyed pa ni// kun tu bzang mo'o// dbang bsgyur ba'i bu mo spun lnga/ cha snyoms ma ni srid pa'i bde 'gro ma/

'byung ba lnga'i nyul le ma ni chags 'dzin spun gnyis so// dus bzhi rdzogs par byed pa ni kun tu bzang mo'o// dus bzhi la dbang byed pa bu mo spun lnga'o// dus bzhi cha'i nyul le ma chen mo ni phyag ya bdud kyi
chung ma'o// ma mo rang rang gis bkol thabs ni// yum chen mo nyid kyis mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ yi dam bsgom legs kyi ma mo dang bdun 'khol

lo// des srid pa bde 'gro ma bkol lo// des rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des srid pa chags byed ma 'khol lo// des e ka tsa ti la sogs pa ma

mo bdun 'khol lo// des 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo dang/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma gnyis 'khol lo// des nam mkha'i rgyal mo dang/ gling bzhi spyi phud ma 'khol lo// bu mo spun lngas ni srid pa thams cad

dbang du byed do// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal mnyam gyis ni/ nyi ma'i phreng can 'khol lo// des srid pa cha snyoms ma 'khol lo// des sa bdag pad+ma phreng 'khol lo// des e ka tsa ra ma 'khol lo// de
rnams ni dbus kyi nyul le ma ste/ nam gyi gung la rgyu/ rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal gyis ni/ khams gsum 'tsho byed khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des dkar mo mig gcig ma 'khol
lo// des ni rgyan gyi rgyal mo 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma ha ra ting dkar mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo dkar mo mche ba can 'khol lo// des sring mo bzhi ste gling bzhi spyi 'gro ma 'khol

lo// 'di rnams shar gyi nyul le ma ste/ nam gyi srod la rgyu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar gyis ni/ srid pa'i bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde mo nag mo ral pa can
'khol lo// des dbyings phyug ma 'khol lo// des grub 'degs ma dun ting nag mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo nag mo kha rlan ma 'khol lo// des sring mo mkha' la khyung lding ma 'khol lo// 'di rnams
ni lho'i nyul le ma ste// nam gyi 'jing la rgyu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal mas ni/ rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo dmar mo dbang bsgyur ma 'khol
lo// des ni bdag nyid ma 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma shan ting dmar mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo dmar mo mchu 'jib ma 'khol lo// des dkar mo g.yag thod can 'khol lo// de rnams ni nub

kyi nyul le ma ste/ nam gung la rgyu'o// rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos kyis ni/ pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che 'khol lo// des thugs kyi dgyes sde mo ser mo las mkhan ma 'khol lo// des sring mo
bdun 'khol lo// des gru 'degs ma grub ting ser mo 'khol lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo rkang ldag ma 'khol lo// des srin mo sder chen ma 'khol lo// de rnams byang gi nyul le ma ste/ nam gyi tho

rangs rgyu'o// yum chen mo nyid ni/ nyin mtshan khyab par rgyug gam gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad la mnga' mdzad do// spyi dbang ni yum chen mos rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga la sogs pa ma mor grags pa

dang/ srid pa gsum la mnga' mdzad do// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lngas ma mo chen mo bdun 'khol lo// des srid pa bde 'gro ma dang/ nyi zla thod phreng ma gnyis 'khol lo// des khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi 'dul
lo// des dgyes sde mo bzhi 'dul lo// des sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi 'dul lo// des srid pa chags byed dang cha snyoms ma gnyis 'dul lo// des e ka tsa ti spun drug 'dul lo// des ma bdun 'dul lo// des

'dod khams lha yi gtso mo ni mtshan 'dul lo// des rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma spun 'dul lo// des dmag gi rgyal mo spun bzhi 'dul lo// de ltar gang 'khrug na yang tha ma nas rim bzhin te/ gtso mo bcos

na kun kyang bde/ ma mo lnga bcu rtsa lnga so so'i dbang tshad do// sems las skyes pa'i ma mo bcu gsum gyis bsnan pa dang/ drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs zhes bya'o// ma mo so so'i dbang tshad kyi rim
pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// bcu bzhi zhes ni bgyi ba yi// rabs rgyud rtsa ba ji ltar lags// dgug dang 'dren pa'i sngags rnams ni// rnal 'byor mchog
la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rnal 'byor mchog gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi gtso// bcu bzhi man chad rje 'khol gyi// rabs rgyud 'gugs 'dren sngags

rnams kun// gtan tshigs rtsa ba sbas pa rnams// da lta nyid du gtan la dbab// de la ri rab gling bzhi gong du chags pas rang lugs su yod pa zad/ nyi ma dgu brgya rtsa gcig dang/ zla ba brgya rtsa gcig dang/

nyi zla stong rtsa gnyis kyis ri rab kyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i snang srid thams cad tshig nas/ ci yang mi gnas pa las/ ri rab kyi nang ring thung du dpag bsam gyi shing yongs 'du+u sa brtol zhes kyang bya ba yod

pa las/ shing gi rtse mo ri rab kyi bum pa'i nang na/ yum chen mo srid pa bde 'gro ma/ khams gsum yum mchog ma zhes bya ba sku mdog mthing gar bzhugs pa/ dbu dang/ phyag dang/ spyan cir yang ston pa/ rin

po che sna tshogs kyi ral pa can/ sbas pa'i spyan gnyis las/ g.yas pa nas khrag gi mchi ma/ g.yon na bdud rtsi'i mchil ma/ sbas pa'i zhal nas/ 'bras bu rnam pa lnga'i bcud 'dzag ma/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis

la/ g.yas pas srid pa thams cad kyi rtse gzung ba/ g.yon pas 'og gi rdo rje'i gdan la thug pa yan chad gzung ba'o// sbas pa'i zhabs gnyis kyis/ g.yas pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang che ba thams cad

kyi snying brdzis pa/ g.yon pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang che ba thams cad kyi snying rtsa gnon pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' ge sar gyi dkyil 'khor nas snang srid thams cad 'phel 'grib mdzad pa/ ye shes rang
snang shar ba las/ ma rtogs pa kun mkha' gting du bsdus pa/ spyi gtsug nas khrag gi ral pa gcig gis/ srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud ma/ ri rab kyi rtse mo bum pa'i dbus na bzhugs so// de'i

'khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang cha snyoms ma gnyis shing gi sked pa na gnas so// yum chen mo'i khol mo srid pa zhig 'dzin dang/ srid pa byan mkhan gnyis ni shing gi rtsa ba na gnas te/ ri rab kyi phyi rol na

gnas pa'i snang zhing srid pa'i skye 'gro thams cad tshigs nas ci yang mi snang ba las/ srid pa bde 'gro mas nyi zla dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir/ 'byung ba lnga'i 'od las byung ba'i bu mo mdog dkar mo lag g.yu'i ral
pa can/ dpral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum gcig yod pa/ lcags dang zangs kyi mkhar nag la snying brgyus pa'i zhags pa 'phen pa can cig skyed pas/ des nyi zla stong thod dang phreng bar

bcings nas/ nyi zla zung gcig btang ba las/ gdong srid pa cha snyoms so// de nas yum bde 'gro mas phyi rol gyi snang srid thams cad phyung ngo// de nas dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can de// nga nyid kyi ni gsang

bar bsdus// rab tu gsang zhing sbas pa yis// mu stegs kA la sha chen po bya ba/ ri rab 'og rgya mtsho'i gting nas gnas pa des mthong ngo// byi ba'i lo la yid kyis sbyor ba gcig byas pa las/ glang gi lo la bu
mo spun bzhi skyes pa dang/ khol mo srid pa cha snyoms gyis lte ba gcad do// bu mo de bzhi'i ming ma yis btags so// dbyings phyug ma dang/ rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang/ bdag nyid ma dang/ gcig bu ma bzhir

btags so// de yang ming ches nas de bzhis srid pa phung ba dang 'dra bar lan gcig byas so// de nas nga nyid kyis ni ye shes kyis ye shes kyi sprul pa bkye nas su/ 'jig rten phung byed bzhi'i mngal la sogs

pa dbang du bsdus/ hUM las sprul pa'i bu mo bzhi// de bzhin la ni bskyed byas te/ de bzhi'i ma srid pa chags byed mas byas so// ming phyi mo dang mas btags so// rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje

pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che dang/ rdo rje khams gsum 'tsho byed khros pa'i dbang mo che dang// de ltar bzhir btags so// ming de legs nas/ bu mo
de bzhis ma bzhi dbang du bsdus so// des srid pa bde la bkod do// sprul pa'i bu mo bzhi dang/ rigs kyi 'byung ba bzhi po ru/ dpag bsam gyi shing gi yal ga la/ 'brug gi lo la rtsed 'jo byas pas/ mu
stegs kA ma las tshor nas su sdig can dmod pa'i mtshon chas ni/ mdza' na sdug pa khyed cag rnams// nal bu lto ru zhugs nas su// ngo tsha bu yang sbed par shog/ ces dmod mo dmos pa las/ dmod mo

sdigs te/ sbrul gyi lo la bu mo spun bzhi skyes pa la 'khol mo srid pa chags byed kyis lte ba bcad do// de nas ma bzhi ngo tsha nas/ ri rab ngos bzhir bskungs te bzhag pa las/ rta'i lo la blta yis mi pra
ba'i bud med bzhi rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha mtshan dang ldan pa zhig gda'/ de spyod dpal chen mo'i spyan gyis gzigs nas/ thugs kyi dgyes sde mo gsang ba'i byi mo bzhir gzung ngo// dkar mo mig gcig
rgyas 'debs mo dang/ nag mo ral chen rmongs byed ma dang/ dmar mo dbang bsgyur za byed ma/ ser mo 'tshal 'phel ma zhes thugs las ming dang mtshan du btags so// ma mo bcu bzhi'i rabs rgyud kyi
le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de rnams kyi 'khol mo srid pa chags byed ma dang/ khol po srid pa zhig 'dzin gnyis kyi lo dpyid zla ra ba la khyo shug tu 'dus pa

las/ phag gi lo dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la bu khye'u gcig skyes te/ jo mo nyi zla'i thod phreng can gyis// skos rje drang dkar du ming btags te/ blon por bskos so// de nas skos rje drang dkar dang/ srid pa cha

snyoms sru mtshan gnyis khyo shug tu 'dus te/ srid pa cha bsnyoms so// de gnyis la bu mo spun drug skyes te/ bzh-i ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'i blon po rgyal po bzhi'i chung mar blangs so// jo mos ri rab kyi

gra 'degs su bcug ste/ gru 'degs mchen mo bzhir ming btags so// bu mo chung ngu ma gnyis la/ gcig ni srid pa byin mkhan gyi chung mar blangs so// jo mo nyi zla thod phreng can gyis he ru ka snir ming btags

so// srid pa'i byan byed du bcug go/ de'i nu mo tha chung e ka tsa ti ni dbyings phyug ma spun bzhi'i 'khor na gnas so// de nas rgyal mo chen po bzhi las/ bu mo spun bzhi skyes te/ dkar mo mche ba can dang/ nag

mo kha rlan ma dang/ dmar mo mchu 'jib ma dang/ ser mo rkang ldag ma bzhi skyes te/ de bzhi ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo spun bzhi'i 'khol mor thob ste/ dmag gi rgyal mor bskos so// de nas khros pa'i dbang mo

che bzhi'i khol mo e ka tsa ti shugs kyi blon po lha chen po bdun gyi chung ma srin mo bdun po de/ 'jig rten du rab tu gnod pa las/ yum chen mo'i thugs kyi sprul pa las/ dbyings las shar ba'i ma mo gsum
dang/ mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo gsum dang/ gsang ba 'dus pa'i ma mo gcig ste/ thugs kyi sprul pa'i ma mo bdun gyis/ sring mo bdun btul lo// de nas gtso mo bzhi las rgyan gyi rgyal mo spun bzhi bya ba

mang gis nas/ bu mos ma'i bkrag dang gzi mdangs phrogs te/ dbang yang med/ mthu yang chung ba las/ zhe ngan sha stag byed do// de nas rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang/ khol po phya ya bdud dang gnyis byi ba'i lo la byi

bgyis pa'i bu/ glang gi lo la yar la shod kyi skyes to re dang/ 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo ming sring gnyis skyes so// 'dis 'byung ba'i nad gtong ba'o// de nas yang yar la shod kyi skyes to re dang/ jo mo na yang

jo mo/ sru mo na yang sru mo/ bdag nyid ma zhes bya ba gnyis/ shing na phyi sa la'i rtse mor/ rta'i lo la tshes bco lnga la mdza' na brgyugs/ nang par so sor gyes pa las/ sru mo'i rting pa la khrag thigs gcig 'dug

pa mthong ste/ mi gtsang ba'i sems skyes te mchil ma gcig bsgyur ba las khrag dang mchil ma 'dres pa'i bu ming sring gnyis mtshe'u mar skyes te lug gi lo tshes bcu+u bzhi la gnam gyi lha dkar po skyes/ tshes bco
lnga las bdag pad+ma phreng skyes so// de yang dbyings phyug ma dang yar la shed kyis skyes to re gnyis spre'u'i lo la byi bgyis pa'i bu/ bya yi lo la ming sring gnyis skyes te/ ming po shar gyi shel

ging shel ge sring mo gar gyi dbang phyug ma yin no// de nas ya bdud dang e ka tsa ti gnyis la bu mo spun gnyis skyes te/ che ba ni rin chen srid 'degs ma zhes kyang bya/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo zhes kyang bya/ chung ngu

ni gling bzhi spyi phud ma zhes kyang bya/ 'jig rten dbang sdud ma'o// srid pa cha snyoms ma ni/ he ru kas snir zhes bya ste/ srid pa chags byed ma ni lha mo tshogs kyi rje mo zhes bya'o// e ka tsa ti ni mi yongs kyi tshogs

kyi bdag mo zhes bya'o// gru 'degs ma chen mo bzhi ni har ting dkar mo dang/ dun ting nag mo dang/ shan ting dmar mo dang/ grub ting ser mo dang bzhi'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor chen po brgyad la/ yum srid

pa bde 'gro ma ni/ yongs su rdzogs pa'i grub ldan ma mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// dkar mo nyi zla'i thod phreng can ni/ thod phreng gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni/ snying rje
byams pa'i maN+Dal lo// dkar mo mig gcig ma la sogs pa bzhi ni/ gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dbyings phyug ma bzhi ni phung byed sbas pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang rnam pa gcig tu yum chen mo

dang/ dkar mo nyi zla'i thod phreng can gnyis ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'jig rten kun gyi dkyil 'khor te/ spyi dpal chen po dang gnyis su med do/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi ni/ 'gro ba yongs su skyong ba'i

dkyil 'khor te/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang 'dra'o// thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi ni// ge sar yongs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsang ba'i drod chags 'dzin gyi bdag mo yin no// de rnams kyi khol mo'i tshogs brgyad

ni/ srid pa chags byed ma ni chags 'dzin chen mo'i tshogs so// srid pa cha snyoms ma ni// mnyam byed chen mo'i tshogs so// srid pa gru 'degs ma ni gling bzhi phud nyul ma'i tshogs so// e ka tsa ti ni pho nya kun

gyi tshogs so// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi ni dri sa la sogs pa'i rigs so so'i tshogs so// 'dod khams lha'i gtso mo ni/ bud med nag mo'i tshogs so// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma

gnyis ni/ nyul le ma'i tshogs so// rin chen srid 'degs ma dang/ gling bzhi spyi phud ma ni sman phran gtso mo'i tshogs so// de la e ka tsa ti'i nu mo e ka dza ras bsams nas/ jo mo kun gyi nang na yang bdag gi

jo mo khyad par yang dbang chung la/ bdag cag khol mo rnams kyi nang na yang bdag khud [\[]khyad [\]]par dbang chung bas/ da ngan thabs zhig bya snyam nas/ jo mo gcig pu mas byi sna byas nas/ rgya mtsho'i gting na chu

srin gyi rgyal po kum+b+hi ra ma hA haste zhes kyang bya/ ma ka ra zhes kyang bya ba cig bkug nas/ dug shing gdug pa can drungs pa gcig gi rtsa ru/ stag gi lo la nyal po byed du bcug pa'i bu ni/ yos bu'i lo

la dkar po mig gcig skyes/ sring mo ni nag mo khrag 'dzag ma skyes te nad gtong ba'o// de nas ming pos ma'i gzi mdangs phrog nas/ 'jig rten yongs kyi mthu rku bar bdog pa la/ sru mo e ka tsa tis tshor te/

jo mo khros pa'i dbang mo che rnams la zhus nas/ rje 'bangs lngas bsgral ba las/ mi gcig gi khong pa'i nang nas tsit+ta bcu phyung ba las/ gcig ni snying gi bdag po la phul lo// dgu la gsum ni rgyal the'u khro bo
dang/ tri shang ka ra dang/ dkar thor thor dang gsum ste/ rgyal po'i rigs la gnod do// gsum la bar the'u smug po dang/ legs the'u khra bo dang/ sa the'u nag po dang gsum ni mi yongs la gnod do// gsum

la phyogs bcur gyur te/ brag srin dang/ chu srin dang/ shing srin gsum du gyur to// dgu ka'i rkang pa ya re bcag nas/ gnam khyi dkar po'i 'khol du bcug go/ de nas 'brug gi lo la e ka tsa ra ma mngal mi

bde nas/ mnyes btsir ba dang/ gdong sog po la mig long ba/ lus kyang spyang ki la khog pa na snying gsum yod pa gcig skyes pa las// 'di su la'ang cha med do snyam nas// dgra'i snying 'byin byams kyi lan

ldon par 'ong ste/ su yang cha med pas rung ngo snyam nas/ dga' zhir mgu ba las/ jo mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can gyi tshor nas/ snying gnyis khar bcug nas/ shel ge la khol por byin te btang ngo// pho rgyud mo rgyud
kyi gtan tshigs kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa/ 'gugs shing 'dren par byed pa ni// ma mo rnams kyi gsang sngags te// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan
'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i las rnams kun// yang dag nyid du ngas bstan gyi// g.yung

drung lha yi dbang po thud// oM badzra kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+ma hUM hUM hUM/ oM badzra shAn ting pad+ma ga ru ting b+h+yo/ oM mu trI ni b+h+yo// a shan+ti ni b+h+yo/ b+ha ga dun+ti ni b+h+yo/ kha mun dan+t+ri ni b+h+yo/ oM badzra sur+ya bi

to a to ye/ oM badzra pad+ma bi to a to ye/ oM badzra kha rag bi to a to ye/ oM badzra sring 'gro bi to a to ye/ oM badzra a keM a keM b+h+yo/ oM badzra ta keM ta keM b+h+yo/ oM badzra nI la nI la b+h+yo/ oM badzra lan+ta lan+ta b+h+yo/ oM badzra dza traM mu raM shwa badzra kha rag snying kha

rag ma b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha trag rak+sha b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha kha mun tra saM kha mun tra ba rak+sha b+h+yo/ pra ka rA ti Sha b+h+yo/ pra gi beng gi sha b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM ka ro ka re saM/ ba rod d+ha rod/ ni la chu mi ha/ kha T+wAM ga/ da la tsa la/ pad ma tsan+d+ha/ a

nu rak+to/ ma nu rag to/ ding saM ding saM/ e a ral+li/ bu byi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha trag rak+sha b+h+yo/ a ting b+h+yo/ byi ting b+h+yo/ su ting b+h+yo/ mu ting b+h+yo/ badzra shAn+tiM b+h+yo/ dun+ting b+h+yo/ har ting b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/

te baM yang b+h+yo/ a ga ta la b+h+yo/ d+ha la du na b+h+yo/ d+hi na yang/ di la ma ma ya b+h+yo/ d+hi rnams las la yang/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// 'dis ni ma mo
'gugs 'dren 'gyur// de skad dpa' bos yang dag bshad// ma mo 'gugs 'dren dang thun sngags kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten 'di bsgrub ji ltar
bskul// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di rnams kun// bsnyen bsgrub bgyi na ji ltar bgyi// mngon sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal

pa// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams kun// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// hUM/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ma// phra men rgya mtsho sku bskyod

cig/ rnal 'byor chen mo'i sku sprul pa// spyan gnyis khros pa'i tshul mnga' zhing// zhi ba'i sku la snang srid 'char// sprul pa'i sku la zhabs brgyad 'char// drug gis rgyu drug sgom yang gcod// gcig gi klu yi
khams su rkyong// gcig ni bdud dang mu stegs gnon// rnam par shes pa'i yul drug las// spyan drug mngon par shar ba ni// spyan gsum gyen du gzigs pa yis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo yang gcod// sems
can skye shi'i lam yang ston// spyan gsum thur du gzigs pa yis/ srid pa thams cad thal bar rlog/ de las slar yang skyed par byed// g.yas kyi zhal bzhad thugs rje che// g.yon gyi zhal bzhad dbang du
sdud// dbus kyi zhal bzhad drag shul che// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa yis// srid gsum 'gran zla chem chem gsol// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i b+ha ga las// srid pa gsum yang 'char bar byed// lha chen la sogs
mtha' dbus phyogs// bdud dang gnod sbyin la sogs te// gshin rje srin po ma lus kun// yum gyi sku yi las phyogs su// las kyi ma mo bcu drug 'char// pho nya phyag brnyan thabs kyis 'gyed// g.yon gyi
phyogs nas 'char ba ni// rnal 'byor sku yi sum cha las// nges pa'i ma mo dgu sbas shing// thams cad sku la mchod par brtson// yum gyi zhabs kyi g.yas phyogs nas// 'dod pa'i ma mo brgyad mnan

te// 'jig rten kun la sman par mdzad// yum gyi zhabs kyi g.yon phyogs nas// bka' sdod nyi shu rtsa brgyad rnams// rnal 'byor kun gyi las rnams sgrub// srid pa'i ma mo thams cad kun// rnal 'byor sku yi
khyon du rdzogs// ma mo thugs kyi thig le las// rdo rje kha T+wAM gzhu bdungs shing// shes rab ye shes mde'u rtse las// sprul pa'i thig le dgu 'phen ma/ nges pa'i bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// he ru hUM

sgras 'khor du bzhag/ mthing na 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad sgrol zhing dbang du sdud// zhi ba'i sku+u la thugs rje che// ye shes sprul pa'i phyag drug las// g.yas kyi dang po 'khor lo bsgyur// gsang
sngags bka' rnams sgrogs pa'i don// g.yon pa rin chen srid pa sgyur// srid pa'i 'jig rten gnas la 'phen// g.yas kyi bar ma g.yang bzhi rdeb// bdud dang mu stegs rdul du rlog/ g.yon pa b+han+d+ha dmar
bskyil zhing// bud med lnga po dbang du sdud// g.yas kyi tha ma tshe 'dzin cing// rnal 'byor kun la dngos grub 'bebs/ g.yon pa lcags kyu dgu bsnams pas// dam nyams kun dang dgra bgegs kyi// bka'
las 'das pa'i snying rtsa 'dren// spyi gtsugs ral pa'i 'phro 'du yis// stong gsum 'jig rten b+h+yo bzlog mdzad// bdag cag ye shes bstsal 'chang zhing// nges pa'i don dang rtogs pa'i mthus// man
ngag thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bskul// skad cig yud tsam dbyings nas bzhengs// srid pa gsum dang gling bzhi yang// thang gcig yud tsam 'jig par mdzad/ khyad par ye shes nyi zla'i spyan// g.yas kyi spyan

gyis srid pa gsal// g.yon gyi spyan gyis sbyor ba mdzad// rdo rje smin ma g.yengs pa yis// mu stegs yag sha'i snying yang 'gems// ma mo khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// byang chub sems ma zhes kyang grags// yang dag

gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo lags// bde klong kun gyi gtso mo zhes kyang grags// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// gsang ba thabs kyi 'phro 'du yi// yum gyi thugs dam

'dis bskang la// sku ni mi bskyaud 'dir bzhugs la// 'khor gyi blon mo kun bskyod dang// bcol pa'i las rnams 'grub par mdzod// ces tshogs la spyan drang ba ni/ phra men rgya mtsho ma'o// gsang ba'i mchod

pa dang ldan par bya ste bskul ba ni// hUM/ lha mo chen mo rnal 'byor ma// kun gzhi yongs kyi dbang phyug mo// snang srid kun la dbang bsgyur zhing// skye 'gro yongs kyi dbugs 'phrog ma// dung chen phyag na

bsnams shing 'o dod chen pos 'debs// gshin rje dran du 'khol zhing 'jig rten me yis sreg/ 'gro ba'i tshe dpal 'phrog cing bo d+hi tsit+ta'i bdag/ sgrol ba don du gnyer zhing dbang phyug kun dang sbyor// srid
gsum sprul pas 'gengs shing bdud dpung rdul du rlogs// g.yang gzhi gos su mnabs shing kha T+wA~M g.yab mos 'debs// sku mdog khro bor bzhugs shing khrag dang zhag gis brgyan// spu gri phyag na bsnams
shing kun gyi snying 'byin ma// zhing chen gdan la bzhugs shing rnal 'byor grogs mdzad ma// mAM sa zas su za zhing tsit+ta'i zhags pa 'phen// nyi zla thod du bcings shing stong khams bde la

'god// bdud kyi bu smad 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che// dung chen snod du dmar chen khrag dang snying du bsres pa 'dis/ khyod kyi sku la bstim pas bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// ces bya bas bskul

ba ni nyi ma'i thod phreng can no// rgyu bsgral ba tsit+ta'i bdag mo yin no// de kun gyi snying la yang dbang ngo// hUM/ rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// nyi ma stong gi gzi mdangs can// stong gsum 'chi bdag 'od

zer 'phro// srid pa'i sgrol ma gshegs su gsol// hUM/ rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// pad+ma stong gis sku brgyan cing// ge sar 'bum gyi khrag 'thung ma// dbang phyug chen mo gshegs su gsol// hUM/ rnal

'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che/ khams gsum rdzogs byed bdud rtsi sbyor// 'jig rten sman mchog kun gyi gsos// bdud rtsi'i rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// hUM/ rnal 'byor khros pa'i dbang mo che// b+ha ga yongs
la mnga' mdzad cing// gnas lam thams cad stongs par mdzad// thar pa'i lam mchog gshegs su gsol// zhes brjod la/ 'byor tshogs kyi mchod pa 'bul ba ni/ khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi'o// b+ha ga
'bum la mnga' mdzad ma// dbyings phyug rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten yongs kyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// bdag nyid lhag lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo
gshegs su gsol// gcig pu stong khams rgyug 'gro ma// gcig pu yum mchog gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul ba ni sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi'o// hUM// ri rab gling bzhi'i shar phyogs ma// shar gyi dkar mo mig
gcig ma// na bza' bya rgod thul ba la// g.yu yi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// dung gi len tshar mche ba can// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can// dkar mo sgeg mo 'bum gyi bskor// srid pa shar la mnga'

mdzad ma// 'dir spyon dam skyong phrin las mdzod// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs nas// lho yi nag mo mche ba can// na bza' zhing gi go zu la// gser gyi dril bu 'bum gyis brgyan// lcags kyi len tsher
mche ba can// gser g.yu spel ba'i thod gdengs can// nag mo sgeg mo 'bum gyis bskor// srid pa lho la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir spyod dam skong phrin las mdzod// hUM/ ri rab gling bzh-i nub phyogs
nas// nub gyi dmar mo dbang bsgyur ma// na bza' chu srin g.yang gzhi la// sbrul nag stong gi gdengs ka can// g.yu yi len tshar mche ba can// bye ru dmar po'i thod gdengs can// dmar mo sgeg ma 'bum
gyis bskor// srid pa nub la mnga' mdzad ma// 'dir spyon dam skong phrin las mdzod// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs nas// byang gi ser mo las mkhan mo// na bza' rma bya'i thul ba

la// mthing gi go cog ya ba bskor// gser gyi len tshar mche ba can// thod skam 'bar ba'i thod gdengs can// ljang nag sgeg ma 'bum gyis bskor// 'dir spyon dam skong phrin las mdzod// gling bzhi'i rgyal
mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thu+u ba g.yas pa dmag gis bkang// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgra 'dul ma// thu ba g.yon pa rin po che// sgrub pa po la rtags 'byin ma// g.yas kyi phyag na g.yang gzhi rdebs/ khams

gsum rdul du brlags nas su// g.yon pa b+han+d+ha thod pas bskor// ma mo thams cad dbang du sdud// ral pa can gyi 'khor skyong ma// 'dir spyon dam skong phrin las mdzod// ces 'byor tshogs gyi mchod pa spyan
drang ba dang/ bka' bzhin gnag pa bcol ba ni/ thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi dang/ gsang ba yang byi mo bzhi'o// 'di bzhi la bcol ba dang/ ci bcol ba bsam pa yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur// lhur yang

tshe dang sri'u la mkhas shing/ gsang ba'i pra la yang rno// de yan chad kyis ma mo bcu bzhi'i bskul tshig gi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// da ni srid pa'i sman mo bskul bar bya ste/ hUM/ srin mo chen mo sham sham

mo// a phyi chen mo mi bzad ma// gos su zhing chen lpags rlon la// mtha' ma b+han+d+ha stong gis bskor// phyag g.yas zhing chen sor phreng bgrang// g.yon na mi mgo'i phor pa ru// mi khrag snying tshil gtubs nas

su// rang gis rang la thim par stob// g.yang gzhi'i ru mtshon phyar nas su// bdud dang mu stegs thal bar rlogs// 'jig rten thams cad sgrol bar byed// srid pa gsum gyis phud nyul ma// de ni jo mo nyid la

mchod// las su bcol na kun kyang sgrub// 'dir spyon dam skong phrin las mdzod// ces bskul ba ni a phyi chen mo ste// srid pa chags byed ma'o// hUM/ khyim bdag chen mo rnal 'byor mo// rnal 'byor chen mo

srid pa'i bdag/ rnal 'byor chen mo khyim bdag mo/ khyim bdag chen mo thig le dgu/ ye shes lnga yi rol pa yis// phyag na rtse gsum 'bar ba bsnams/ khrag 'thung yab yum rnams la dbang sgyur zhing// mthu

chen rnal 'byor kun gyi grogs mdzad ma// dung chen khrag 'di sku la stim par mdzod/ khyed kyi 'khor 'di rab tu mi bsgrungs te// sgra snyan yid 'phrog ma mo khyod kyi 'khor// 'dod pa lnga la 'dod cing rab tu

bskul/ khrag gis rlan pa mdzad cing dbang du sdud// drag shul gtum mo rab tu rmongs byed ma// kun gyi yid la 'dod cing rab tu mthu chen bskul// me yi bskal pa gtong zhing snying rje'i lam la sgrol// gsod

pa don du gnyer zhing khro bo kun dang sbyor// bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag shul che// 'o dod chen po 'don zhing zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs// dgra snying tshal par 'gems shing ma mo khyod
kyi mthu// dam tshig dus la bab kyi gshegs su gsol// zhes las gnyan po bcol// de ni sbas pa'i ma mo ste/ srid pa cha snyoms so// hUM/ rnal 'byor chen mo srid pa'i bdag/ e ka tsa ti ral gcig ma// mig

gcig ma la dkar sham mdog/ rang chas sprin dkar go zu la// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i mtha' chag can// lag na kha T+wA~M ga yi mtshon thogs shing// za 'og zhabs ma'i dbu rgyan can// bstan pa tsam gyis khams

gsum rmongs byed ma// brdabs pa tsam gyis the rang 'gong po brlag gcod ma// dam skong phrin las gnyan po mdzod// ces bcol ba ni e ka tsa ti'o// da ni ma mo bdun bskul te// hUM/ rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil
'khor nas// dpal ldan shugs 'gro gtso mo ste// nag mo chen mo ral pa can// ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stabs can/ kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho skam// rdo rje kun bzang gshegs su gsol/ hUM/ khro bo rngam
pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis 'od 'phro zhing// 'jig rten 'chi bdag 'od 'phro ma// kun tu bzang mo gshegs su gsol// hUM/ 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// nam mkha' stong la
dbang bsgyur zhing// bdud dang drag snyems kun 'dul ma// rdo rje kun gsal gshegs su gsol// hUM/ dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// pho nya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// sha chen tshogs la longs spyod

cing// gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul ma// rdo rje chen mo ye shes mchog/ dam tshig chen mo gshegs su gsol// hUM/ khrag gi rgyal mtsho'i dkyil 'khor nas/ khro mo gtum chen za byed ma// rdo rje dra ba'i phreng thogs
ma// byang phyogs rang gi 'khor 'dul ma// rdo rje 'od chags gshegs su gsol// hUM/ 'od phung 'khrigs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhags pa stong gi gdengs ldan zhing// 'byung po ma lus 'ching mdzad ma// rdo
rje gsal 'phro gshegs su gsol// hUM/ dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas// lcags kyu 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du can// dam tshig nyams rnams sreg mdzad ma// bka' las 'das pa'i snying 'byin ma// rdo rje
g.yu sgron gshegs su gsol// zhes bya ba ni ma mo bdun no// hUM/ lha mo chen mo dbang phyug ma// rin chen srid 'degs mdzes pa'i za ma tog/ mdog bzang sngon mo ral pa can// rang chas mu tig go zu

la// gser dang g.yu yi phra bkye zhing// tha ma rin chen 'bar bas bskor// g.yas na g.yu yi za ma tog/ g.yon na dung gi zo ba thogs/ khyod ni srid pa'i ma mo ste// tshe g.yang sdud cing rin chen srid 'degs
ma// hUM/ grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma ste mthu mo che// bdud kyi sring mo gshin rje mo// mdog bzang dkar la ral pa can// ral pa'i zar bus mun nag gtibs// lcags kyi lus la zangasakyi 'dab

ma can// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dang ldan// lags pa g.yas na gshin rje'i khrab bam thogs// g.yon na bdud kyi sho rde dkar nag 'grems// mchan na nad kyi rkyal pa sbed/ khyod ni 'jig rten b+h+yo bzlog

mkhan/ khram kha phyis la shwo rde spos// nad kha chings la dal kha sgyur// hUM/ rnal 'byor 'jig rten dbang phyug ma// mdog bzang dkar mo ral pa can/ khyed ni gling bzhi spyi 'gro ma// rang chas dar dkar go

zu+u la// g.yu bran 'bar ba'i mtha' chag can// gser gyi gong lag 'bar ba la// g.yu yi cod pan 'od 'phro ma// rdzu 'phrul rkang pas phyogs bcur 'phrin// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// gser gyi lcu gu
'bar ba la// g.yu yi lcag 'bras 'gyur ba btags// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung 'joms// sa la brdab pas dgra bgegs sgrol// gzhan gyis rbad kyang mi nyan par// bcol ba'i phrin las grub par

mdzod// zhes bya ba ni/ nang gi rdzas lnga dang ldan par byas la/ las bcol ba ni/ nam mkha'i rgyal mo ne mtshan no// hU~M/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// dbu brgya ma la spyan stong ma// 'jig tshul rngams pa'i cha byad

can// phrin las 'byung po kun 'dul ma// rdo rje sgeg mo gshegs su gsol// hUM/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sa bdag chen mo pad+ma phreng// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// grong rnams kun la thor byed

ma// sa bdag chen mo gshegs su gsol// zhes brjod pa ni/ rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma dang/ pad+ma'i gar mkhan ma'o// da ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chung ma dang/ bu mo bzhi yang bskur bar bya ste// hUM/ ri rab
bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// har ting dkar mo chen mo la// byang shar mtshams kyis gru 'degs ma// dun ting nag mo chen mo la// shar lho'i mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// shan ting dmar mo chen mo la// lho nub
mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// grub ting ser mo ljang ser ma// nub byang mtshams kyi gru 'degs ma// mtshams kyi gru 'degs chen mo la// rgyal chen gzungs ma las mdzod cig/ hUM/ dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo
ste// shar gyi dkar mo mche ba gtsigs// lho yi nag mo kha rlan nam// nub gyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// rig bzhi'i dmag dpung mang pos bskor// dmag gi rgyal mo gshegs su
gsol// hUM/ gling bzhi'i mgyogs ma lha yi sring// shar gyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring// lho yi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi
sring// nub gyi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring// byang gi mgyogs ma gshegs su gsol// zhes bya ba ni las kyi sring mo bzhi'o// 'di man chad ma mo rnams kyi

las byang dang/ bskul tshig gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten dbang chen ji snyed kun// srid pa'i mi la sman slad du// tshul bzhin bsgrub na ji ltar bgyi// rdzas

dang mthun rdzas ji ltar brten// rtags dang dus tshig ji ltar 'byung// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// dben la gnyan

zhing nyams dga' ba'i// pad+ma'i mtshan dang ldan pa yi// rigs su gyur pa'i yum gsum yang// sgrub pa'i don phyir gzhag par bya// rdzas su gyur pa'i yo byad kyang// thig le me mar kha dgu btang// tsit+ta bcu

gcig yang dag ldan// b+han+d+ha lcang lor ldan pa ni// pad+ma'i rigs su gyur pa yi// mtshan dang ldan pa'i rak+tas bkang// gsur chen dud pa rgyun mi gcad// gsar rnying zhing gi mchod pa dgram// ci 'byor yo byad
gsum sogs la// bdun gsum tshul bzhin bsgral bar bya// rgyan dang chas gos la sogs pa// shun chen ral ga gtso bo la// srid pa'i spyi blugs zhwa bgos te// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i phyag rgya bsnams// phreng
ba chen po de bzhin bgrang// yum yang g.yang gzhi'i slag pa la// rtse gsum 'bar ba'i g.yab mo thogs// phreng ba chen po gtso dang mthun// dngos grub zhal bu rin chen rigs// dar dkar kha bcad de bzhin

bzhag/ rdo rje rigs ldan rtags su gsol// bdag nyid man ngag he ru ka/ yum yang srid pa'i bde 'gro ma// gnyis su med par bsgom bya ste// rak+ta la ni srid pa yi// snying gi dkyil nas drang nas su/ mngon du
'ong bar bsam pa ni// mdog dkar mo la nyi ma dang/ zla ba 'bum gyi thod phreng byas/ dpral ba'i dbyes na mig zur gsum pa gcig yod pa/ sbas pa'i phyag gnyis kyi srid pa'i pad+ma thams cad gyi ge sar

bzung ba/ lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags la// snying brgyus pa'i zhags pa 'phen pa// mig gnyis nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi mchi ma mthor ba/ g.yu'i ral pa can la mchod pa gsol zhing brten dbyangs snyan

pos bskul ba ni// hUM/ che zhe chen mo gsang ba'i gzungs// thig le sbyor ba'i yum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi zla'i thod phreng can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i mig gcig la// g.yu yi ral pas srid pa sbyor// sbas pa'i

phyag gnyis chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mchi ma skye 'gro'i gsos// tsit+ta'i zhags pas mu stegs sgrol// thig le gsang ba'i yum gcig ma// sngon mchod sbyor mdzad ji bzhin du// bdag dang gnyis med
sbyor bya zhing// gsang ba'i gzungs su rab bya'o// zhes dam bcas la// grangs ni zhag bdun zla gcig bstung ngo// bcu bzhi na nyi ma gcig bstung ngo// nyi shu rtsa gcig na dngos grub kyi b+han+d+har

snying gtubs pa dang/ b+han+d+har rak+ta bsres pa gcig 'ong ngo// de min na gzhan yang rtag yang 'ong ngo// ci byung yang mtshan ma spang ngo// nyi shu rtsa gnyis na sku mngon du 'byon no// der ting 'dzin gsal bar byas

la/ ge sar gyi rak+ta dbang du bsdus te// sbyor ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ zla gam 'bul zhing sbyor ba'i tshul ston/ bdag chags pa ma skyes pa dang/ mos rkang dkris bor nas/ mdzes pa dang chas nas sbyor ba

'bul lo/ der mngon du sbyar te/ gsang ba'i byang chub sems des sna la bdag nyid la mchod pa bya/ de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mo la sbyin/ de nas tha tshig dang dam bsres te/ gsang ba'i gzung mar dam stsal

lo// de nas phra dog spang ba'i phyir/ sgrub zla gsum char sbyar nas su// sgrub zla so sor dam bsre'o// de yan chad ci yang bya mi dgos so// bsgrubs pa'i yon tan ni ma mo gzhan lta smos ci dgos te/ khros pa'i

dbang mo che bzhi dang/ he ru ka sni man chad 'dar lcug lcug sku bskyod pa tsam na rgyug nas 'ong ngo// 'jig rten 'dir bsam pa ni/ gces spras mi 'grub pa med do// 'di bsgrub pa'i dus su dang po gtor ma

rnam pa gsum btang ngo// bshags pa bya/ tshe rabs kyi lan chags kyi gtor ma gtang ngo// dam skong bgyi/ 'di nyi zla thod phreng can gyi sgrub thabs so// srid pa bde 'gro ma'i sgrub pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/
'gro ba'i don thugs rje'i 'od kyis mdzad do// bsgrub pa'i ma mo ma yin no// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su/ rigs bzhi'i yum dang ldan par bya ste/ yo byad bzhi yang de bzhin gsham/ gsar pa zhing gi mchod

pa yang bsham/ rigs bzhi b+han+d+ha yang dag ldan// zhing gi dud pa rgyun mi gcad// mchog gi phur pa bzhi yang 'dril// dung chen phreng ba yang dag bgrang// shun chen dbu rgyan de bzhin gsol// stag lpags g.yang

bzhi gos su mnabs// rgyu ma bsgril ba'i zhag bsdog la// chu dang ma bsres dwangs ma'i khrag/ dam rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rtse gsum g.yab mo thogs nas ni// bsgrub cing brten pa'i lha mo de// rdo rje nyi ma

khros pa'i dbang mo che// rdo rje rigs kyi ma mo ste// sku mdog dmar mo g.yu yi ral pa can// spyan gsum rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa// gsang ba'i mkha' shel gyi ga'ur 'khyil ba/ ma chags pa'i sbyor bas srid pa

'khyud pa/ phyag g.yas na rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams pa/ g.yon pas zhing gi g.yang gzhi'i g.yab mo bsnams shing/ bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud pa/ ma rgyan gyi rgyal mo la 'khros pa'i tshul ston pa/ sbyor ba'i
mdangs can no// rdo rje srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che ni// rin chen rigs kyi ma mo ste/ sku mdog sngon mo la// spyan gsum rin po che'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'od zer sngon po phyogs bcur

'phros pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' rin po che'i ga'ur 'khyil ba/ rgyu ma 'dril pa'i dril zhags 'phen pas// bdud dang mu stegs 'ching ba/ ma dbyings phyug ma la khros pa'i tshul ston pa/ sbyor ba'i mdangs can

no// rdo rje pad+ma khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ pad+ma rigs kyi bdag mo ste/ sku mdog dmar mo la// bse'i ral pa can// spyan gsum zhal gsum bye ru'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' la bye ru'i ga'ur

'khyil ba/ 'od zer dmar pos nub phyogs dbang du sdud pa'o/ khrag gi dwangs ma 'thor zhing bdud dang mu stegs kyi snying 'byin pa/ gnyis med sbyor bas srid pa 'khyud pa ma bdag nyid ma la khros pa'i tshul ston

pa/ sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// rdo rje khams gsum rdzogs byed khros pa'i dbang mo che ni/ las kyi rigs la dbang byed de/ sku mdog ljang gu la/ rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can/ spyan gsum rdo rje rgya gram gyi mche ba
gtsigs pa/ 'od zer ljang gus byang phyogs dbang du sdud pa/ lag pa g.yas pas g.yang gzhi rdebs shing bdud dang mu stegs kyi mgo gcod pa/ gsang ba'i mkha' gser gyi ga'ur 'khyil ba/ grub pa'i sbyor

bas khams gsum 'khyud pa/ ma gcig pu ma la khros pa'i tshul ston pa sbyor ba'i mdangs can no// spyod pa gsal zhing spyan drangs/ gnas nas 'byon par gsol zhing dbyangs snyan pos bskur ba ni/ hUM che zhe
khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo g.yu yi ral pa can// spyan gsum rdo rje mche ba gtsigs// zhing chen g.yab mos mu stegs sgrol// shel gyi ga'ur gnas ris 'cha'// gnyis med sbyor bas khams

gsum 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing srid pa'i gsos// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM che zhe khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo rin chen ral pa can/ spyan
gsum rin chen mche ba gtsigs// rgyu ma bsgril ba'i dril zhags kyis// bdud dang mu stegs thams cad 'ching// rin chen ga'ur gnas ris 'cha'// mi len sbyor bas 'jig rten 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs

kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing kun la byams// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// hUM/ che zhes khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dmar mo ser ral can// spyan gsum bye ru'i mche ba gtsigs/ khrag gi
dwangs mas bdud dpung sgrol// bye ru'i ga'ur gnas ris 'cha'// bdag med sbyor bas stong gsum 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing rnal 'byor skyong// bdag dang gnyis su med
