par sbyor// hUM/ che zhe khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ljang gu bsgyings pa la// rdo rje dril bu'i ral pa can// spyan gsum mche ba rgya gram gtams/ kha T+wA~M g.yab mos mu stegs sgrol// rdo rje ga'ur
gnas ris 'cha'// grub pa'i sbyor bas 'jig rten 'khyud// sbyor ba'i mdangs kyis kun la khyab// yum la khro zhing sems can skyong// bdag dang gnyis su med par sbyor// zhes pas bskul ba ni/ khros pa'i
dbang mo che bzhi ste/ drug pa la zhugs pa'i nub mo rgyu gcig bsgral/ zhag bdun na gcig bsgral/ zhag dgu na gcig bsgral/ bcu gsum na gcig bsgral/ gcig gi nub mo gsang ba'i yum du dam bca'/

gsum gyi nub mo sgra chen po 'byung zhing me chen po 'bar ro// bdun gyi nub mo nam mkha' la sna tshogs pa'i rol pas thibs se 'byung ngo// de lta bu dag byung ba dang/ bdag dpal chen po dbu dgu phyag bco

brgyad pa/ zhabs brgyad ma hA de wa brdzis pa phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs pa bsnams pa/ zhing gi na bza' rlon pa dang sbrul nag gi chun po dang/ thod pas brgyan pa gsal ba'i dbang gis ngang la bsnyen pa bya/
gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dbul// dgu la mngon du 'byung ba dang/ bdag nyid dpa' bo sgeg pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsal ba dang/ 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis pad+ma dbang du bsdus la/ de nas lha mo chags sems

kyis// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba dbul// gus pa'i tshig tu snyan sgrogs pa// dpa' bo chen po ye shes sku// rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor du// pad+ma gsang ba'i mchod 'bul gyis// dgyes pa chen po'i ngang nyid

kyis// chags pa chen por byin gyis sbyorlobs// de skad bstod de ra ba dbul// de nas bdag dang mngon sbyor la// drod kyis byang chub sems nyid dang// rak+ta'i dwangs ma bsres nas su// sna la bdag nyid gtso
la mchod// de nas sgrub zla bzhi la sbyin// kun dang dam tshig bsres nas kyang// mnas bsgag go/ de nas bsgrub pa'i ma mo la sbyin// de nas dam bsres mnas bsgags nas/ rtogs pa'i phrag dog spang ba'i
phyir// sgrub zla bzhi dang bdag sbyor te// kun dang dam bsres mnas bsgag go/ gtor ma gzhan ni gong ma bzhin// 'di 'grub na 'jig rten gyi bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub la/ lhur yang tshe ring

ba dang/ sri'u la mkhas so// ma mo 'go nas 'byung ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma bzhi yang bran mor 'khor lo// 'di ni khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi sgrub thabs so// 'di bzhi'i ma bzhi ni/ bsgrub tu skyon che

ste/ spyir bu mo bzhi bsgrub na/ bu mos ma 'khol bas/ bsgrubs lhag par mi dgos so// da ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo bzhi'i sgrub pa'i thabs 'byung ste/ rta'i lo tshes bdun la sgrub pa bsham brgyad la 'jug ste/
nya'i bar du bsgrubs/ bsgrub pa'i yo byad du 'tshal ba/ dkar mo mig gcig ma'i b+han+d+ha ni/ zlum la pad+ma chags pa/ 'jam po ri mo nyung ba ste/ gtsug tu bu gu 'byung ba ni/ dkar mo chen mo'i phyag

na bsnams// ljon ring lcang los rab tu brgyan// ljon shing lta bu'i rtse mo yod pa ni// nag mo chen mo'i phyag na bsnams// pad+ma 'dam brgyad rtsar bris la// a dkar gtsug na yod pa ni// dmar mo dbang sdud

phyag na bsnams// ljon shing dum bu gnyis 'dug pa/ rdo rje rgya gram rtsar 'dug pa// ser mo las mkhan phyag na bsnams// gtsug sbubs nang du rubs pa las// rtsa rnams gtsug tu bcing pa las// hUM chen dgu

ni 'bar ba ste// dpal chen nyid kyi phyag na bsnams// zhes 'byung ste/ b+han+d+ha de lnga yang dag ldan// shes rgyu+u bzhi yang yang dag bsogs// snyan po chas su stsal ba dang// gzhan yang dam rdzas sna tshogs pa// slag
pa chen po gtso bo la// zhwa dkar po yang dbur brgyan no// 'jig rten gzungs bzhi'i rigs bstan pa// sha mdog dkar la mdangs bzang ba// so thags bzang la mig dkyus ring// dkar mo mig gcig

tshul du snang// brtson 'grus can la drag shul che// ral pa can la ha ri mig/ nag mo ral can tshul du snang// sha mdog dkar la mdangs sdug pa// smras na snyan la 'gro na ldem// dmar mo dbang sdud tshul du

snang// zur bzhi ring la mche ba rno// sha mdog sngo la brtul zhugs che// ser mo las mkhan tshul du snang// yum bzhi gzungs su ldan byas te// yum bzhi bsnyen pa so sor bgrang// bdag nyid man ngag sems

ldan pas// bzhi char bsnyen pa gcig tu bgrang// bsnyen dbyangs snyan pas bskul ba ni// hUM/ shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// na bza' tshil chen go zu mnabs// b+han+d+ha rlon pa'i dril bus brgyan// lan phran
zhag gis 'khril ba la// dung gi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// shar gyi srid gsum phur 'debs ma// rin chen shel gyi thod gdengs can// zhag gi lan phran gsigs pa yis// steng du ya bdud gdul zhing

'ching// bar du brgya byin phung bar byed// 'og tu dmyal khams stongs par byed// ma g.yel thugs rje gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i lho phyogs na// ma mo chen mo mche ba can// na bza' zhi
lpags go zu la// b+han+d+ha dkar po'i dril bus brgyan// rdo rje lan phran rin chen 'khrol// lcags kyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// lho phyogs srid gsum phur 'debs ma// gser g.yu spel ba'i thod gdengs

can// dri chen lan phran gsigs pa yis// steng du ma hA de wa 'ching bar byed// bar tu gshin rje phung bar byed// 'og tu byol song stongs par byed// ma g.yel thig le gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM/ ri rab gling
bzhi'i nub phyogs na// dmar mo chen mo dbang bsgyur ma// na bza' rak+ta'i go zu la// sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chun 'phyang can// pad+ma rak+ta'i lan phran la// mche ba dmar po gtsigs pa yis// nub

phyogs srid gsum phur 'debs ma// mi khrag rlon pa'i thod gdengs can// rak+ta'i lan phran gsigs pa yis// steng du tshangs pa chen po 'ching// bar du 'chi bdag phung bar byed// 'og gi yi dwags stongs par

byed// ma g.yel thugs rje gsang ba'i gzungs// hU~M/ ri rab gling bzhi'i byang phyogs nas// ser mo chen mo las mkhan mo// mdzes pa'i na bza' chen po ni// mAM sa chen po'i thul pa can// dri chu khol ba'i ya

bas bskor// lan phran dri chu 'bar ba 'byung// gser gyi mche ba gtsigs pa yis// byang phyogs srid gsum phur 'debs ma// mAM sa spungs pa'i thod gdengs can// dri chu'i lan phran gtsigs pa yis// steng du
tshogs kyi bdag po 'ching// bar du gnod sbyin phung bar byed// 'og tu bgegs rigs stongs par byed// ma g.yel thugs rje gsang ba'i gzungs// hUM/ gling bzhi gsang ba'i gzungs gcig ma// bdud rtsi

rnam lnga dbu la rdzogs// g.yas na g.yang gzhi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnas phyag chen pos 'debs// mu stegs nag po'i snying 'byin ma// g.yon na b+han+d+ha khrag 'dzag pas// bud med thams cad dbang du

sdud// 'bum phrag yangs pa'i 'khor mnga' zhing/ sgrub pa po la brtse dgongs ma// 'dir spyon sgrub pa'i las mdzod cig/ ces bskul ba ni/ zhag bzhi'i nub mo dngos grub kyi rtags dang po rak+ta dang tshil chen

dang mchog tu gtubs pa'i brtag pa'i yang b+han+d+ha dang bzhi'o// dgu yi mtshan mo b+han+d+ha pad+ma rak+ta dang/ snang srid kyi sman sbyar ba'i byang chub sems la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga bsres pa gang ba 'ong ste/ dga' ba

mi skyed par myur du longs spyod dang/ de'i nub mo rgyu bzhi yang der bsgral lo// bdun gyi nub mo bzhi car yang sku mngon du 'byung ngo// rgyan dang cha lugs ldan pa/ shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i lha mo bzhi'o// bdag

man ngag gi ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgoms la/ chags pa'i mdangs phyung la/ ge sar gyi rak+ta dbang du bsdus la/ pad+ma'i nang du rdo rjai 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la/ rim pa bzhin du zla gam phyed cing sbyor ba

dbul lo// gong ma'i bsgrub pa'i lha mo bzhin du tshul de bzhin du bgyi/ de nas de'i phyi de nub mo mchog phran chas su stsal ba bsgral ba dang/ khams gsum bsgral ba'i dngos grub kyang ster ro// 'di bzhi 'go la

phrag dog chung la/ dbang che la gsang ba'i dam du rub ste/ bsam dgu yid bzhin du 'grub ste/ gsang ba'i dgyes sde mor lung bstsal te bzhag go/ de phan chad ci yang bya mi dgos te/ sbyor ba yang dus su
dbul te/ las kyang tshul bzhin du byed do// bsgrub pa la 'jug pa'i tshul ni gong ma dang 'dra'o// 'di ni thugs kyi dgyes sde mo gsang ba'i yang byi mo bzhi'i sgrub thabs so// 'di yan chad kyi ma mo

sgrub na/ tshe 'di'i yon tan lta ci smos/ phung po 'jig pa'i dus su yang glu dbyangs dang rol mo la sogs pa 'od dang rtags bzang po dang/ nam mkha' la sgra 'ong ba dang/ rol mo dang/ sil snyan la sogs pas
bsus nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su sgrub mi dgos par dkyil 'khor dang 'og min du skye ba'o// 'di yan chad kyis ma mo grub na/ ma mo 'og ma thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'du ba dang/ lhag par yang

sgrub mi dgos so// 'di ni ma mo'i gtso mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas ma mo bdun bsgrub par 'dod na/ gnas dur khrod du song la/ yum rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan dang ldan pa

gsum/ dbang gi slob dpon gnyis kyis bsgrub ste/ b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa bdun nam gsum du bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga ma bsgrubs pa'i rlon pa bstsal/ gsum du 'jig rten pa'i sman sna tshogs stsal/ gcig tu

byang chub sems dang rak+ta'i nyi tshe stsal/ b+han+d+ha rin po che mtshan ldan gyi nang du bdud rtsi a mr-i ta bstsal/ shel lding nag gsum/ shel dkar po gcig tsa ra nag po gcig ku ku ra tsa dkar po gcig nam mkha'
lding gcig mchog gi stod dam smad sbom pa gcig bcas chas gos thams cad nag por bsgyur te/ gsur chen gyi dud pa rgyun mi gcad par gtang ngo// 'dzab drangs pa dang/ zhag bdun sgra chen po zhig 'byung
ste/ der zung gcig bsgral te/ mchod pa bya/ ma'i tshul du bsten/ zhag dgu na mi sdug pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung ngo// der zung gcig bsgral la/ zhag bcu gcig na nyin mtshan 'gyur/ der zung gcig

bsgral te/ sring mo'i tshul du bsten/ zhag bco lnga na bdun car sku mngon du 'byung ngo// bdag cag dam tshig ma nyams na mdzes pa dang ldan par 'ong ngo// nyams na nag mo ral pa can bdun mi sdug pa gcig
byed pa la/ mche ba dmar tsa re ba 'dug par 'ong ngo// man ngag gsal na/ bdag nyid kyi dbang du bsdu/ mi gsal na bzod par gsol te/ bskang bar bya'o// bdag man ngag dang ldan na/ dang por mi sdug pa

las kyang sdug par ston no// dang po nas sdug na pad+ma dbang du bsdus la nga rgyal bskyed la sru mo'i tshul du bsten no// de ltar phyag 'tshal zhing dpon zer nas mi sdug mi byed do// de nas pad+ma rak+ta hUM gis bsdus

nas/ rgyan bor nas gsum gsum dang bcur byas nas/ mel tshe thun re la lan gnyis gnyis dbul lo// sna la gtso mo dang sbyor ro// de nas yo dang sbyor ba'i byang chub kyi sems nyi tshe 'dod pa bzhin du dam
bsre ste/ nga yi brnag pa'i las kun yang sgrubs shig par lung stsal lo// bran dang bran mo dang slas dang byi mo yin pas mna' ma za zhes lung stsal lo// de phyin chad bran bzhin du las byed do// da

ni sbas pa'i ma mo bsgrub par bya'o// yo byad gong ma kun gyi steng du zhing gi rgyu \u0f84zhags gcig srid pa spyi blugs kyi zhwa ral pa can/ dung che chung dang/ bye ru dang/ gser g.yus brgyan pa gcig zhing chen gyi rdzas
lnga thogs nas bsgrubs na/ rtags 'ong ba gong dang mthun/ sgrub thabs gong dang mthun/ yon tan ma bdun man chad 'khor lo/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ lhar yang dgra la rbad la bzang ngo// 'di ni e ka

tsa ti'i sgrub thabs so// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi gcig gi steng du gra phying gtsang ma gcig bting la/ dam rdzas sna tshogs pa'i gtor ma gcig gi nang du sman gi wang stsal te/ dar dmar po kha tshon gang gis
kha bcad de/ kha nub phyogs su bltas la/ zhab bdun du bsnyen pa bgyi/ yum ma chen dang ldan pa la dbab bo// dang po bskul ba ni/ hUM/ srid pa'i ma mo ma g.yel thugs dam can// skye 'gro ral gcig 'jig
rten sgrol// mig nas khrag 'bab stongs khams bsreg kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho gting nas skems// ma gcig byung ba'i dus mtha' nas// 'jig rten las kyis dbang bsgyur te// sems can don la rab tu

brtsam// snying rje byams pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brtse ba'i thugs kyis gshegs su gsol// zhes bskul lo// yum la phab ste dri na snang srid kyi gtam smra'o// da ni bu mo spun gnyis bsgrub par bya ste/ bskul ba
ni// hU~M/ ma mo chen mo g.yar dam can// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dpal mo btsan// gnam phyed gos su gyon pa mo// sa phyed gdan du gding ba'i bdag/ 'khor ni gnam sman 'bum gyis bskor// chibs su

gser gyi sha pho bcibs// mgo la g.yu yi rwa bcu 'bar// phyag na gser gyi dril bu bsnams// bdud dang mu stegs dbang du sdud// che zhe sring gcig ma g.yel cig/ da ni bu mo chung ngu bsgrub par bya ste/ hUM/ ma
mo ma g.yel g.yar dam can// dan ting gser g.yu'i go cog can// g.yu yi dril snyan 'bum gyis brgyan// chibs su dung sha dkar po bcibs/ khas blangs dam bcas bsnyel lam ci// bskul lo bzhengs
sam da tshur spyon// gser can lta bu de la brten// zhes bskul lo// 'di ni ma mo gser gyi bsgrub pa'o// gser ram g.yu brdar ba'i phud kyi bos nas brten na byes yul mdo gtsang gar 'gro yang bsam pa

yid bzhin du 'grub bo// rung te rung te hUM/ 'di nang du brten pa na bcos dka'/ ma mo phyi ma rnams kyang zhal nas gsungs pa'i sgrub thabs ni yod na/ phrag dog che la bcos dka' ste/ blo chung ba rnams kyi don
du mi rung bas/ 'dir ma gsungs so// sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas ma mo dbang du bsdu ba'i thabs bshad de/ gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'jig rten ma mo
dbang chen rnams// dbang du bsdu na ji ltar bsdu// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// yang dag gzigs kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig gnod 'dul lha yi

gtso// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// nga yis bshad pa gang zhe na// yum dang dwangs ma rtsa rnams la// rigs kyi ma mo la sogs te// g+hu ya gsang ba'i yum bzhi yang/ rkyen gyis ma sring bshad par bya// des
ni ma mo dbang du bsdu// dbang du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang can 'di rnams kun// srog chags kun la gnod bgyid pa// bskang ba'i cho ga
ji ltar bgyi// 'jig rten mgon la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// sarba rU pas thams cad skongs// skong

zlog pa yi las zhes bya'o// ma hA shAn+tiM cho ga rdzogs// zhi rgyas chen po'i las zhes bya// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ngas gsungs pa la gdon mi za// de las sarba rU pa gnyis te/ sna tshogs pa yi 'bru sna
la// ngar phye bre gang bsags nas su// snang srid gzugs su byas nas su// dpa' bo 'bru lngas byin gyis brlabs// rnam shes tshang bar bsgoms byas te// sna tshogs spyan gzigs dkor chas brgyan/ khams

gsum sems can thams cad la// lus ngag glud du bsngos byin te// ri rab bang rim gling bcu gnyis// tshe dpal pho nyas 'gugs byed pa// 'di ni phyi rgyud yo ga yin// g+hu h+ya sarba rU pas ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig
'bru sna la// ngar phye bre gsum bcal nas ni// rin chen sna tshogs phyer btags nas// sum cha gcig la ri rab gzugs// rigs su mthun pa'i kha dog bya// ngar phye sum cha gcig la ni// gcan gzan rgyal po

drug gi gzugs// dkar la mdzes dang ldan par bya// stobs kyi rgyal po drug po la// mdzes ldan ser po'i rgyan gyi brgyan// srog chags gtso bo drug po zhon// shugs kyi rgyal po drug po la// mdzes dang ldan
pa'i zhing rgyan can// 'dab chags gtso bo drug po zhon// 'dab chags gtso bo drug po la// sna tshogs dar gyis brgyan pa'o// sems can rgyal po de rnams kun// spyan gzigs dkor cha yang dag ldan// ri rab
bang rim dang po la// gzhag nas gtso mo drug la 'bul// de nas ngar phye drug cha la// glang chen gzugs ni bcu bzhi dang// stag gzigs la sogs bcu bzhi dang// gdong can bya yi gzugs can dang// srog
chags rgyal po bcu bzhi dang// dkar po ku ku rA dza'i gzugs// srog chags gzugs ni de dag kun// ri rab rim pa bar ma la// ma mo bcu bzhi'i rdzas yin no// de nas ngar phye drug cha
la// snang srid thams cad gzugs su snang// sna tshogs kha dog yang dag ldan// ri rab tha mar 'khor bar bzhag/ sna tshogs zas dang nor bu ldan// srid pa'i chags byed la sogs te// ma mor grags pa kun

gyi rdzas// ri rab bum pa'i rtse mo la// sna tshogs dar gyi rgyal mtshan lnga// grwa bzhi dbus dang lnga la'o// dkyil 'khor dbus dang lnga la'o// dkyil 'khor dmar po dar gyis gdugs// gser skyems phra men

skyogs lnga la// dbus su bse yi bya'o gang// stegs bu gru bzhi yang dag ldan// stegs bu dri ni zhim pos brgyan// rak+ta'i gdan la maN+Dal la// sna tshogs me tog yang dag ldan// dgram pa'i bcal du bkram

yang rung// de yi steng du gtor ma gzhag/ de las dpag pa'i maN+Dal la// rdzas dang ldan pa'i dmar gtor gzhag/ dbus su dpal gyi mchod pa la// mda' dang dar sna rgyu zhags ldan par bya'o// phud dang rak+ta
sman sbyar ba'o// sngags mkhan gos su bya ba ni// dmar po sngon po nag po gzung// zhag gsum bsnyen pa sgom pa ni// bla na med pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// de nas che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog nag po ral pa

can// dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug/ dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar te// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje la// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+d+ha la// bar ma zhing gi g.yang gzhi yis// ma mo thams cad 'gugs 'dren

pa'o// tha ma dung chen ga'u la// gnam lcags thog gzer gtams pa ru// mi phyugs gnyis kyi tshe dang g.yang// yi ge hUM du bsdus pa'o// yum yang dbang sdud rgya mtsho ste// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang

mthun// gnyis su med pa'i mchod 'bul ba// dpal mchog he ru ka dang dbang mchog he ru ka yab yum sdud pa'i mchod pa 'bul bar bsams la// phra men man chad dgod pa'i snying po ni// hUM he ru ka kro tI shwa

rI s+t+waM hUM ha he phaT/ oM ma ma yo gi nI/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ ma ma yo gi nI/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ ma ma yo gI ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ zhag bdun gyi bar du bzlas la/ de nas bskang bzlog gtor ma yang btang// gong du dpags
pa'i dmar gtor la// che mchog he ru ka dang/ dbang chen he ru ka la sogs pa// dpal gyi 'khor mchog tu mchod do// hUM/ bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs
can// dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal mnga' zhing// phyag drug chos te skye shi sgrol// sbrul nag pags pas ma tshogs 'dul// g.yang gzhi'i g.yab mos thams cad 'dul// yum dang gnyis su med pa ste// ma mo'i
tshogs kyis mchod pa yis// thugs rje'i dbyings la rol par mdzod// ces bstod pa la sogs pa/ dpal gyi 'khor tshogs rgyud bshams kyi lugs bzhin du bshams par bgyi// phrin las

bcol/ de nas ma mo srog gi snying po nas kun bsdu ste/ a mr-i tas bden pa bdar/ bdag nyid che ba'i nga rgyal 'di skad bskyed do// nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje/ khams gsum snying khrag dwangs ma'i bdag/ nga ni

skye 'gro dbugs kyi bdag/ nga ni rus 'cha' chen po ste/ khams gsum keng rus dur khrod bdag/ nga ni sha za chen po ste/ khams gsum dwangs ma kun gyi bdag/ nga ni skye 'gro dbugs kyi bdag/ ma mo kun gyi re

gnas yin// ma tshogs skong bzlog gtor ma long// tshe dang bsod nams dar bar 'tshal// phog rgod dud pa btang nas kyang// gtor ma bsngo ba 'di skad do// hUM/ ma tshogs ni gnyan mchod phyir// 'bru sna ni

mang po dang// rin chen ni sna tshogs pas// gling bzhi ni gtor ma la// srog chags ni mang pos bskor// kun kyang ni rin po che// rgyan dang ni cha lugs te// 'jig rten ni zas kyis bskor// dkon pa ni rdzas
kyis bskor// mu men ni stegs bu la// rin chen ni bcal bkram ste// bye ru yis skas btsugs te// spos kyi ni sa bzhi la// dbang gi ni dkyil 'khor bkod// dar dkar ni yol bris te/ gsal ba'i ni me

bus shing// rgyal mtshan ni sna tshogs btsugs// ma tshogs kyi rgyal mo ste// le brgan ni gdugs kyis bkab// dud pa ni nag phyung zhing// gser gyi ni skyems bdar te// tshe srog ni glud du 'bul// chung sri ni

glud du 'bul// longs spyod ni glud bzhes shig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// 'jig rten yongs kyi mnga' bdag mo// ma mo tshogs kyi rgyal mo ste// srid pa yongs la mnga' mdzad ma// skye 'gro

yongs kyi za byed mo// na bza' stong gsum sa bzhi la// thod rlon mang po'i phreng ba can// lag na snying gi longs spyod ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glu bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// hUM/ rdo

rje rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// shar phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// dar dkar sprin dkar go zu la// lag na ser gyi spu gri thogs// srid pa kun gyi rus 'cha' ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos
bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ rin chen rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// lho phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo g.yu yi go zu can// bskal pa mo yi 'od 'bar

zhing// srid pa gsum gyi drod 'bebs ma// skye 'gro kun gyi tshe 'phrog ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ hUM/ pad+ma rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nub phyogs khams kyi
mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo khrag gi go zu can// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang// skye 'gro kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs

shig/ hUM/ las kyi rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// byang phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag mo// phyag na ne'u le'i rkyal pa thogs// ser mo rlung gi go zu can// skye 'gro dbugs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'dir spyon tshe srog glud
bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ hUM/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// 'jig rten kun gyi dwangs ma'i bdag/ mthing nag nam mkha'i go zu can// gser gyi dri zhags rdeg cing 'phen// skye

'gro yongs kyi dwangs ma'i bdag/ 'dir spyon tshe srog glud bzhes shig/ mdos bdag chen mo mdos longs shig/ hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i zom rtse la// snang srid kun gyi phud tshogs ma// sku mdog nag mo chen mo

la// dbu dang spyan ni cir yang ston// rin chen ral pa sna tshogs kyis// snang srid khog pa gsal mdzad ma// spyan gnyis mdzes pa'i mchi ma yis// g.yas pa snang sring dbang du sdud// g.yon pas skye 'gro gso
mdzad ma// lnga bcu rtsa bdun jo mo ste// skye 'gro kun gyi mnga' mdzad ma// ma mo chen mo gshegs nas kyang// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glu bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// zhes kun la

'gre'o// hUM/ che zhe chen mo dkar mo ste// nyi zla stong gi thod gdengs can// zangs dang lcags kyi mkhar nag la// snying gi zhags pa bsdog cing 'phen// dkar mo chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo

mdos la gshegs// glu bdag chen mo glu la gshegs// hUM/ che zhe chen mo nyi ma'i mdangs// srin pa gsum char sgrol mdzad ma// lag na shel gyi spu gri bsnams/ khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos
bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ che zhe chen mo khrag 'thung mdangs// srid pa gsum char dbang du sdud// lag na thod pa khrag gi bkang/ khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming
nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glu bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ che zhe chen mo bdud rtsi'i bdag/ srid pa gsum char gso mdzad ma// lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs// khros
pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ che zhe ljang nag gnas 'bum ma// srid pa gsum char gsang bar sbyor// lag na zhig lpags
rgyal mtshan thogs/ khros pa'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ dkar mo srid pa'i rgyal byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags
pa thogs// phung byed chen mo ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo ste// lag na mi yi thod
pa thogs// phung byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ mtshan ni bdag nyid chen mo la// lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags thogs// phung
byed chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo la// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi rdebs// phung byed chen mo'i ming
nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ gling bzhi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa shar gyi bdag mo ste// shar gyi dkar mo mig gcig ma// lag

na b+han+d+ha zlum po thogs// skye ba med pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ srid pa lho yi mnga' bdag mo// nag mo chen mo mche ba can// lag
na b+han+d+ha sul mangs thogs// srid par byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ srid pa nub gyi mnga' bdag mo// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal
mo la// lag la b+han+d+ha lcang lo thogs// 'chi bar byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ srid pa byang gi phyogs nas mnga' bdag
mo// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na thod pa'i rgya gram bsnams// len par byed pa'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// de rnams kyi khol

mo bskul bar bya ste// hUM/ srid pa yongs kyi sha za mo// shan shan ne'u'i tshogs kyi rje// gos su mi lpags rlon pa la// tha ma mi mgo stong gis bskor// srid pa kun gyi bdag nyid ma// sa srin chen mo'i ming nas
phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ ha la ha la'i gdong brgya mo// srid pa gsum gyi khyim bdag mo// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i go zu gyon// lag na zhing
lpags rlon pa thogs// he ru kas ni ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ 'jig rten kun gyi byan mkhan te// sbyin dkar mdzes pa'i go zu

gyon// lag na zhing lpags rlon pa thogs// e ka tsi ti'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ cha byad sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig khu 'phang go
zu+u la// tshe dang g.yang rku 'phrog byed ma// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ cha byad dkar mo chen mo
la// lag na lcags kyu 'bar ba thogs// gling bzhi nyul byed ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ ri rab gling bzhi'i gru 'degs ma// cha byad
dkar mo sgeg pa la// lag na sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// har ting dkar mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// cha byad nag mo chen mo
la// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun+ting nag mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// cha byad dmar mo sgeg pa la// lag na chu yi dkyil
'khor thogs// shAn+tiM dmar mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glad bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ cha byad ser mo sgeg pa la// lag na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub
ting ser mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ dmag gi rgyal mo chen po bzhi// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// lho yi nag mo kha rlan
ma// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang gi ser mo las mkhan ma// dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// rigs bzhi dmag dpung bzhi yi bskor/ kha rje za ba'i bdag mo ste// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la
gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// cha byad nag mo chen mo la// 'jigs su rung ba'i ral pa can// sku stod stag lpags g.yang gzhi la// sku smad zangs kyi 'dab ma can// mi phyugs gsod pa'i

khram bam thogs// 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo ste// gshin rje ma chen ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// hUM/ lha chen brgyad kyi ma chen mo// srin mo

chen mo sham sham mo// srin mo rab tu skam pa dang// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// srin mo chen mo dri snom ma// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// srin mo chen mo rab tu gsod byed ma// srin mo chen mo rab tu za

ba mo// srog chags kun gyi khrag 'thung ma// srog chags kun la gnod byed ma// mkhal ma dang ni nang khrol gyis// snyim pa shin tu bkang nas su// rang gis rang la thim par stob// ma mo chen mo'i ming nas
phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// shar phyogs khams nas shin tu rgyug/ mi mgo'i phor pa khrag gis bkang// grong skor 'thor zhing nad 'phen ma// ma
bdud chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// gling bzhi kun gyi rgyug 'gro ma// phyogs bzhi dag nas sring mor grags// sring
mo chen mo pho nya'i tshul// pho nya chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// sa 'og nas ni g.yo byed cing// 'jig rten myos byed za ba mo// sa
bdag chen mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// nag mo ha la ha la mo// thab dang 'brog srin sdong zla ste/ ma yams chen mo'i ming nas
phyung// mdos bdag chen mo mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen mo glud la gshegs// gzhan yang bod yul du kun tu yang grags dbang phyug ma dang brtan ma'i ming brjod do// gtor ma btang/ kun tu

mkhar rnga dang rdza rnga yang rdung ste/ glu dbyangs snyan par blangs nas su// khrom lam dang ni ri rtser bskyal// man ngag ldan pas tshe dpal drangs// des ni bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub// de skad ces ni bka' stsal
nas// lha rnams 'chi bas 'jig 'gyur te// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// lha yi srog kyang 'chi 'gyur na// 'jig rten phan yon cho ga gang// 'jig rten mi la ji
ltar lags// yang dag srog [\[]rdzogs [\]]la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten phan yon bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten mi la grags pa ni// lha mo yongs 'khyud bde ba'i
sras// ngas bstan khyed kyis sgrogs mi dgos// gling bzhi'i spyi 'dus chen po'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// srid pa'i dbang chen 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskang ba ji
ltar lags// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag cig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid pa'i

dbang can 'di rnams kun// srog gis bskang ba 'di rnams so// hUM/ gtso mo yum gyi mngon spyod ma// spyi gtsug g.yu yi rdo rje rtse dgu 'bar// g.yu yi ral pas stong gsum khyab// g.yas kyi phyag na rigs lnga'i
sangs rgyas bsnams// g.yon gyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i longs spyod 'gyed// ye shes sprul pa'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs/ khams gsum srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur ma// rtag tu dbang phyug chen po'i grogs
mdzad ma// bltas pas mi mthong gcig kyang med// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// hUM/ shar gyi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba sa la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i rus la mnga'
mdzad ma// 'di yi rus pas bskang byas nas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ lho yi phyogs kyi mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba chu la dbang bsgyur
zhing// 'gro ba'i khrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi khrag gis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ nub phyogs khams kyi mnga' bdag

mo// 'byung ba me la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i drod la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi drod kyis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ byang phyogs
khams kyis mnga' bdag mo// 'byung ba rlung la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i dbugs la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi dbugs kyis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bcol pa'i las
rnams grub par mdzod// hUM/ nam mkha' rigs kyi rgyal mo ste// nam mkha' stong la dbang bsgyur zhing// 'gro ba'i bkrag la mnga' mdzad ma// 'di yi bkrag gis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas

'bul gyi// bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// rgyu bsgral ba'i 'byung ba chen po lngas ye shes lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ gtso bo yab yum yang bskang ngo// da ni 'dod khams kyi lha mo rnams bskang ba ni/
hUM/ srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste// sku mdog mthing nag chen mo la// dbu dang zhabs kyi stong khams khengs// rin chen ral pas snang srid gsal/ khyed ni 'dod khams gtso mo
ste// phud kyi bdag mo'i thugs dam bskang// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga la// dkar mo g.yag thod ral pa can// nyi zla stong gi thod gdengs can// dpag tshad
brgyad khri bzhi stong 'og nas khag gi dri snom ma// ral pa'i zar bu g.yon nas gcig tu 'khyil// srid pa'i sa gzhi g.yogs shing khebs mdzad ma// lag pa g.yas na lcags dang zangs kyi dril zhags

bsnams// snying gi zhags pa bsdog cing 'phen// lag pa g.yon na b+han+d+ha mgo gcad bcu bar mdzad// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad kyi mgo bcad nas// nyi zla stong gis sku la brgyan cing bklubs// snang
srid snying gi bdag mo te// 'di yi snying gis bskang byas pas// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis bcol ba grub par mdzod// che zhe chen mo dkar mo nyi ma'i mdangs// dkar mo ral gcig thugs
dam bskang// che zhe rdo rje nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che/ khams gsum thams cad gsal mdzad ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skongs// che zhe khams gsum 'tsho byed khros pa'i dbang mo che/ khams
gsum thams cad gsang bar sbyor// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skong// che zhe chen mo dmar mo ral gcig ma// srid pa bde sbyor khros pa'i dbang mo che/

khams gsum thams cad dbang du+u sdud// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis bcol ba'i las rnams mdzod// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skongs// che zhe pad+ma khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo

che// srid pa thams cad bde la 'god// mthun pa'i rdzas chen ngas 'bul gyi// nga yis bcol ba'i las rnams mdzod// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skong// snang srid kun gyi rgyan mdzad ma// rgyan gyi rgyal

mo'i thugs dam bskang// bdag nyid lha lhag bzhad mdzad ma// bdag nyid chen mo'i thugs dam bskang// mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo ste// lag na mi mgo'i phor pa thogs// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam

skong// mtshan ni gcig pu chen mo la// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi thogs// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skong// thugs kyi dgyes sde chen mo ste// gsang ba'i man ngag yang byi mo// sgrub pa po la rtags phyung
zhig/ rtag tu dbang phyug chen mos grogs mdzod cig/ srid pa shar gyi bdag mo ste// dkar mo mig gcig ral pa can// shar gyi dkar mo 'bum sder bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skongs// srid pa
lho yi bdag mo ste// nag mo chen mo mche ba can// 'khor ni nag mo 'bum sder bcas// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam skong// srid pa nub gyi bdag mo ste// dmar mo chen mo dbang bsgyur ma// nub gyi dmar
mo 'bum sder bcas// thugs dam gnyen po bdag bskong gis// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// srid pa byang gi bdag mo ste// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// byang phyogs ser mo 'bum sder

bcas// thugs dam gnyen po bdag skong gis// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// de yan chad ni ma mo bcu bzhi'i skong thabs so// da ni khol mo rnams sha khrag dmar dang bsres pa a mr-i tas bskang ste/
srid pa kun gyi khyim bdag mo// he ru kas ni thugs dam bskang// har ting dkar mo'i thugs dam bskang// dun ting nag mo'i thugs dam bskang// shAn+tiM dmar mo'i thugs dam bskang// grub ting ser
mo'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa'i gru 'degs chen mo yis// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// dmag gi rgyal mo chen mo bzhi// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// nag mo chen mo kha rlan ma// dmar mo
chen mo mchu 'jib ma// ser mo chen mo rkang ldag ma// rigs bzhi dmag dpung 'khor gyis bskor// thugs dam gnyen po bdag gis bskang// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// e ka tsa ti dpal gyi
yum// lcags kyi so la zangs kyi skra// sna tshogs zhal la zhing sgrol ma// thugs dam gnyen po bdag skong gis/ bcol ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod// e ka tsa ti'i thugs dam bskang// srid pa'i
ma bdun thugs dam bskang// ma mor grags pa kun gyi thugs dam gnyen po bskang// de ltar nang gi dam rdzas dang ldan par byas la/ shel smug po'am/ nam mkha' lding la sogs pa rgyu gang bsgral yang rung/

'byung ba chen po lnga yis ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma lnga dang gtso mo bskang/ sha khrag dmar dang a mr-i tas 'khor gyi ma mo'i thugs dam bskang na/ sgrub pa po bsam pa yid bzhin du grub ces dpal chen po'i he ru
kas bshad do// ma mo'i thugs dam bskang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// cho ga 'di bstan phan yon gang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bshad du gsol// yang

dag rdzogs kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// lha rnams srog kyang 'chi 'gyur na// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// srid pa'i dam can 'di bskang na// dus min 'chi bar bzlog par
'gyur// dus su bab na nur bar 'gyur// 'jig rten longs spyod brtan par 'gyur// rabs rgyud chad pa'i mi dang lha// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// spun bzhi bu yi 'du bar nges// cho ga 'di la brten byed
na// 'chi bdag zhags pas zin pa yang// zhags pa nag po bcad nas su// smyo 'bogs nad kyang rnam par 'jig/ tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// 'jig rten 'dir na bde skyid de// rig 'dzin sa la
de bzhin gshegs// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// bran g.yog sgab rnams 'phel bar byed// gzhan gyi dmag gis bkur sti zhing// rgyal po longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// dbul

po longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// nor gyi dbyig kyang de bzhin rnyed// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// skyid pa rtag cing bsam dgu 'grub// rmongs po 'phel zhing yul yang 'grub// de nas na tsha sdug bsngal
med// pha rol dmag dpung 'jigs par 'gyur// lo phyug rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// cho ga 'di la brten byed na// 'jig rten dbang can thams cad kyis// byang chub sems ldan bkur sti zhing// zhe dang chus
srid 'phel bar 'gyur// bsgo ba'i tshig rnams bran bzhin nyan// 'di yi yon tan bsod nams kyis// phyi ma'i dngos grub mchog yin te// bsod nams nyid du gang na med// 'di la yon tan brjod mi
lang// de skad gsungs pas lha rnams dga'// mdos kyi phan yon gyi le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// dbang can mo rnams skong ba yis// dbang byed pho la mi 'tshal
lam// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung lha yi gtso// 'dod chags nga rgyal che ba yis// zhe sdang byed pa'i dbang mo che// srid pa'i ma bzhis 'jig rten bskyed// 'di
bskang bzlog pas thams cad 'grub// de nas pho rigs mchod 'dod na// stegs bu go 'phang mtho dman dbye// cho ga'i rdzas ni 'di dag go/ 'bru sna bcu gsum mngar phye dang// rin chen sna bdun bdar nas

su// rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bya// de la lag pa g.yas g.yon rin po che// gsal byed brgyad kyang de bzhin no// 'bru sna lnga dang tshom bu lnga// lus dang yan lag de bzhin brgyan// bdud dang drang dkar

chen po dang// de wa nor gyi bdag po dang// gshin rje rU tra'i rdzas yin te// skyes to re la de bzhin no// 'bru sna gtsang phye bre bzhi la// mkhar thabs mda' yis rnam par brgyan// lce bzangs dar dkar bkra

ba'i rgyan// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang// dkar glud skyems dang bcas pa yis// dkar po che la de bzhin no// bre cha gsang phye zla gam la// za 'og mda' yis rnam par brgyan// le'u bzangs dar dkar na

bza'i rten// de bzhin sha dang rin chen chang// se glud rkyen dang chas pa ni// byang shar mtshams su de bzhin no// nas dang yungs dkar mngon gyis brgyan// srid pa kun la de bzhin te// 'byung po phal la sme
gtor sbyin// de skad bgyis pa de'i tshe 'di skad brjod// dpag bsam shing gi sked pa la// gser mkhar ni ser po la/ bser sgo ni thams se tham// g.yu bad ni sngon pos bskor// de yi ni bdag po ste// skos
rje ni drang dkar zhig/ skos mkhan ni ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// gser mkhar ni rtse dgu nas// rin chen ni stegs bu la// lcags kyi ni sgo khyud
can// de yi ni steng na'o// srid pa'i ni drang dkar ba// zhig 'dzin gyi ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// rim pa ni bcu gsum la// ri rab kyi rim pa
la// gnam gyi ni steng shed na// lcags mkhar ni sngon po la// gser gyi ni bad bskor zhing// zangs kyi ni sgo stsal pa// de yi ni bdag po la// dbang phyug ni chen po la// ma hA+e ni shwa rA+e

zhig/ nag po ni chen po zhig/ ya bdud ni ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// de yi ni gling phran na// yar gyi ni yang le shod/ bdud pas ni thabs mkhas te// bdud pas ni drag

shul che// 'gro ba ni kun gyi bdud// 'gro ba yi tshe dpal phrog/ skyes bu ni skyes to re// ma bdud rgyal mo'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// lho phyogs ni
gling khams na// rus mkhar ni gling dgu la// de yi ni bdag po la// shi bdud kun gyi khram 'debs pa// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// 'dzam bu gling gi
nor gyi bdag/ ma hA de wa lha chen po// btsun mo dbu ma 'khor dang bcas// nor lha chen po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// gnam gyi ni yar steng
na// dung mkhar ni dkar po la// g.yu yi ni bad bskor la// bse yi ni sgo stsal te// de yi ni bdag po ba/ khyab 'jug dung gi thor tshugs can// gnam gyi dkar po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la

gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// byang shar gyi mtshams shed na// bswe mkhar ni khra bo la// dung gi ni bad bskor la// lcags kyi ni sgo stsal te/ de yi ni bdag po ba// shar phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi
bdag/ tshangs gyur yang tshangs pa'i lus la thor tshugs mgo/ btsan mgon rgyal po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud bdag ni glud la gshegs// shar phyogs ni pha gi na// dud
mkhar ni sgo dgu la// bse yi ni sgo stsal pa// shar phyogs gnam sa phyed kyi bdag/ tshangs pa'i lus la thor tshugs mgo/ shar phyogs rgyal po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag ni mdos la gshegs// glud
bdag ni glud la gshegs// se btsan rol po rkya rol po// btsan gyi rgyal po'i ming nas phyung// mdos bdag chen po mdos la gshegs// glud bdag chen po glud la gshegs// btsan la rol pa de bzhin

no// da ni ma hA shAn+tiM gi cho ga bshad de/ gsang phye gtsang mkhal phyed la// ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs bshams la// dkor cha spyan gzigs yang dag ldan// de ni phyi rgyud shAn+tiM ngo// de la 'jig rten shas bskos

te// dmar gtor dam rdzas ldan pa ni// shAn+tiM nang gi cho ga'o// gnyan pa'i sa ni dben pa ru// gru bzhi spos chu'i maN+Dal bya// zas kyi stegs bu gang bar bya// las dang phan yon gong ma bzhin// bsngos te dar spra
bshus te bzhag/ phyi rgyud mthun de dkar po yin// gsang ba mthun de gnyis ka 'dra// 'di brtsams bsam pa ma 'grub na// 'jig rten dbang chen phung bar 'gyur/ las rnams kun gyis rnag pa ste// cho ga
lung chen rdzogs pa 'di// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// de skad ces ni bka' stsal pas// 'jig rten dbang chen mngon par dga'// lha rnams thams cad mthu skyes nas// sems can kun la phan pa
sgrub// dam tshig mtha' ni de bzhin gnas// mdos kyi phan yon kyi le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// 'gugs dang 'dren pa'i las rnams ni// pho nya'i las rnams
bdag nyan 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srid gsum 'dul ba'i pho nya ni/ bdag nyid man ngag ldan byas te// sems kyi dkyil nas bskul

ba ni// hUM// dpal gyi pho nya bka' sdod ma/ khyung gi khra chen lding ba la// lcags kyi ma mo khyung mgo can// mgo gsum pa la lag drug ma// g.yas na rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ bar ma spu gris srid gsum sgrol// tha ma mu
stegs dril zhags 'ching// g.yon na b+han+d+ha rak+tas bkang// bar ma 'khor lo bskal pa'i me// tha ma lcags kyu 'phro 'du can// gnas ni dur khrod dkyil du bcas// bskungs ni thugs kyi dkyil du

bskungs// bton ni ljags kyi rtse la bton// dbang ni srid pa gsum la byed// za ni skye 'gro yongs la za// nyul ni gling bzhi khyab par nyul// bang ni nges par glog las mgyogs// rbod ni dngos po gcig la
rbod// kyal ka chen pos bdud dpung 'joms// tsham rngams chen pos bdud rigs 'joms// nga rgyal chen pos mu stegs 'joms// rdzu 'phrul chen pos ri rab bsnyil/ khyod ni srid gsum sgrol byed pas// che
'ga' drag tu bskul ba'i tshe// gang la bya ba 'grub par byos// de yi bka' sdod pho nya ni// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can// kyal ka chen pos bdud dpung 'joms// tsham rngams chen pos bdud dpung

sgrol// mtshan ni sprin dkar go cog can// rbad ni dngos po gcig la rbod// gang la bya ba grub par byos// de yis bka' sdod pho nya ni// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// phyag drug zur gsum mig gcig la// dril

bu'i dbu gsum byung ba ni// mgo la tshil gyi yid zhu ca// mtshan ni sprin dkar go cog can// phyag gnyis pad+ma stong gzung zhing// mtshan ni 'jig rten kun 'dul ma// g.yas na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'phen// bdud

dang mu stegs 'ching byed ma// mtshan ni dbyings phyug chen mo la// g.yon gyi dang po bsnams pa ni// mi mgo rlon pa'i phor pa ru// mi khrag rlon pa'i nang bstsal zhing// bdud rtsi'i bcud dang bsres nas
mthor// drangs shig dgra bgegs rdul du rlog/ mtshan ni bdud rtsi'i longs spyod ma// g.yas kyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// me yi rus pa'i phur bu 'dril// dgra bgegs mnan pa'i las mdzad ma// mtshan ni rdo
rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon gyi phyag na bsnams pa ni// zangs dang lcags kyi dril zhags la// mi snying brgyus pa'i zhags pa 'phen// srid pa gsum char 'ching bar mdzod// mtshan ni gser gyi dril zhags
ma// sprul pa'i 'phro 'du mang po can// g.yas g.yon rol pa'i g.yab mo yis/ khams gsum rdul du rlog mdzad ma// mtshan ni g.yang gzhi ru mtshon can// na bza' mi lpags rlon pa la// stong khams thams
cad myos mdzad ma// dgra bgegs thams cad rdul du rlogs// mtshan ni zhing ni na bza' can/ kha nas mi khrag rlon pa 'thor// stong khams thams cad sreg mdzad ma// sku la mi mgo se ral

kha// skye 'gro thams cad skyong mdzad ma// mtshan ni me tog chun 'phyang can// 'bar ma gtum chen khro mo 'dul/ khro rgyal chen po gshin rje gshed// bka' yi pho nya mgyogs ma'i tshogs// nga rgyal can rnams
dbang du sdud// gang la bya ba rdul du rlogs// 'di ni pho nya'i gtso mo ste// bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod// mtshan ni me 'bar chen mo la// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dgra bgegs ma lus
sreg par mdzad// thar pa'i dus med 'o dod 'bod// slan chad sdom zhes smra bar nges// ma btang myur du la 'ur khug/ pho nya drug cu'i gtso mo ste// e ka dza Ti ral gcig ma// ral pa'i zar bus srid gsum
sdud// za 'og zhabs ma'i dbu rgyan can// gnam la bskor bas bdud dpung bzlog mdzad ma// sa la brdabs pas dam sri 'byung po'i bla gcod ma// sgrub pa'i dgra dang bgegs thul cig/ mtshan ni khyim
bdag chen mo la// chibs su rlung 'tshubs mdur [\[]'dur [\]]gom bskyod// drongs shig dgra bgegs ang ku sha/ dngos grub bar chad byed pa dang// sgrub pa po yi mthu 'phrog rnams// sgrol bdag chen mo da
tshur spyon// mthu chen dam can da tshur spyon// ngas gsung pa la the tshom med// zhes las la bskul ba khug par bya'o// pho nya chen po'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol
pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed pa'i// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang// sems can kun la gnod byed dang// rtag tu gdug sems gyur pa la// nan tan las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas
la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur te// sems can kun la gnod pa la// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon
cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ji ltar yid mthad gnas su ni// dkyil 'khor tshad dang ldan par bya// dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha sprod pa// dbus su kun tu bzang mo mkha'// 'dzub gsum pa las drang por

bri// ze ba sor bzhi cha snyoms pa// dgug dang spar 'phang sngags kyis 'gengs// dbang gi dkyil 'khor kha ran la// gnod dang 'phang ba'i sngags kyis bskor// de nas kha ran gru bzhi la// sor lnga pa yi tshad

du bya'o// rdo rje pad+ma spel mar bri// de nas maN+Dal rgyas pa la// 'od phung thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// sgo bzhi mda' bzhis brgyan par bya// de nas rdzas kyi ngo bo yang// rgyu yi gtso bo dgu bsogs te// grub pa'i
rnal 'byor dgu rbad pa// gnyis la chags 'dzin spun gnyis bri// mdun la ma bdun sngags bris te// drag po'i kha ran 'khor bar bri// dbang dang drag por ldan par bya// lcags zangs shing bu
gang yang rung// dbang drag phur pa dgu po la// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga lnga bsam// ngos la rnal 'byor bcu bzhi bsgom// sked par chags 'dzin la sogs bsam// rtse mor ma bdun bsam nas su// dmigs
pa'i dngos po gang yang rung// dkar nag dkyil du rgyab nas su// dge sdig las kyi mtshams phye nas// dwangs ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// rngubs nas ma mos zos par bsam// de ltar brgyab na lha yang

'chi// dngos po bdag nyid bsgom bya ba// phra men rgya mtsho nyid kyi sku// dbang drag sku mdog chen mo la// dbu gcig zhal lnga 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu la mkha' 'gro lnga bsgoms shing// mche ba can la gtsigs

zhing bzhad// ma mo thams cad dbyings nas 'gyed// phyag na dbang drag phur pa 'gyed// 'dren dang mnan dang spar ba yi// sngags rnams drag tu bzlas nas su// rnal 'byor ma rnams rbad nas su// gang la bya
ba'i dngos po de// dbang drag dkyil du bzung nas ni// rnam shes dbyings su bsdus pa dang// dge sdig lag [\[]las [\]]rnams sbyangs nas su// lhu gzugs phral te zos bsams nas// rdo rje'i brag kyang
'jigs par 'gyur// ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas 'khor// de na gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' stan las langs te/ gar gyi brda' phyag 'tshal
nas 'di skad gsol pa dang/ dbang drag dkyil khor byin rlabs dang// dbang drag phur pa'i cho 'phrul dang// 'dren mnan spar 'phang sngags kyi mthu// mgon po chen pos bstan du gsol// de skad rdo rje

sems dpas gsol pa gsan nas/ ci yang mi gsung bar dbang drag gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa bzhin// badzra bo d+hi dz+wa la maN+Da la/ b+ha ga ru tra b+ha ga ru tro s+t+waM/ baM kI la ya/ dza:hUM
nan/ s+pha ra Na ya/ phaT tsit+ta su kha hUM/ zhes gsungs pa dang/ khams gsum thams cad mkha' gru gsum gdengs pa'i dkyil 'khor/ gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas khang dbang drag gi phur pa ye shes kyi

mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis brgyan pa steng nas char du bab ste/ dbang drag bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te rigs lnga dang lha gnod 'dul kha sbub tu brgyal/ dbang drag gi dal gdengs

kar/ srid pa'i ma mo dbang can gyi tshogs ni gan rkyal du bsgyel nas snying dkar nag gi mtshams su phur bu phog te dge sdig gi shan thang phye nas/ byang chub kyi sems su byin gyis brlabs nas/ de ltar thams
cad brgyal ba dang 'di skad ces glu blangs so// dbang drag dkyil 'khor yum gyi mkha'// mkha' yi dkyil 'khor bder gshegs gnas// gting dpag med pa'i gzhal yas su// dbyings nas

dbang drag phur bu yis// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs kun// rang rgyud nyid la drangs nas kyang// dbang drag mkha' la bzhag nas su// slan chad gsang ba'i dbyings su sbyor// g+hu ya ba ga sa ma yA s+t+waM/ laM laM ma
hA tsit+ta ho/ zhes gsungs pas/ brgyal ba thams cad slar dran pa rnyed nas/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor na 'dar yed yed 'dug pa tshor ro// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pas gsol pa/ dkyil 'khor

chen po a la la// dbang drag dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang sngags chen po a la la// 'dren gnon spar 'phang cho 'phrul ste// mtshon cha chen po a la la// dbang drag phur bu dge sdig spyod/ khrag 'thung

chen po a la la// bla med khrag 'thung rje btsan mchog/ mkha' 'gro chen mo a la la// ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i tshogs// ces smras so// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po thabs kyi
mchog/ mu stegs thams cad kyi gnyen po bdag lags te/ bdag gi ming yang rdo rje sems dpar btags pa lags na/ 'dir bla med bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho
'phrul gyis/ bdag kyang brgyal na mi mthun pa gzhan smos kyang ci 'tshal/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dus gsum du mi 'gyur ba'i bdag nyid gsang ba mchog kyang de bzhin 'dzin// ces gsol to// de nas
dbang drag gi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho 'phrul gyis/ mu stegs kA la chen po yang gtan du gnon par gyur to// rnal 'byor dgra bgegs mnan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang

gsol pa// rdo rje rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// rgyud lung chen po 'di dag la// skye 'gro gang dag yi rangs te// mos pa'i dngos grub ji ltar lags// gang gis 'di la ma dad pa'i// skur pa 'debs pa'i skye bo

la// rnam par smin par ci lta bu// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gnas nas kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngas gsungs pa yi lung 'di

la// skye bo gang gis brtson 'grus pa// lung 'di nyid kyi srid pa brje// tshe 'di nyid la dgongs pa rdzogs// rgyal po bzhin du che bar nges// ngas gsungs pa la yi lung 'di la// rnal 'byor gang zhig dad mos
pa// srid gsum dbang chen thams cad kyis// shes rab mig gis bltas pa'i tshe// srid gsum dkyil 'khor rdzogs par mthong// de la rim gros mchod byed pa// bsgom pa'i tshig la bran bzhin nyan// ngas
gsungs pa yi rgyud lung la// gang gis skur pa 'debs pa de// dam sri dmar por nges par skyed// dam can kun gyis sdig mthong nas// tshe 'di nyid la smyo 'bog cing// dus min 'chi bar srog
zad nges// ngas gsung pa yi lung 'di la// don med phyal bar sgrogs pa de// thar pa'i dus med 'o dod 'bod// slan chad sdom zhes smra bar byed// ngas gsungs pa yi rgyud lung la// mi nyan pa yi sems can
de// gshin rje'i zhags pas bzung nas kyang// des kyang nyes dmigs khram la btab nas su// lhu gzugs thams cad 'dral bar nges// ngas gsung pa yi rgyud lung la// skye bo gang zhig dad mos pa// 'jig
rten 'di yi yon tan yang// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// thar pa bde ba'i 'bras bu yin// rig 'dzin sa non gdon mi za// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub kyis// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// ngas

gsung pa la the tshom med/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs te rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang srid pa'i phra men rgya mtsho la sogs te ma mo stong gi tshogs dang/ lha chen po gnod 'dul la

sogs pa g.yung drung lha'i rigs mang po dang/ rdo rje gzhon nu ma la sogs te rig 'dzin gyi bud med mang po dang/ he ru ka sni la sogs ste 'jig rten gyi dbang mo che mang po dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang chen mang
po rnams gus pas yi rangs te/ thar pa'i bde ba yang thob ste/ a la la'i sgra byung nas/ rig 'dzin gyi dam can du gyur to// he ru ka'i zhal nas dmod tsug pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o//// cho ga rdzogs

lung chen po 'di// gang gis rnyed pa dngos grub ste/ dam tshig gtsang ma skye bar 'gyur// srid pa'i gsang ba'i rdzogs lung 'di// 'gro ba'i don la dga' ba dang// theg pa chen po gtsor len cing// rdo rje slob

dpon mchod byed pa// lu gu rgyud la gtsor sdom pa'i// skal ldan de dang 'phrad par shog/ g+hu ya gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen po/ slob dpon rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal dang 'dra ba'i shrI dz+nyA nas bsgrubs pas 'di

'grub par 'gyur ste dngos grub chen po thob ste/ srid pa'i dam can thams cad bran bzhin du nyan te/ ci bya ba bsam pa 'grub pa las/ gsang ba'i slob dpon ye shes spyan dang ldan pa kun kyang 'dir 'grub
par 'gyur/ zhes slob dpon ro langs de bas gsal bar bshad do// rdzogs lung chen po'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol pa// ma mo'i spyi bskul ji ltar mchis// yang dag

rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo spyi bskul 'di ltar bskul// hUM bsam 'phel nor bu rin po che// ma bzhag de ni 'dod dgur spel/ nang gi rin chen sna lnga la// phyi yi lu'u rkang 'gros dang/ mchod rdzas 'bru
la lo tog rgyas par spel// thang zhig yud la 'dus tshogs shing// nyi zer 'dod chags 'phrul mo che// mnyam nyid sku la ci ste bzhes// ma g.yel ma g.yel ma yi tshogs// gong gsum lcug phran
rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// gum gum chum chum las la 'du// yun ring gong nas bsnyen pa'i lha// rtag tu ming dang mtshan nas 'bod cing 'tshal// ma 'da' ma 'da' dam ma 'da'// ma 'phang ma 'phang lha ma
'phang/ khyung chen sku la gshog rdzogs ma/ kham kham tshig tshig glog re 'gyu// me stag 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du can// bos shing ni snyan ma sra// bsnyen cing ni gong ma g.yel// 'dris shing ni mgur ma
rkyen// 'grogs shing ni gzhung ma ngan// ma ba 'dud ltar grags mang// ma ru+u ba gyi'o dbang ma rlon// sring mor bgyi na gdung ma chung// dgra blar bgyi na mthu ma chung// gzungs mar bgyi na brtse ma
chung// dga' mar bgyis na gdung ma chung// grogs mor bgyi na gzhung ma ngan// pho nyar bgyis na bang ma bul// bdag cag sems can las kyi mnar ba las// re ltos dpung gnyen khyod las mi bzhugs
na// khyod la thugs rje mi mnga' 'am// bdag la g.yar dam ma mchis sam// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'das na// rnal 'byor rjes su slob pa mad yod kyang// rtse gcig sgrub pa'i ming po bdag tsam

dkon// ma g.yel ma g.yel srung ma'i tshogs// g.yel du dogs nas rdzas la brten// 'das su dogs nas 'dzab tu 'dren// ji ltar dngos grub gnyan po ru// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgya mtshor bskyil// tsit+ta mang po rdza

ltar lhags// mAM sa sha chen phung por spungs// ji ltar gsang chen gnyan po ru// rdzas kyi mchod pa gnyan bkram zhing// dmar chen dam la gsol ba yi// de tshe khas blangs dam bcas bzhin// bcol ba'i las

rnams 'grub par mdzod// bud med bu ltar ngang ma thung// dwa phrug sring ltar shed ma chung// dus la bab bo sa ma yA// ma ma b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ma mo spyi bskul gyi le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang
gsol pa// ma mo gsang chen dkyil 'khor las// sgrub pa'i rdzas kyi dbang bskur ba// bdag gis nan tan ji ltar bskyed// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas

kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// bsgrub pa'i las kyi dbang rnams ni/ ngas gsungs pa la the tshom med// ngas gsung pa la nan tan bskyed// ces bka' stsal pa

dang/ g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// phyi dbang chen po bdag la stsol// nang dbang chen po bdag la stsol// gsang dbang chen po bdag la stsol// spyi dbang chen po bdag la stsol// de skad zhus pa gsan
nas kyang// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rnams ni// nga yi thugs kyi rgyud la gnas// nga yi thugs kyi gsang rgyud 'di// gting nas bzung nas khyod la gtad/

khyod kyis sems la brnag par gyis// lcang lor ldan pa'i b+han+d+ha 'di// nga yi lag tu gzung nas ni// snod ldan khyod la dbang bskur ro// b+han+d+ha mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// bde chen gsang ba'i dbang bskur
ba// ltag sprod zur gsum bde chen 'dis// ma mo thams cad bsgrub bya'i phyir// bdud rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang// rkyen bdud dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// sgrol byed chen mo'i dbang thob shog/ dung chen

dag gis dbang bskur bas// snang srid thams cad bsgrags pa bzhin// deng gi yon bdag bu khyod kyang// chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra sgrogs shing// ma mo sgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ zhing chen dag gis dbang bskur
bas// zhing gi khyad par bres pa bzhin// bdud bzhi g.yab kyis bor nas ni// hUM gi me chen 'bar ba yis// bdud bgegs zhi bar bsregs pa bzhin// 'bar byed chen mo'i dbang thob shog/ rnga chen dag

gis dbang bskur bas// rnga yi gsang ba yum gyi ngang// shes rab thabs kyis sgra sgrogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya bskyed nas ni// rnga yi bye brag 'di las byung// gsang ba rnga yi dbang thob shog/ zhing mchog dag

gis dbang bskur bas// thor to rgya mdud khro bo brgyad// thugs kyi sprul pa'i dgra yang 'gyed// sked pa'i rgya mdud gra brgyad la// gsang ba'i ma mo brgyad phyung ste// thugs kyi 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// rtse
mo dag gis zur gsum pas// srid pa'i ma mo dbang du sdud/ khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// zil gyis gnon pa'i dbang thob shog/ rak+ta mAM sas dbang bskur bas// ma mo gsang chen dgyes pa

'dir// sgrol ging chen po skar ltar bkram// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho mtsho ltar rlabs// ma mo sgrub pa'i dbang thob shog/ tshil chen gsur gyis dbang bskur bas// srid pa thams cad dri snom zhing// dri yi mchod pa dam

pa 'dis// gsang ba'i ma mo dri la dad// gsur dang dri la snom pa mo// ci ltar gong du bcol ba bzhin// sgrub pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa bzhin// las kyi dbang rnams sgrub nas ni// dpa' bo chen po'i spyan

snga ru// 'khu ldog bran ltar mi byed cing// sems kyi dag pa nyer bzhag cing// ma mo'i las dbang 'di bskur bas// sgrub pa'i bran pho bran mo bzhin// las dbang chen po'i dbang thob shog/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA

ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badzra swa b+hA wa at+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badzra swa b+hA

wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ ma mo gsang chen 'dus pa 'dir// snying po lnga yis dbang bskur bas// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis// tshe yang shin tu ring ba dang// dngos grub gzi chen thob pa'i phyir// rang
rtags gsal ba'i dbang bskur ro// 'di ni ma mo rang rtags kyi// dbang chen lags so dbang gi mchog/ sgrol ma chen po'i brtul shugs kyis// bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa dang/ rkyen dbang thabs kyis
'dul ba dang// de phyir gsang chen dkyil 'khor rgyud// man ngag bcud kyi don bstan pa// kun gyi thun mong ma lags te// 'di bstan gzhan la bstan gyur na// sa bon sad kyis gsad pa bzhin du
'gyur// sa bon mes tshig bzhin du 'gyur// snod ngan zhabs su zags pa na// nas ngan tshig pa bzhin du 'gyur// don 'di gzhan du mi spel te// rang gi sems la bcangs pa na// dngos grub nyid kyang rtag
tu thob// mthu dang gzi mdangs thams cad 'phel// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// man ngag dbang gi le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// gnod 'dul lha yis yang gsol
pa// ma mo ngos gzung ji ltar gzung// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// ma mo ngos gzung 'di ltar gzung// sems nyid ma bcos mu kha le// sems las bskyed pa'i ma mo bcu gsum dang// dbyings kyi

ma mo bcu bzhi dang// ye shes kyi ma mo nyi shu'o// snang srid kun khyab shu re ma// thugs dam bskang ba'i yum chen lnga// dgra bgegs sgrol ba'i shugs sgrol drug/ drag shul dbang chen ma mo bdun// gnod
byed snying gcod srin mo brgyad// dka' sdod blon mo chen mo dgu/ yang gab dbang gi rgyal mo bzhi// sems las bskyed pa'i ma mo bzhi// dam la gnas pa'i sring mo bzhi// yid la gzhung pa'i mdza' mo

bzhi// lus la bskyed pa'i bu mo bzhi// ma mo kun gyi gtso mo bzhi// bdud rtsi sgrub pa'i rgyal mo bzhi// phur bu sgrub pa'i blon mo bzhi// ma mo thun gyi bdag mo bzhi// las la gshin pa'i bran mo bzhi// da ra

dbugs 'phrog lha mo bzhi// ma mo rtsa khro bdag mo bzhi// dgra bo'i snying phrog lha mo bzhi// kun gzhi gnas gyur gcig pu ma// gling bzhi dbang sgyur grags mo rgyal// stong gsum dbang bsgyur tsa dza shwa re ma/ dgra

bo dbang bsgyur dpal ldan re ma ti// 'jig rten dbang chen dman mo'i tshogs// gshin rje'i lcam mo nyi shu gcig/ las mkhan ma mo brgyad bcu gcig/ byang shar mtshams kyi sring gcig ma// thugs kyi sprul pa

nag mo bdun tshogs nag mo nyi khri'i tshogs// sku yi sprul pa dkar mo bdun tshogs dkar mo nyi khri'i tshogs// gsung gi sprul pa dmar mo bdun tshogs dmar mo'i nyi khri'i tshogs// yon tan gyi ma mo ser nag
bdun/ phrin las kyi ma mo ljang nag bdun tshogs ljang nag nyi khri'i tshogs/ ma mo ngos gzung gi le'u ste sum cu pa'o//// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// snang srid thig ler ji ltar
bsdu// mngon rdzogs yab kyis bka' stsal pa// snang srid thig ler 'di ltar bsdu// de yang gang zhe na/ yid dang kun gzhi dang rnam par shes pa las/ ma mo thig le dgur gsal te/ ma mo lhun gyis rdzogs

pa'i thig le dang/ b+ha ga gnas kyi thig le dang/ ma mo lung gi thig le dang/ ma mo sgrub pa'i thig le dang/ ma mo sprul pa'i thig le dang/ ma mo thabs kyi thig le dang/ ma mo shes rab gyi thig le dang/ ma mo sku

gsung thugs kyi thig le dang/ ma mo byang chub sems kyi thigale'o// kun zlum pa'i thig le zhes kyang bya// klong yangs pa'i thig le zhes kyang bya// brjod du med pa'i thig le zhes kyang bya// ma nor ba zhes kyang bya/
gtan la 'bebs pa zhes kyang bya/ ma bcos pa zhes kyang bya/ rgyu rkyen med pa zhes kyang bya/ ma 'gags pa zhes kyang bya/ ye gnas chen por gnas so// ma mo snang srid thig le'i le'u ste so gcig
pa'o//// rgyud lung byang skor rtsa rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// gnubs nam mkha'i snying pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phan pa'o////

! byang skor gyi rgyud phyi ma/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// sngon 'das pa'i dus ma byung ba'i sngon rol na/ srid pa thams cad kyi sems can mya ngan las 'da' ba dang/ the tshom
bcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa/ rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa dang/ 'jig rten pa yi chos rnams las// sems can mya ngan ji ltar 'da'// rtag chad mtha' gnyis gang du bsdu// yang dag
rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// nyag gcig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// snod kyi 'jig rten kun bzang klong// bcud kyi 'jig rten

sangs rgyas rgyu// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rtag chad mtha' gnyis mya ngan 'das// g.yung drung lha yis yang gsol pa// ston pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// sdud pa rnam gsum gang la bgyi// gnas zhes

bgyi ba ji lta bu// gnas la nges pa du zhig mchis// dus zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// dus la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyi bka' stsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ston pa rnam gsum ye
shes sku// sdud pa rnam gsum rig pa'i gter// 'pho 'gyur med pas gnas zhes bya// yang dag don rtogs dus zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// lha la rnam pa du zhig mchis// 'khor la rnam pa du
zhig mchis// lung la rnam pa du zhig mchis// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' rtsol cig/ nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// lha la rnam pa gsum du bstan// 'khor la rnam pa gsum du bstan// lung
la rnam pa gsum du bstan// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// rgyud ces bgyi ba ji ltar lags// lung zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// man ngag zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag
pa// rgyud ces bya ba 'brel pa'i don// lung zhe bya ba ston pa'i bka'// man ngag ces bya la lnga'o// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// yum gyi dbyings zhes gang la bgyi// yab kyi mkha' zhes gang la

bgyi// blang dor med pa gang gis 'grub// 'khor ba gnas 'di mi 'tshal na// klong zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'du 'bral med pa yum gyi dbyings// skye 'chi med pa yab gyi
mkha'// blang dor med pa bde chen klong// bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na// blang dor med pa de yi 'grub// gnyis med don rtogs de yi ngang// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// chos nyid rtag pa'i g.yung
drung la// sems nyid don gyi la dor na// rtog pa'i lta ba la dor ro// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// ma zhes bgyi ba gang gi dbyings// mo zhes bgyi ba gang gi klong// ma mo'i gtan tshigs ji ltar

lags// 'byung ba lnga po gang las grub// sangs rgyas rgyu nyid gang las grub// bde ba chen po'i ngang nyid las// rgyu rkyen gnyis kyis bskyed lags na// 'byung ba gnyis kyi ngang nyid las// 'di la 'pho 'gyur
mchis lags sam// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// che bas che ba'i zab mo 'di// che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs la brten pas 'grub// ma dang mo yi don rtogs na// ma song ba na nges
par thob// yid bzhin nor bu ma btsal rnyed// ye shes nyi ma rang las shar// chen po lnga yi ngang nyid du// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas so// hUM hUM hUM/ ting 'dzin dbang chen dkyil 'khor rim bzhin
bskyed// bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms thams cad dbang du bsdus// dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag ste zhabs kyang brgyad du bstan// man ngag mdzub tshugs drug gis don rnams tshang bar ston// rdo rje sems
dpas yang gsol pa// sems can dus min 'chi ba rnams// de las zlog na ji ltar bzlog/ bskang ba'i gnas lnga ji ltar lags// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas
kyang// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can dus min 'chi ba de// bskang ba'i gnas lnga 'di rnams so// hUM snang srid thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga ste// dus gsum bde gshegs yum gyi grong nas
bskyed// dbus kyi che mchog sku dang gnyis med bzhugs// mu mthar khyab pa'i thugs dam bdag skong na// thugs dam skongs nas dbang dang dngos grub stsol// shar phyogs rdo rje rigs kyi

gtso// rdo rje dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi gtso// rin chen dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// nub phyogs

pad+ma rigs kyi gtso// pad+ma dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// byang phyogs las rab rigs kyi gtso// las kyi dbyings phyug mi phyed ma// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam
bskang// dbyings kyi ma chen brgyad rnams dang// yul gyi sring mo brgyad rnams kyang// bskang ngo bskal pa'i thugs dam bskang// bskang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol
pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed cing// lu gu rgyud la 'gal byed dang// sems can kun la gnod byed pa'i// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems 'chang rnams// lus sems so sor dbral ba'i phyir// lha dang dbye ba
ji ltar lags// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed cing/ lu gu rgyud la 'gal byed dang/ sems
can kun la gnod byed pa'i// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems 'chang rnams// lus sems so sor dbral ba'i phyir// dbye ba'i las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// 'go ba'i lha dang phral

ba'i phyir// bya rog 'ug pa'i gung ru la// a dang nr-i yi yi ge bri// rme ba rkang gi dreg pas slan// shog shog gru bzhi tshon re la// lha dang mi yi ming bris la// tshon skud sna lngas byad du gzhug/ rkang du rtsa dur bcug

nas ni// 'og gi phyin phyogs dag tu bstan// du+u ra nag pos rkang dur bsdam// ban+d+ha li yi dar gyi gril// a tri sa la'i thag pas bcing// 'da' ra pa ti'i rgyus pas gdags// pa ra ma ti'i du bas gdug/ sri
sha'i shing la btags nas kyang// thang la phyar te sdang mig blta// a ta ba yi lcags kyis brdeg/ rba na ta yi du bas bdug/ tsa ra ta yi mda' yis brdeg/ gu pa ta'i sar yang mgul du gdags// ma la ta yi

sgro nas dbyung// me lce 'bar ba'i snying po bzlas// rnar nyan phra ma'i gzugs bris la// lha dang mi yi bar du gzug/ mA ra Na yi sngags kyis dbye// mtshon cha'i phyag rgya bcas nas ni// gzugs kyi bar du brdeg

par bya// rak+sha ru pa'i sngags kyis gdab// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// ang+ku sha yi sngags kyis drangs// zhags pa'i phyag rgya gnyis bcing la// pA sha hUM gi sngags kyis bcing// lcags sgrog phyag
rgya gnyis bcings la// s+pho Ta baM gyi sngags gyis bsdam// dril bu'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// g+haN+De ho yi sngags kyis spar// bdag nyid dbang chen skur bsgoms te// pho nya drug cus rten la

dbab// gong gi las rnams sbyar la bya// des ni mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// des ni mtshan ma ma byung na// 'da' ra pa ti'i sob pa la// ma la ti yi khrag gis bris// gdang ta ga na'i dong du gzhug/ che mchog
yab yum bsgoms nas ni// sman mo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas gdab// sgrub pa'i phrin las gzhung bzhin bya// nye 'byed kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// dam tshig 'das
pa'i sngags zer dang// 'jig rten mtshan ma'i byol po dang// lha 'dre drag por g.yos pa yi// ngan sngags rdzu 'phrul ji ltar zlog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas
kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// dam tshig 'das pa'i sngags zer dang// 'jig rten mtshan ma'i byol po dang// drag por g.yab pa'i rdzu 'phrul rnams// bzlog pa'i las rnams ngas bstan

gyis// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ngan sngags par bus zlog pa'i phyir// gtan tshigs man ngag 'di gsungs so// ba ko 'dra ba'i maN+Dal gzhung bzhin bya/ swats+tsha ca ti mang du gdab// phyi yi bshags pa

gzhung bzhin bya// de nas gsang ba'i mtshams bcad do// las kyi dkyil 'khor gzhung bzhin bya// nang gi sarba ru pa gtong// bskang gso spang skong grangs kyi gdon// bskang ba'i gnas lnga bzhin du bskang// ma

hA shAn+ti'i cho ga bya// ma mor grags pa kun kyang bskang// yo byad nag po gzhung bzhin gtang// rtags dang mtshan ma zhib tu brtags// rtags dang mtshan ma zin pa dang// bskang bzlog cho ga brtsam par
bya// des ni mtshan ma zlog par 'gyur// bzlog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bskyar te yang gsungs pa// bskang ba des kyang ma bskangs na// dbang gi rgyal po'i skur bsgoms te// rtsa ba gang yin
ma mo de// ku sha la la gzugs byas te// yan lag bsdus la rgya yis gdab// dman mo lnga bcu rtsa gsum yang// shing shun dag la gzugs bris la// ta ra ba ti'i skud pas gdags// ye shes ma mo bcu bzhi
yang// che mchog sku ru bsgom nas ni// mgo lus bsnol te gdan du gding// des ni ngan sngags zlog par 'gyur// galate las su ma grub na// brtags te rtsa ba gang yin pa// shog shog dag la gzugs byas
la// mchog gi phur bu g.yas pas brdeg/ sman mo lnga bcu rtsa gsum yang// 'jag ma dag la gzugs byas la// zangs kyi phur bu dmar pos gdab// dbus kyi ma mo bcu gsum yang// zhing gi shun ma'i ras
ma la/ khrag dang mtshal gyis gzugs byas la// gser ram ser po'i phur bus gdab// des ni ngan sngags zlog par 'gyur// gal te las su ma grub na// dbus kyi che mchog yab yum
gnyis// spra tshil dag la gzugs byas la// lcags sam nag po'i phur pa yis// thugs ka nyid du gdab par bya// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// kI la ya yi sngags brjod pas// chos nyid dbyings su
gdab par bya// che mchog rtags kyi phyag rgya yis// 'gyur med dbyings su rgyas gdab bo// ngan sngags phur bus bzlog pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// de ltar ngan sngags

bzlog nas ni// sngon du snga ma'i sngags zer des// tshe srog nyams na ji ltar gso// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsol cig/ sngon du snga ma'i sngags zer des/ tshe srog nyams na gso ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i cho

ga ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// stegs bu 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de dbus su// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad bri// pad+ma chen po de dbus su// rin chen 'bar ba zur

brgyad bri// de dbus zla gam zlum po la// b+han+d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa bzhag/ rin chen 'bar ba zur brgyad la// lnga la rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga// gnyis la sme sha pra mo ha// gcig la tshe yi snying po bri// pad+ma chen po

'dab brgyad la// phyogs bzhir khros pa'i dbang chen bskyed// mtshams bzhir gsang ba'i yum bzhi dgod// phyogs bzhir phyag rgya chen po bzhi// gnyis la thod phreng rgya mtsho gnyis// gcig la tshe yi snying po

bri// sman mo phye ma don gyis sbyar// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du// bkra shis brgyad kyang dgod par bya// sgo bzhir khro bo bzhi yang dgod// tshil chen mar me rgyun mi gcad// yo byad tshogs pa'i zas rnams

la// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis btab la bzhag/ ma mo spyi yi phyag rgya bcos// A yuHbya ba'i sngags kyis gdab// dngos grub rtags dang sbyar nas ni// gso bskyed bzlas shing bstim par bya/ tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga
pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// thig le'i spyod pa nyams pa dang// dpa' bo'i thig le nyams pa dang// las de slar la zlog pa'i phyir// nyag gcig yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag

rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// las de slar yang zlog pa'i phyir// nges pa'i man ngag ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba'i tshe// bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bkrol nas

ni// dgra yi yul phyogs bltas nas ni// gro ga shing shun ras sogs la// mi de'i ming smras byang bur bris nas ni// de yi lag tu bskur nas ni// shugs sgrol ma yi sngags kyis gdab/ khrag dang dug gi gtor
ma yang// rabs chad thod par bshams nas ni// yul sa de yi phyogs su gtor// las rnams nges par gdon mi za// snying gi phur bu phyung nas ni// a mr-i ta yis mchod byas nas// dam rdzas gtsang

ma'i gtor ma la/ khu sa ra yi khrag gis sbreng// gang yin de phyogs kha bltas te// gtso 'khor tshul bzhin bskul nas ni// lus kyang gsig cing phyag rgya bsdam// bdag nyid dbang gi bskur bsgom te// dbang

drag phyag rgya bcas nas ni// gzugs de nyid la tsham rngams bya// drag shul dbang gis bskyod la gtang// de ltar sman mo rnams drag shul gyis dbang du bsdus la gtong/ las mi 'grub mi srid do// 'di ni rom+bu

gu h+ya tsan+d+ra'i man ngag gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// bsdams pa'i phyag rgya bkrol nas ni// brig sha'i lcags kyis sdom nas ni// bing gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni// rdo rje gnod 'gros gong ma yis// phyogs der
drag tu btud 'gro'o// yab yum sngags kyis btab nas ni// bing gi phyag rgya drag bsgyur na// des ni mod la las rnams 'grub// lan gsum byas na na bar 'gyur// lan lnga byas na 'chi bar 'gyur// snying gi
phur bu phyung nas ni// lan gsum drag tu dril byas te// spyi bo dag tu gdab par bya// lcags sna lnga yi phur pa la// dbang drag las rnams gzhung bzhin bya// des ni nges par gdon mi za// mon nam rabs

chad thod pa la// nang du ma bdun snying po bri// spyi gtsug nyi zla thod phreng bri// chags 'dzin spun gnyis rna ltag go/ tshon skud gnyis kyis mig nas gdags// rak+sha ru tra'i sngags kyis gdab// bing gi phyag rgya

gnyis bsgril te// drag tu bskul te 'phangs la btang// zhing gi sha tshil ras ma yis// ma mo rnams la gtang rag gtong// las rnams 'grub par gdon mi za// slob dpon pad+ma sam+b+ha ba'i man ngag go/ ngan
sngags par bus bsad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed cing// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang/ sems can kun la gnod byed pa// rtag
tu gdug pa'i sems gyur na// nan tur 'og tu ji ltar bca'// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed
cing// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed dang// sems can kun la gnod byed pa// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur na// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// srog gi rtsa rnams skam

pa'i phyir// ra sog gro ga shing shun nam// g.yam pa sngon po'i ngos dag la/ khyi khrag ra khrag gsol ba yis// dgra bo'i gzugs su bris nas ni// tsher ma can gyi shing rnams sam// prig sha ba yi shing bu la// ra
ti dmar po'i 'dre lcags gdab// dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg par bya// yang na ta ka'i shun pa la// na pa gu ti'i yi ge bris// mgo la mkha' 'gro lnga po yang// tsa ra ma ti ta yis bri// lte bar

chags 'dzin spun gnyis bri// rkang pa gnyis la ma bdun bri// g.yas pa'i dum bu bzhi po la// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi bri// g.yon pa'i dum bu bzhi po la/ khros pa'i dbang chen bzhi po bri// gsang ba'i yum

bzhi klad pa'i rgyas// nyi zla thod phreng snying gi dkyil// phra men rgyal mtsho mkhal ma'i dkyil// ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo ni// phud kyi gtso mor bzhugs su gsol// phyi yi sman mo 'khor rnams ni// gdugs rtsib

khar dang phyug re'o// yang phyin chen mo rgyus pa'o// dus drug rgyu ba'i dgra bo ni// sha ba gnyan dang ba glang ngo// 'di ni nam gyi gung la rgyu// rta dang lug dang ra gsum ni// 'di ni nyin bzhin rgyu ba'o// rje khol drug

cu rtsa bzhi yang// dus drug rgyu ba de bzhin no// myur du bsgral ba'i sngags rnams ni// gong ma'i sngags rnams bstan pa ni// sngags yung dkar la khri 'bum du// bzlas pas gzugs la brdeg par bya// g.yon
gyi rme lag gcad nas ni// rang gi dpral ba'i dbyes su gzhag/ bdud kyi chas su zhugs nas ni// skra bshig mig gnas mchil ma dbyung// de phyogs nyid du bltas nas ni// nga ro drag po bsgrags nas

kyang// g.yas pa'i phyag rgya sdigs 'dzub kyis// sngags 'di drag tu bzlas la brdeg/ snying la zla ba tsi ma sha/ ro la khrag 'thung kang+ka sha zan/ yang tang bar la to/ sha la khyi spyang/ kra he kra he/ badzra b+han+d+ha b+h+yo/ ru lu
ru lu/ khrag skems kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// shrI dz+nyA na'i man ngag 'di srog dang 'dra'o// dge sdig lus la dri ma dang 'dra'o//// rdo rje sems dpas yang gsol pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed
pa// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed cing// sems can kun la gnod bgyid pa'i// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur na// nan tur las rnams ji ltar 'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag nyan 'tshal// de skad
gsol pa gsan nas kyang// ngo mtshar lha yis bka' stsal pa// bstan pa gnyan po 'jig byed pa// lu gu rgyud las 'gal byed cing// sems can kun la gnod byed pa'i// rtag tu gdug pa'i sems gyur
na// nan tur las rnams ngas bstan gyi// nyon cig g.yung drung yang dag pa// ji ltar yi dam gnas gsum ni// 'bru sna tshogs pa'i mi gzugs la// mkhar thabs mda' yis brgyan nas ni// sle'u bzang dar

dkar chas kyis brgyan// yo byad tshogs pa'i sder chas dang// za 'og dag gis rnam par brgyan// le'u bzang sle 'u dgra yi rkyen// rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyi brgyan// ma hA shan+tiM gzhung bzhin brjod// pho rigs
rnams la gzhung bzhin bsngo// de nas gzhung bzhin bsngos pa dang// sol ba'i dong gru gsum kyi nang du glud phyi rgan du mnan la/ de'i steng dgra gang yin pa'i gzugs ra sog la bris la kha sbub tu

mnan te/ de'i steng du rdo rje rgya gram gyi mnan no// de nas dgra bo'i ming bris te/ 'o dod bos la gtad do// las myur du 'grub bo// smyug rgod la dpag bsam shing gi gzugs byas la/ gro ga'ang shing shun la
gzugs byas te/ snying gar khrag gis ming bris la gser g.yu gnyis btags la skos rje drang dkar la bsngos la/ de nas man+ta li'i dar du gtums la/ 'da' ra pa tis gdags so// a ti pa ta'i thag pas
bcing ngo// 'o dod drag du 'bod do// des dmod mo drag pos thebs te 'ong ngo// lcags dang gser g.yu bsres la/ khol po srid pa zhig 'dzin la bsngos la/ gong du bstan pa'i gzugs dang yas stags
bsres la/ rus sbal gyi shun par gtums la yar la ta'i dong du gzhug go/ ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo'i phyag rgyas gdab bo// des ni dbang po mi gsal ba dang/ dig pa dang lkugs par byed do// lcags dang

gser dang zangs dang gsum brdar la ya bdud chen po la bsngos la/ gong du bstan pa'i gzugs la snga ma'i yas stags bsre la mu la'i dong du gzhug go/ che mchog rtags kyi phyag rgyas gdab bo// de ltar byas
na glo bur du 'chi bar 'gyur ro// glud zan bre gang ba gcig la gling phran bcu gnyis kyi gzugs byas la/ dkor chas brgyan la yar la shod kyi skyes te re la bsngos la/ de nas 'jam ma la mi'i gzugs byas

la/ gro ga la dgra bo'i ming bris la gzugs kyi snying gar blan no// zan za ba'i tshul byed du gzhug go/ 'o dod drag po 'bod do// de ltar byas na glo bur du thum bur 'ong ngo// rus pa sna tshogs pa spungs nas

gshin rje'i rgyal po la bsngos la/ yas stags de'i gseb tu khams la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// snying gar ming rus bris la kha nub phyogs su bstan la/ mda' bkang ba'i tshul du bya'o// ci yang rung ba'i zhing
lpags yang bskon no// gshin rje nag po'i sngags kyis gdab bo// mi nor du ming btags pa sna tshogs pa'i dkyil du rtswa la gzugs byas la/ gro ga la ming bris la/ sa la u ma de wa'i gzugs byas la/ u ma

de bI'i steng du bskyon la/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i tshul du byon// ma hA de wa ni b+han dza mA ra ya phaT/ ces pa'i sngags kyis gdab bo// de ltar byas na mkhal sked na ba dang/ pho mtshan skrangs pa dang/ chu 'gag
nas 'chi'o// dung dang gser g.yu dang bse dang mtshal la sogs pa yas stags sna tshogs dang/ dgra bo'i ming byang bris la/ ra ti dmar po'i pags par gtums la/ pa ti pa la ma naH zhes bzlas te de la
gdab par bya'o// des ni myur du 'bog par 'gyur ro// gser dang dung dang lcags gsum la/ dgra bo'i ming bris te bsres la/ rdza ma nag po'i 'og tu bcug la/ ba ti tsa ra na'i sngags btab la

bos shing gtad na rbab dang brag g.yang du 'chi'o// cho ga byed pa'i dus su ma mo'i bdud chas su zhugs// ngo la khrag gis byug la/ bdag nyid mu kha le'am dbang chen gyi sa mA tir zhugs la/ gzhung bzhin du
las bcol lo// pho rigs phyi ma la las gtad cing las bcol ba ni/ yod na 'khu ldog che la rgyab 'gyur che bas 'dir ma gsungs so// dgra bo bdud la gtad pa'i las so// grags pa gzhon nu'i gdung

rabs ni// nyi shu rtsa gnyis brgyud pa yi// drag po'i ngan sngags bdun po ni// chu srin gre bar rin chen song ba bzhin// bskal par yang ni mi gtang ngo// rmongs la 'chal bas byin gyur na// dus min bar ni
