bya/ lha'i 'dzab tshang bar bzlas la 'dzab tshang ba dang/ ma mo re ma ti sha khrag la rol pa'i snying po 'di bdun 'bum bzlas so// drag tu brjod na gang la bya ba'i dmigs bya/ ring por mi thogs par rdul du rlog nus

so// re ma ti'i bsnyen pa ni/ dam tshig gtsang mar byas la gnas gtsang mar song ste// gos nag po gon thod nag po bcing/ khrag sna mang po'i gtor ma bya/ sha sna mang po'i gtor ma byas la sha sna mang po bsags la/

b+han+d+ha'i nang du mar gyis bkang la sman bstsal/ sha chen gyi dud pa btang/ snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bskul lo// bcol dam drag tu bya/ re ma ti'i sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// phra men las kyi
rgyal mo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so//// de nas phra men ma rnams dam rdzas tshang bas mchod par bya ste/ mthing ka mchog stobs dpal gyi yum// rdo rje thugs kyi dbang phyug ma// ko'u rI ma yis mchod pa
rol// gser gyi 'od 'phro mda' 'phen ma// rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma// tso'u rI ma yis mchod pa rol// dmar mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin// pad+ma gsung gi dbang phyug ma// pra mo ha yis mchod

pa rol// nag mo ral pa thod par 'gyings// karma las kyi dbang phyug ma// bai tA li yis mchod pa bzhes// zhe sdang gtum khro spa gri'i so// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// g+has ma rI yis mchod pa rol// rin

chen me lce phreng ba can// gti mug 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// puk+ka sI yis mchod pa rol/ kha T+wAM mtshon gyi char 'bebs ma// 'dod chags 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// sma sha ni yis mchod pa rol/ khro mo'i phyag

na dgra s+t+wa bsnams// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// tsan+Da li yis mchod pa rol// 'jigs pa bzhi yi sgo 'gegs shing// thar pa brgyad kyi lam ston pa// de bzhin gnas kyi phyag rgya ma// ko'u rI la sogs

mchod pa 'bul// rdo rje ging chen phra men ma// 'jigs pa'i gdong can gtum byed can// seng ha gsod byed seng ge'i mgo/ ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma// mu khas rol gcig ra tsa ma// byA g+h+ri mgo can stag gi

mgo/ thod rlon 'drad pa'i phra men ma// mu khas rol cig byA g+h+ri ma// sri la byis ldag wa yi mgo/ lpags chen ldag pa'i phra men ma// mu khas rol pas he he kram// sho na sha 'dred spyang mo'i gdong// sha chen za ba'i phra

men ma// mu khas rol pas b+hak+Sha khA hi// kri ta khrag 'thung bya rgod mchu// dmar chen 'jig pa'i phra men ma// mu khas rol pas kri ta b+h+yo// kang+ka snying 'byin dur bya'i mgo/ nang rol za ba'i phra men ma// mu khas rol

pas kang+ka ma/ kha kha rgyu 'dren bya rog snar// nang khrol za ba'i phra men ma// mu khas rol pas kA kA le// hu lu sems 'phrog 'ug pa'i mgo/ glo snying za ba'i phra men ma// mu khas rol pas U lu ka/ rta gdong dkar

mo lcags kyu ma// nyams pa thams cad snying nas 'dren// mu khas rol pas dza dza hUM/ phag gdong nag mo mche ba can// 'khor ba thams cad 'ching ba'i phyir// rdo rje dril zhags sdog cing 'phen// mu khas rol pas a

mo g+ha hUM// nyi zla ma ste smug dmar ma// rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar gyi bdag/ mus khas rol pas lo ka baM// thal byed chen mo ljang nag ma// dril chen 'phyar te gsod pa'i tshul// mu khas rol pas g+hasmi ba la ho// zhes

brjod la mchod cing bstod do// phra men spyang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ mchod cing bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// de nas phra men ma rnams la phrin las bcol ba ni 'di skad do// kau rI dkar mos
zhing dbyug phyar/ khams gsum rdul du rlogs pa'i dpa' rtags can// dam nyams rdul du rlogs pa'i phrin las mdzod// tsau rI ser mo thabs kyi mda' gzhu 'gengs// chags pa'i dbang gis gtso bo'i thugs kar

'dzin// pra mo dmar mo chu srin rgyal mtshan phyar// bdud bzhi pham mdzad che ba'i rgyal mtshan phyar// bai tA nag mo za byed rdo rje 'phyar zhing 'gyings// stang stabs chags pa'i dbang gis khams gsum

ma lus dbang du sdud// puk+ka dmar ser zhing gi rgyu zhags 'dzin// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i gnas nas sgrol cing stob// g+has ma ljang dmar dung dmar dkrug/ lcang lor bcas pa'i b+han+d+ha dmar gyis bkang ba

la// thabs dang ldan pa'i rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol// sme sha mthing nag log rtog 'bral// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgyun rtsa rtsad nas gcod// tsan+d+ha ser skya zhing gi tsit+ta 'dren// b+han+d+ha skam rlon thod phreng se ral

kha// seng ha gsod byed seng ge'i gzugs// zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin// mi ro za ba'i phra men ma// dgra bo'i ro la rol cing gshegs su gsol// byA g+h+ri chen mo stag gi mgo// dpa' bor bzhugs pa'i ting

nge 'dzin// mgo rus 'cha' ba'i phra men ma// dgra bo'i mgo la rol cing gshegs su gsol// sri la dur kun wa yi gzugs// sgyu rtsal che ba'i ting 'dzin ni// lpags chen za ba'i phra men ma// dgra bo'i pags pa

rol cing gshegs su gsol// shwa na mu kha spyang mo'i gzugs// rtog pa 'joms pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sha chen za ba'i phra men ma// dgra bo'i sha la rol cing gshegs su gsol// kri ta khrag 'thung bya rgod

mgo/ gnam 'phang gcod pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ khrag tshil za ba'i phra men ma// dgra bo'i khrag la rol cing gshegs su gsol// kang ka'i tshe 'phrog dur bya'i gzugs// gti mug sel ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// keng

rus 'cha' ba'i phra men ma// dgra rus 'cha' zhing gshegs su gsol// kA kA rgyu 'dren bya rog gdong// rdo rje spar byed ting 'dzin gyis// nang khrol za ba'i phra men ma// dgra bo'i nang la rol cing gshegs su

gsol// hu lu yid 'phrog 'ug pa'i gdong// snang gsal sgron khyer ting nge 'dzin// glo snying za ba'i phra men ma// bgegs kyi snying la rol cing gshegs su gsol/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ci 'dra

ba// byams mgon khyed kyi thugs kyi ga la bzod// gang la ci 'dul 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams// myur du sgrol mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// sngon gyi smon lam thugs rjes che mnga' bas// 'khor ba yun ring 'gro
ba'i sdug bsngal la// rtag tu don mdzad skyong la mi mkhyen te// yid bzhin re skong phag gdong zhags pa ma// thams cad mkhyen nyid nyi zla'i spyan mnga' ste// rmongs pa'i mun sel bag chags ma lus

bsregs// 'khor ba'i rgyud mkhyen ci 'dul der ston pa// blo gros mig 'byed lcags sgrogs nyi zla ma// mya ngan mi 'da' 'khor ba mtha' gtug par/ khyod kyis thugs rjes mi gtong rtag tu brtson// phrin las rnam
bzhis ma lus sgrol mdzad pa// ded dpon khyed nyid thal byed dril bu ma// zhes bskul lo// phra men spyang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ phrin las bskul ba'i le'u ste nyi shu tham pa'o//// de nas

phra men ma 'di rnams la rtsis 'go rnam pa bdun gyis ston te/ de yang gang zhe na/ dgyes pa skyed pa dang/ mnyes pa stobs pa dang/ rgyu la rol pa dang/ 'bras bur grub pa dang/ za byed kyi tshogs dang/ mgyogs

byed kyi tshogs dang/ 'jigs byed kyi tshogs dang bdun no// phra men spyang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ don gyi nying khu'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//// de nas badzra ko'u rI ma kha dog sngon por bstan pa ni/

phrin las zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// sems can gyi don byed pa yin la/ tsau rI ma kha dog ser por bstan pa ni// phrin las rgyas pa'i rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don byed pa yin la/ pra mo hA sku mdog dmar por

bstan pa ni/ phrin las dbang gi rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don byed pa yin la/ badzra bai ta lI sku mdog nag mo bstan pa ni/ phrin las drag po'i rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don byed pa yin la/ badzra puk+ka sI

kha dog dmar ser du bstan pa ni phrin las dbang rgyas rang bzhin gyis sems can gyi don byed pa yin no// badzra g+has ma rI phyag na b+han+d+ha rak+ta dmar gyis bkang nas rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol ba'o// badzra tsaN+Da lI phyag

g.yon pa na zhing gi lus 'dzin pa ni mtshan ma'i bem po yin la/ g.yas kyis mgo gcod pa'o// seng ha mu khA seng ge'i mgo can/ byAr+Sha g+h+ri mu kha stag gi mgo can/ badzra sri la mu kha wa'i mgo can/ shwa na mu kha spyang ka'i

mgo can/ badzra kri ta mu kha bya rgod mgo can/ badzra kang+ka mu kha dur bya'i mgo can/ badzra kA kA mu kha bya rog gi mgo can/ badzra u la ka mu la kha 'ug pa'i mgo can/ phra men las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ rtog pa bshad
pa'i le'u ste rtsa gnyis pa'o//// de nas phra men rnams la dngos grub blang ba ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad zla gam du bsgyur la 'di skad do// dpal chen yab yum dkyil 'khor nas// thabs dang shes rab

dngos grub stsol// smug nag 'bar ba'i me ri las// rnam shes brgyad kyi dngos grub stsol// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me ri las// drag shul mthu brgyad dngos grub stsol// tshad med sgo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor nas// phrin

las rnam bzhi'i dngos grub stsol// zhes brjod la gsang ba'i rdzas dang bcas spyad do// phra men spyang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ dngos grub blang ba'i le'u ste rtsa gsum pa'o//// de nas dkyil 'khor de

nyid du dbang bskur ba ni/ sgrub pa'i rdzas thams cad kyis slob ma rnams kyi spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// hUM me ri smug nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor nas// dpal chen yab yum dbang mchog khyod la sbyin// phyogs
bzhi mtshams brgyad steng 'og zla gam dkyil 'khor nas// grub pa'i ma brgyad dbang mchog khyod la sbyin// 'bar ba'i bar khyams brgyad gyi dkyil 'khor nas// yang sprul brgyad kyi dbang mchog khyod

la sbyin// sgo bzhi rdo rje'i brag gi dkyil 'khor nas// 'jug pa'i sgo bzhi'i dbang mchog khyod la sbyin// phra men spyang ki las kyi rgyal mo'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//// de nas
dkyil 'khor bsdu'o// rdzogs so//// ! dpal chen mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'das dang ma byon dus nyid na// lcang lo can gyi pho brang du// 'jigs byed chen po'i sku cir yang snang ba gnod

sbyin 'dul ba'i rtse la/ dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan te/ ye shes dgu'i dbu dang/ stong pa bco brgyad kyi phyag dang/ thar pa brgyad kyi zhabs su ldan te/ gyad dang brjid pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// gnod sbyin

lha'i 'dun sa phyi sho'i 'khor la/ bka' sdod chen po/ rgya gram 'bar ba'i gdan la mi 'jigs pa gsum dang bcas nas/ mi ldon par rtog pa'i tshul gyis/ bsdu ba chen po gzhan don du mdzad pa'o// mkha' lnga

dbus kyi gting khung du bsdus te/ 'bar ba'i rwa lnga la/ mu tig 'bar bas 'dril ba/ rlung nag zla gam la/ smin pa chen pos brgyan pa khyams bzhi 'khor lo'i tshul du dbyings su dril ba/ spangs pa thams cad kyi pho
brang/ thun mong ma yin par 'brel te bde ba chen po'i gnas pa'o// sprul pa'i cha byad mang po dang bcas pa/ mi 'gyur ba yab yum la/ shugs 'gro lnga yi mdangs kyis brgyan// mi 'gyur thig le'i 'od kyis

mdzes// rdo rje 'bar ba'i bzhi ru ldan// shes pa brgyad kyi rten du gnas// bzhad par byed pa'i 'od du 'bar// dwangs ma yul gyi mkha' 'gro rnams// nye ba'i 'khor du gnas pa'o// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i mkha'

'gro ni// bskyod dang smin pas 'degs par byed// za byed bdun gyi dkyil 'khor la// sku gsung thugs kyi mtha' brgya can// bdud rtsi bcud kyi mkha' 'gro drug/ rtse dang skyob pa brgyad du ldan// las byed bcu

gnyis brgyad kyis bskor// sku yi ma dang gsung gi sring// thugs ni cho 'phrul ldan pa'o// bshad pa bzhi gnyis dus bzhir bcas// tshangs chen lha yi tshul khrims can// gnam gyi dkar po thugs rje can// brgya

byin ser skya yon tan mdzod// b+h+ring gi ri ti mtshan bzhir ldan// 'khor lo khyab 'jug spu gri bsnams// stobs bzang chen po gnod sbyin 'joms// skos rje 'phrul gyi me long 'phyar// bdud kyi rgyal po srid pa

shig/ 'byung rings spun dgu'i cho 'phrul 'gyed// phag chen po ni brtul zhugs ldan// phung byed bdun kyi sring mo 'dul// nor bdag chen po ne'u le bsnams// rgyal chen bzhi ni dmag dpon mdzod// gshin rje rU
tra 'khor rnams bsdus// ging dang bse yi skye sa bstan// bdud dang gshin rje'i ma ru tse// de lta bu yi 'khor tshogs dang// rang bzhin thabs gcig bzhugs pa'i tshe// rang bzhin 'khor ni shugs
kyis 'dul// las kyi 'khor ni sprul pas 'dul// srung byed 'khor ni thabs kyis 'dul// sgrol byed 'khor ni mdzad pas 'dul// thabs kyi 'khor ni rol pas 'dul// de yi 'dul thabs 'di lta ste// skye med mi
g.yo chos kyi dbyings// rang bzhin shugs kyis 'dul thabs so// snang srid rig pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// snyigs ma'i ma mo 'jig par 'gyur// gnyis med sras kyis rol pa yis// sku gsung thugs kyi ma mo
'jig/ rig pa gar thabs sna tshogs kyi// bshan pa'i dpung rnams 'joms pa'i dpal// mngon spyod rig pa'i brtul zhugs kyis// srid pa'i pho rgyud mtshan mar 'joms// 'dul thabs lnga las ye shes

shar// gsal la mi rtog ye shes dang// mnyam la ma 'dres ye shes dang// bye brag 'byed pa'i ye shes dang// phrin las rdzogs pa'i ye shes dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes dang// 'khor las 'phrul pa 'di lta

ste// dang po lha dang gnyis pa mi// gsum pa yi dwags yin pa ste// bzhi pa byol song gnas rigs la// lnga pa dmyal ba'i 'khrul 'khor la'o// rtogs pa'i sa rnams 'di lta ste// tha ma bsgral bas dang po ste// kun tu

'od du shar ba'o// bzhi pa gnyis pa'i don du'o// pad+ma can du snang ba'o// gsum pa gnas su grol ba'o// 'khor lo tshogs chen don du ldan// gnyis pa dag pa bzhi pa la// ye shes bla ma non pa'o// gcig la lnga yi

don du ste// rdzogs pa'i spyi cig don du shar// 'khor lnga smin pa'i 'bras bu lnga// dang po sa yi 'od yin te// gnyis pa me yi 'od du 'bar// gsum pa chu yi mdangs su ldan// bzhi pa spyod pa'i thabs yin te// lnga pa

nam mkha'i ye shes so// dang po rtsa la gnyis pa khrag/ gsum pa dbugs la bzhi pa drod// lnga pa bkrag gi ngo bo'o// 'khor gyis bsdu ba 'di lta ste// dpal chen thugs kyi thig le rdzogs// hUM ni snying rje chen pos

te// 'a ni byams pa'i rang bzhin la// ha ni dga' ba chen po ste// zla tshes btang snyoms bdag nyid bsam// nga ni brtson 'grus 'byung ba la// a ni shes rab chen po don// ma zhar bsdus par mya ngan bzlas// mi
dmigs chos kyi dbyings su thim// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las gleng gzhi dang/ 'khor mya ngan las bzla ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//// rgyal mtshan rim pa gang lags pa// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan

'tshal// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa// dben la gnyan pa'i chu klung du// ma mo 'du ba'i dur khrod du// gnod sbyin 'du ba'i mdung rtse dang// srin mo 'du ba'i sbar bshad dang// spel dang 'gugs dang

dbrog pa dang// mnan dang sba ba de bzhin no// mchod dang bskang ba'i rdzas rnams dang// bum lnga rten du bcas pas te/ khru bzhi sbyangs pa'i man+Dal du// dbang gi skud pas phye nas ni// gdul byed lnga

dang ldan par bya// dbus su zla gam sgo bzhi la// dbang gi dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brgyan// pad bzhi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan// snam bu sgo yis rnam par mdzes// che mchog yab yum gsal byas te// thugs

las bum pa b+h+rUM gyis brlabs// nyi zla'i steng du lha lnga dgod// sgo bzhir glu 'degs snying po 'god// rgyal mo lnga yi snying po bskyed// lha mo lnga yi dkyil 'khor la// sgo ma bzhi yis mdzes par bskyed// gtso bo thugs

las 'od 'phros pas// bskul bas dza dang nri ru drangs// yab yum bsnyen pa mkha' ru spros// bsnol mar drangs pas 'od du gsal// yab la rigs lnga dbu la rdzogs// yum lnga mkha' la shar ba'o// dkyil 'khor

zhal ni bsgyur byas la// zhi ba nub sgo shar du ste// thig bzhi ldan pa'i dgur rdzogs pa// pad brgyad mu khyud rab mdzes pa'o// de tshe phyogs bzhir bskyed bya ba// ye shes gtum mo bzhi po dang// bzhad pa'i rgyal mo
bzhi po gsal// zur bzhi dgyes sde rab tu bsam// sgo bzhi gru 'degs bsam byas te// 'khor gyi ma mo bcu drug dbus// yum gyi gnam zhal gdangs pa ru/ thig le bcud kyi thabs mtshams su// nyi zla 'bar

ba'i ga 'u ru// nr-i yi rtse la ha lnga bsam// de ni rgyal mo lnga yi rgya// de steng rta mgrin dbang gi rgya// rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i rgya// rwa la nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgya// de nas sngags kyi pho nya rgya// yab yum sngags la las

sngags gdags// oM shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri phaT/ nr-i A yu sha dza/ gtso bo'i thugs las 'od 'phros pas// bcu drug ma mo brgyud bskul te// tshe rten nr-i ru drangs nas su// gtso bo'i thugs las bsdus byas

pas// rdo rje'i lam byung gnam zhal mkha'// rta mgrin zhal nas ga 'ur 'khyil// tshig gi pho nya dgug byas pa// hUM che zhes che mo gsang ba'i yum// thig le sbyor ba'i yum gcig ma// dkar mo nyi zla thod phreng

can// gru gsum 'bar ba'i mig gcig ma// g.yu yi ral pas srid pa sgrol// chags pa'i phyag gis pad+ma 'dzin// rin chen mche ma skye 'gro'i gsos// tsit+ta zhags pas mu stegs sgrol// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyi tshe drongs

shig/ de nas spel bar bya ste// g+h+ri la mu+u ran hUM A yuShe hUM a b+hi sha san+ti A yu+u She hUM a bi yang lang ti A yu+u She hUM a/ ma hA lang ti hUM A yuShe hUM a/ che mchog kun gyi 'phro 'du yis// ga'u rgyal mo lnga bskul bas// 'phro

'du nyi ma'i 'od ltar spel// de nas tshe gnas bya ba ni// rgyal mo lnga po rten la bsdu// hUM mkha' mnyam pa yi ye shes ni// chos dbyings nyi ma lta bu la// 'phro 'du ye shes lnga ru shar// bag chags lnga yi rgyud sbyang
nas// 'byung ba lnga yi bcud bsdus pas// mi 'gyur tshe yi dngos grub thob// bum pa bshig la tshe dbang bskur// gnon po'i sngags kyis bral byas la// smin mtshams sbas la rgya yis gdab// 'brang

rgyas bkra shis gsal byas nas// mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi gtang rag gtong// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las rgyal po bsgyur ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// srid pa rgyud kyi byung

tshul dang// grub pa'i don ni 'bras bu gnyis// ngo mtshar lha la bdag nyan 'tshal// bcu tsho bzhi rdzogs rgyal sogs de// lha mo yongs 'khyud bde ba mas// bka' don gtan tshigs gtan la phab// mi nub tshe yi

gtan tshigs dag/ rtogs pa don gyi che ba dang// sa gzhi lta bu gcan 'phrang dang// rgyal po lta bu'i bka' nyan dang// mdzad pa thabs kyi thabs dang// gsal ba don gyi dkyil 'khor dang// lhun gyis grub pa'i

bsgrub pa dang// mngon spyod las kyi mtha' rnams// nga yi gsang rgyud chen po'i don// gzhi gnyis don du+u ngas bstan gyis// 'khor gyi gtso bo sems gtod cig/ brjod bya rjod byed thabs tshul gyis// dgos dang
dgos pa'i bye brag dang// 'brel ba thabs kyi gtan tshigs rnams// 'brel don gtan tshigs gtan la phab// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ gleng slong ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// rtogs pa'i don ni 'di lta

ste// skye med mi gnas gzung 'dzin bral// ma skyes phyir na skye ba med// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med pa'i don// mi g.yo sems kyi bdag nyid la// 'pho 'gyur med pa'i rig pa gsal// 'byung lnga sems kyi sprul pa

la// ye shes lnga yi mtha' rgya can// kun 'dus snang srid dbyings la 'dus// 'pho 'gyur dus gsum ngang du gsal// snang srid rang shar kun tu bzang// ye nas ma gshegs rang byung ba// snang srid phyag rgya chen

po'i don// kun bzang klong gi dkyil 'khor la// rig pa thugs kyi 'od shar ba// mdzes pa yul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// don kun rgyal ba'i thugs las rdzogs// rgyal ba thugs rje gnyis med don// skye 'gag ma
lus sems la gsal// ma 'gags rig pa'i ye shes la// snod bcud kun gyi 'od 'dus pa// mkha' la rlung gi don du shar// ma ni ngang gi rang bzhin la// mo ni reg pa'i don shar ba// rig pa ma 'gags gtan

tshigs kyis// skye med don kun gtan la phab// skye med don dam tshan ma yis// skye ba'i chos kun gtan la phab// dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin las// snang srid ma mor rang bzhin 'char// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyi

mkha' 'gro rnams// rgyal sras thugs kyi dkyil las byung// rang gis rang la brtags byas pas// snang dang stong pa'i don du rtogs// rang nyid tshad ma'i rgyal po ste// shar ba rang nyid stong par rtogs// skye 'gag

med pa'i ngang nyid las// rol pa'i khyad par cir yang snang// mtshan ma'i gzung 'dzin sna tshogs kun// sprin phung mkhar la thim pa bzhin// ma skyes chos dbyings ngang du thim// thim pa'i rgyal po phyag
rgya gsal// snang srid rig pa'i rgyan shes na// ma mo kun gyi re gnas yin// srid pa'i ma mo thams cad dang// rgyal ba'i thugs las bye brag med// de yi don ni 'di lta ste// mkha' la 'od du gsal rtogs

na// 'byung ba lnga yi rnam rtog bral// ma skyes rig pa'i don la gsal// chos nyid 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma 'jig/ gser gyi thig le don gsal ba// phra men rgya mtsho spros dang bral// thig le chen po'i don rtogs

na// thod phreng ma yi 'dzin rtog bral// ye shes bzhi yi don shar bas/ khros pa'i dbang chen mtshan ma 'jig/ rnam par shes pa'i ngang rtogs na// ma chen bzhi yi 'dzin rtog bral// don dang sems can rig gyur

na// dges bad ma yi mya ngan 'das// skyed pa'i don nyid rtogs gyur na// chags byed ma yi mtshan ma 'jig/ snyoms byed byams pa'i ngang gnas pa// cha snyoms ma yi mtshan ma 'joms// las bslu med pa'i don
gsal ba// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'i 'dzin rtog bral// dpag bsam shing gi bcud phyung bas// bu mo drug gi gti mug bsal// zangs kyi sbu gu'i ngang bskyod ma// 'dod khams gsum gyi 'dod chags sgrol// rgyu ba
rlung gi don shes pas// srid bzhi dmag dpon mtshan ma 'jig/ dbang po 'dir bsdus rig gyur na// srin mo bdun gyis zhe sdang 'jig/ dga' ba bzhi yi dus shes na// dus bzhi'i rgyal mo rtogs pa 'jig/ rus
pa'i ri rab don gsal na// nyi shu rtsa brgyad mtshan ma 'joms// srid pa mtshan ma'i las rtog kun// bdag med rtogs pa'i thabs kyis 'dul// snang srid snang ba'i ma mo kun// rig pa'i ye shes cho 'phrul

te// rig pa mkha' la 'gro ba ni// sa rnams kun tu rgyu 'gro ma// rang bzhin gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// mkha' la 'phyo zhing dbyings la nyal// snang srid gar thabs rgyal ba'i yum// 'pho 'gyur mi mnga' skye 'gro
gsos// bde chen bcu yi don rtogs la// rtsa ba byang chub sems su gsal// spyi dpal bcu yi don gsal bas// mngon rdzogs yab kyi thugs la rdzogs// gsang chen bcu yi mkha' gsal bas// b+ha ga bcu yi

dbyings 'du 'byung// rdzogs chen bcu yi don gsal bas// rgyal ba'i sku dang ye nas mnyam// mngon rdzogs yab kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bcu tsho bcu yi rgyan gyis brgyan// cho gas thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// ye

shes lnga yi rgyan gyis mdzes// nyon mongs lnga yi bag chags sbyongs/ khams gsum 'khor ba'i lam sgo gcad// rmad byung rol pa'i cir yang snang// kun bzang ngang du thams cad 'dus// mtshan ma bzang ngan thams

cad kun// ci yang snang zhing ngo bo stong// stong pa'i ngang las rtag gnas na// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ lta ba rgya mtsho'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// phra men

rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// spyod pa'i don chen ji ltar lags// rgyal po bde bas bka' stsal pa// spyod mchog dam pa 'di ltar te// rgyal po'i tshogs kyi pho brang du// 'byor pa'i yo byad ldan byas nas// sna tshogs yi

ges gzhal yas brlab// drag po'i sa bon rdzas sbyangs nas// rgyal mo lnga yi sa bon gyis// bdud rtsi chen po longs spyod ldan// g.yas pa ta ka'i 'bras bu yin// g.yon pa ta ris bcad byas pas// hril sgo 'bar
bas rol pa bstab// 'ba' ta bdud rtsi 'bar yang// phar stor tshur 'bar bar bya// lam dgu thig le thig pa yang// btab pa'i tshul ni gong ma bzhin// ta las ta yis rdzas rnams dang// bdud rtsi chen

po'i thabs su rol// 'byung 'jug kun la ri kris bsrung// yab las rgyal ba rigs lnga bsrung// yum las rgyal mo lnga yi mdzes// rdo rje yi ge rdzogs pas brgyan// b+ha gar dbyings phyug rgyal mo ste// thabs kyi spyan

ni brdeg byas te// na sa'i rtse mor hUM gzugs te// rta mchog g.yas nas g.yon du dril// 'ong ba'i sgra la hUM zhes brjod// 'gro ba'i sgra la phaT du bsgrags// de nas mkha' 'gro mchod byas te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma

tshogs kun gyi rje// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor kun gyi mes gcig la// bde chen yum gyi dbyings nas gshegs su gsol// mkha' bzhi dbyings las bskyed pa'i sras mo lnga// 'byung ba lnga dang dus bzhi cha snyoms

ma// mi 'gyur g.yu drung bskyed pa'i sa yi gnyis med sku// rgyal mo lnga la sogs pa gshegs su gsol// kun gzhi sems las bskyed pa khro mo tshogs// phyir mi 'ongs pa'i spun drung bcu bzhi yi// rus min spun drug
tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol// phyi nang yul las bskyed pa'i lnga bcu lnga// mtshams med nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin las// nyi zla gza' skar mang po shar ba ltar// gnas 'dir 'khor bcas ma lus
gshegs su gsol/ sa ma yA du na s+t+wam/ rdo rje zhing chen bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// nyi zla pad+ma 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bcas// dbyings kyi spun drug bsgom bya ma mo'i tshogs// lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i

tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs// mi g.yo mi 'gul brtan par bzhugs su gsol// spyod pa'i ngo bo 'di lta ste// u ma tshang nas nyal ba dang// bcu drug tshang nas sdod pa dang// phugs nas sram ltar 'then pa dang// mkhar la rlung ltar 'phyo

ba dang// rngams pa'i drag shul byed pa dang// nam mkha'i skas la 'dzeg pa dang// glag chen gzan la dbab pa dang// 'phar ba dpyang thag chod pa dang// glang chen rol du zhugs pa dang// mgal me klad la bskor
ba dang// 'di rnams dmigs kyis bsgral ba'o// pha dang khu bo mes po dang// lha dang bram ze mu stegs dang// bran dang g.yog po bdud dang ni// gshin rje dregs pa bsgral ba'o// nyon mongs yid

dang rnam shes yid// kun gzhi sems dang 'dod chags sems// nga rgyal dang ni khong khro dang// ser sna dag dang rgyu dag dang// le lo dang ni phrag dog rnams// 'di rnams dmigs kyis sgrol ba'o// nyon mongs

gzugs phung bshig pa'i phyir// g.yas pa spu gri 'bar ba la// g.yon pa gyad kyis brgyangs nas su// tra tha'i sngags kyis sgo phye nas// nya la bsdus la co la bstim// 'byung ba gsum gyis sbyangs byas nas// rdo rje
lhags kyis bsdus byas nas/ kun nas bzang mo'i mkha' la bzhag/ gser dang dngul dang 'dres pa bzhin// bsdus nas rgyal ba'i phyag rgyar bskyed// zla rlung sbyor ba'i thabs kyis 'phang// rgyal ba'i rigs

kyi sras su bskyed// dge sdig las kyi shan phyed nas// sdig pa byang nas ye shes 'bar// sbyor ba chen po'i dam tshig ni// ma dang sru mo phyi mo dang// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// gdol pa mo dang phyal ba dang/ rma bya

mdog sdug thabs kyis brlabs// da 'od ri ga dbye ba dang// sgra yi thal mo sbyar ba dang// mkha' la rlung gis bskyod pa dang// lcags sgrog phyag rgya bsdams pa dang// sreg pa'i me yis dbab pa dang// ye shes rlung

gis bsgrags pa dang// las kyi rlung gis bzlog pa dang// dgyes pa'i sa bon spro ba ste// 'di rnams sbyor ba'i thabs su bstan// de las sa dgu don gyi rdzogs// ye shes dgu dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje mkha'

'gro'i rgyud las/ tshogs dang tan g+han gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// gcan 'phrang chu yi rang bzhin 'di// rim pa gang dang gang lags pa// ngo mtshar lha la

bdag nyan 'tshal// yang dag rdzogs kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po'i bka' rtags mi bcag pa// ji ltar bsgo ba'i las bya zhing// lus kyi bsrung bya thub pa dang// ngag gi skyon sba yon tan brjod// sems kyi gya gyu

med pa ni// rgyal po bka' yi dam tshig go/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin rnams la// lus ngag yid kyi rtse sdom zhing/ skyo bas med pa'i dang ba yis// rtse gcig yid kyis mos par bya// 'di ni sku yi sa ma ya// rig pa'i phyag

rgya gtan bsgom zhing// 'od kyi rgyan lha gsal ba// sku gsung thugs la gtan gnas te// nyi ma'i snying po gtan gsal ba// 'di ni tsit+ta sa ma ya// thig le 'bar ba'i sgra byung zhing// bskyed rdzogs sa bon rgyun mi

gcad// spros pas lha brnyes ngan song sbyong// snang srid sngags kyis phreng bar gsal// 'di ni gsung gi sa ma ya// 'di yis bka' gzhung ma thub par/ phyin ci log du spyad pa na// 'di ru mi bde sna tshogs

'byung// 'bras bu rdo rje dmyal bar ltung/ nyams pa'i rgyu ni 'di lta ste// dad pa chung zhing ser sna che/ khro gtum che zhing bdag med pa// g.yo sgyu che la phrag dog pa// 'di ni nyams pa'i rgyu yin

no// rtogs pa'i dam tshig gzhung thub na// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jin rten pa'i// mkha' 'gro rang bzhin nye ba la// bar chad rkyen rnams mi 'byung zhing// dgra bgegs kun la dben pa 'jug/ tshe ring ba dang rgyud

'phel 'gyur// rgyal po lta bur kun gyis bkur// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par 'gyur// nyams na skong thabs 'di lta ste// sku yi dam tshig gzhung nyams na// mkha' 'gro rnams kyis 'tshe gyur pas// lung ldan

de la gso ru gzhug/ thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// rgyal ba'i yi dam spobs pa dbab// gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na// rang sngags phreng ba 'dab du bzlas// bskang gso'i cho ga gzhan yang bya// rgyud kyi

rgyal po rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ sa ma ya dam tshig le'u ste drug pa'o//// phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// rgyal po bka' rtags ji ltar lags// ngo mtshar che ba bdag nyan 'tshal// mngon rdzogs yab

kyis bka' stsal pa// rgyal po bka' rtags chen po ni/ ngas bstan pa la sems thud cig/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba 'di// rab 'bring gsum gyi snod la bskur// zhing gi ru mtshon 'bar ba 'di// rgyal sras lag tu

bskur byas pas// srid pa'i mkha' 'gro dbang du 'gyur// dpung bzhi tshogs las rgyal bar byed// ke ru rak+sha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hUM ral gri 'dod chags 'bar ba 'dis// rgyal sras lag tu bskur byas pas/ nyon mongs

'khor ba'i dra ba gcod// srin po dregs pa'i khog pa bral// rak+sha la khad ga na hUM/ dar nag 'bar ba'i ru mtshon 'dis// rgyal sras cod pan 'phyo ba'i dbang// thabs dang shes rab dbang bskur bas// dus

gsum gnas su bsgral ba'i dbang// ha ha na na na phaT hUM/ thod tshar 'bar ba'i dbu rgyan can// rgyal mo lnga yi pho brang ste// nyon mongs lnga yi bag chags sbyangs// ye shes lnga yi 'od du shar// dz+nyA na ha ta hUM/ nang gi

don la 'di lta ste// rak+ta'i thig le 'bar ba 'dis// mkha' 'gro rigs pa gsal bas te// che mchog nu ma'i 'od du 'bar// lha mo rigs kyi bzhugs gnas so// mo ha la ma hAM/ rak+ta'i thig le rgya gong du// thal

ba'i tshom bu kha dog kha// rig 'dzin rnam gsum pho brang nas// dug gsum rtsa nas gcod pa'i rtags// sku gsung thugs kyi don mtshon pa// pra tsa la hUM/ thal ba'i rtags kyi rgya gong du// zo ris 'bar ba'i thig le

lnga// rgyal ba rigs kyi pho brang ste// dug lnga gnas su sbyangs nas ni// ye shes lnga yi rgya yis gdab// pany+tsa dz+nyA na hUM/ dam rdzas lha yi thig le la// rgyal mo lnga yi snying pos sbyongs// oM ldan dkar ba'i thig le
yis// rnam snang dpal gyi ye shes don thob shog/ hUM lhan mthing la 'bar ba'i rang bzhin gyis// bkrag gsal snyan gyi ye shes don thob shog/ sra ldan ser la 'bar ba'i thig le yis// 'od gsal
'bar ba'i ye shes don thob shog/ oM ldan dmar la dwangs pa'i ngo bo yis// gnyen gsal 'bar ba'i ye shes don thob shog/ ha ldan ljang la ldem pa'i bdag nyid kyis// yang gsal g.yos kyi ye shes don thob

shog/ gsang ba'i don la 'di lta ste// rdo rje rigs kyi mtshan ldan ma/ khrus kyi dri ldan lha mo rlab// seng ge stag gi g.yas phab nas// gyi ling rdzu 'phrul chen po dang// gcan gzan tha ma brtul zhugs dang/ rgyu ba'i

rlung ni na sar gzung// las kyi rlung ni rgya gram bzung/ khyab byed rlung ni gti mug ste/ rlung gsum gzung bas brtul zhugs mchog/ re re la yang bzhi bzhi'i ste/ ye shes bcu drug ma ta ru// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde

dbang bskur// oM rdo rje rigs kyi yum mchog ma// bde mchog ye shes skyed byed ma// g.yo ba lnga la ye shes lnga// 'dzin bzhi bcu drug rtogs pa'i thabs// yul mchog ma yis snang bar mdzod// rang rig gsal

ba'i ye shes 'od// skad cig rtogs pa'i thabs mchog 'di// skye med yum dang rgyal po yab// bdag la smin pa'i don gsal ba// rgyal ba'i sku dang bka' dri gcig/ ho// rig pa'i rgyal po sras mdzes des// lus
kyi bkur ba phun sum tshogs// ngag gi skyon sba yon tan brjod// sems kyi rtag tu 'dul bcas la// yum dang rgyal po thun mong bskur// srog lus man chod lus kyi rnams// rgyal mo mchod pas sangs rgyas

mnyes// de ltar thob pa'i yon tan ni// lus la 'tshe ba mi 'byung zhing// skye bo kun gyis bkur ba dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams nye ba dang// brgya byin tshe dang mnyam par nges// he ru hUM sras 'khor rnams

mnyes// rgyal ba nyid dang dgongs pa mnyam// de ltar ma thob gang zag dang// bsgrub pa'i las la 'bras med 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di la las log pas// phyi mar ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal 'byung// rdo rje mkha'
'gro'i rgyud las/ dbang byin pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol pa// dkyil 'khor rim pa gang lags pa// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// rgyal sras de bas bka' stsal

pa// bdag nyid byang chub thig le la// skye 'gag med pa'i ngo bos te// mi dmigs ma skyes dbyings nyid las// chos rnams 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te// snang srid ma 'gags rig pa'i rtsal// ma 'gags rig pa rang

shar ba// nam mkha'i ngo bo snying rje mchog/ mtshams su sbyor ba'i snying rje ste// dbyings dang ye shes rang bzhin las// gnyis med rig pa thugs kyi mchog/ rig pa gsal ba ye shes brgyan// mthing ga hUM ni thugs

kyi gtor// e mA kA sha ni A/ du kar ma rak+sha la/ raM dz+wa la maN+Da la/ ma tig ra ma/ king nr-i tr-i laM/ raM bi shud d+he/ pad+ma tsakra ti ra baM/ mthing ga hUM gi 'thor rlung la/ drag po nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor

snang// skyod byed 'bar ba'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor 'byung// rak+ta dmar smug zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor chags// sha chen spungs pas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor la// keng rus khral krol rus pa'i ri rab brtsegs// sna

tshogs b+h+rUM las pho brang gzhal yas shar// 'khor lo rtsibs la yum gyi mkha' bzhis brgyan// rtsibs chen bzhi las bzhi yi dkyil 'khor shar// dbus kyi shar nub nyi sha 'bar la// phyi khyams b+ha ga bzhi yi bar

khyams la// dus bzhi 'byung ba bzhi yi gdan du gsal// gsum pa pad ma 'dab brgyad pa ru snang// bzhi 'dab pad+ma rtsibs su ldan// gru chad bzhi la snam bu khyams gsum ldan/ nang gi rtsig par rin chen rnam lnga

la// phyi yi rtsig pa thod pa'i mkhar du gtams// lha brgyad gdung la klu brgyad phyam du bor// gza' brgyad kha bad rgyu skar dral bu byas// rgyal chen rigs bzhi sbrul nag rgyan gyis brgyan// zhing gi rgyal mtshan sgo bzhi

brgyan// nyi zla pad+ma'i 'od kyi gdan du gsal// dbus su ru dra pho mo bsnol ba las/ lha yi dbang po rgya mtsho nyi ma'i gdan// rtsibs bzhi'i steng du bdud bzhi'i rgyal mo gdan// dus bzhi'i rgyal mo bzhi la smra'o lag

ris gdan/ phyogs skyong brgyad ni dgyes sde khros pa'i gdan// slan mo thams cad skam rlon zhing gi gdan// dbang mo rtsa brgyad dar gyi blon gdan no// hUM chen dbus kyi gdan la shar ba la// oM shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa

rI sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ kun tu bzang mo'i rol pa las// dgyes pa'i rol pa las// dgyes pa'i rol pa gar du bzhes su gsol// skye med kun tu bzang mo la// snang srid rdzas su dbul du
gsol// mkha' la klong chen dbyings nas bzhengs// mkha' bzhi dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la// dgyes pa gar gyi thig le spro// 'khor lo pad+ma rim pa ni/ rim pa bzhi yi 'phar ba'i dbus// thig le spros pas yig

'bru shar// bskyed pa'i sngags kyis phyir ru gdon// bdag gi gser gyi nyi ma las// sa bon las kyi skur bskyed pa// badzra kro d+hI shwa rI g+ha ga pad+mar+ya hUM/ bdag gi 'od chen kha dog nas// sa bon las ni skur bskyed

pa// badzra shan+ti pad+ma ga ru ti b+h+yo/ bdag gi 'byung ba lnga po las// sa bon las kyi skur bskyed pa// gi sa muM hUM ha dza la bar raM hUM ha// shi sha san ti ha ka si long he ha/ ma tsA lang he ha/ bdag gi dngas ma bzhi po las/

sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa/ mu tri ni a shan tri ni/ ba ga dun tri ni/ kha mun ngan tri ni/ bdag gi dngas ma bzhi po las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa/ raM dz+wa la ni/ paM ting ka la/ su tsit+ta ha/ yaM gar+b+he laM/ bdag gi

dngas ma brgyad po las/ sa bon las ni skyur byed pa/ oM sur+Ya bi ti a to ye/ pad+ma bi to a to ye/ kha raM bi to a to ye/ srid 'gro bi to a to ye// badzra keM keM/ badzra ta ke badzra ta keM// badzra ni la badzra ni

la/ badzra lan ta/ badzra lan ta/ bdag gi gsang ba bde chen las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// za graM sa muM raM shwa ra za graM mur raM shwa ra badzra kha rag snying ka rag bdag gi zangs ma'i sbu gu las// sa bon las ni

skur bskyed pa/ pra ban ka ri b+h+yo/ pra king wang gi ti b+h+yo/ bdag gi srid pa mdor bsdus las/ sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// trag rag sha kha mun tsa ma dzag sha trag rag sha mu tra ba na/ bdag gi dpag bsam shing bu

las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa/ kha mun pa rag pa tra rag sha/ sran waM ka ri ta b+h+yo/ bdag gi dbang po mdor 'dus las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// hUM ka ba rod da rod/ ni la chu rang kha dong ka ta pa la/

tsa pa la/ pad+ma tsag sha/ ma ku rag ti/ dar paM ding paM/ e A ra li/ nu po ru lu nu po ru lu b+h+yo/ trag shag sha rag sha/ g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// ma taM b+h+yo/ b+h+yo ti b+h+yo/

puSh+tiM b+h+yo/ mu tiM byo/ badzra shan+tiM b+h+yo// dun tiM b+h+yo/ har tiM b+h+yau/ grub tiM b+h+yo/ a par la ta b+h+yo/ da la du na b+h+yo/ di na ma ma ya b+h+yo/ bdag gi srid pa dbang phyug las// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo

b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// hUM snang srid thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i klong// dus gsum bde gshegs

'byung ba lnga la rdzogs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum gyi b+ha gas brgyan// 'das dang ma byon b+ha ga nyid kyis brgyan// bde chen yum gyi dbyings nas gshegs su gsol// mkha' bzhi dbyings las bskyed pa'i sras mo

lnga// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo gshegs su gsol// dngas ma yum las bskyed pa'i mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// rje mo bcu bzhi'i tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol// snyigs ma tsa las bskyed pa'i ma mo'i tshogs// lnga bcu

drug gi tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// 'byung ba bzhi dang dus bzhi cha snyoms ma// dus bzhi'i rgyal mo 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// hUM snang srid thams cad 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi po// gru chad sgo bzhi b+ha

ga'i tshul du brgyan// dbus ni mi 'gyur chos kyi bum pa la// 'dab brgyad dbyings las 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bcas// rtsig pa gnyis las snam bu sgo yi rgyan/ shar du rta khrag lho ru mi khrag dang/ nub tu mda' sbyar

byang du bdud rtsi sogs// rang bzhin mtshan mo dus ni 'di nyid du// mda' bzhi rgyal mtshan gnam du ye re re// khrag dang zhag gi 'dam chu zu lu lu// ye shes bzhi yi me long lams se lam// ral gri rgyal chen
dmag dpon chen po bzhi// 'gro ba'i don du brtan par bzhugs su gsol// bdud rtsi phyag gi bum pa'i rgyu dag gi/ hUM gis bstims shing rgyud sbyangs ha lnga 'bar// thugs las bzhi 'phros brtan par

bzhugs// srid pa'i ri la 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro rnams// swa gnyis lu gu rgyud byas hUM gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du rten// oM shrI he ru ka yo gi dza dza sur+ya maN+Da la bi bam/ dam tshig gtso 'khor ldan pa yi// sprul pa re re

gdan du bsgyel// mkha' yi gting khung dbur gnas pa// nam mkha'i mtha' la ral gri phab// tra ta phaT/ so so rang rig sgo dbye nas// hUM gis sbubs kyi le brgan drangs// che mchog le brgan 'bar ba smin// oM

a mr-i ta u tsit+ta a hUM a/ shes rab snying rje dus gcig 'bar// nub pa'i gdan nas btags byas te// pho brang steng du zung ste bzhengs// zhal sbyor tshul du gnas pa'o// gnyis sbyor gtso la zur brtan pa'o// rdo rje
mkha' 'gro las// spyan drangs shing dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// dkar nag 'bar ba'i zhal mnga' ba// g.yas kyi dang

po rdo rje la// g.yon pa dung chen ga'u 'dzin// g.yas kyi bar ma g.yang gzhi la// g.yon pa rin chen srid dbang bskur// g.yas kyi tha ma rtse gsum la// g.yon gyi tha ma tshe 'dzin cing// mi zad gter gyi mchod par

bzhes// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyag drug 'bar// g.yas kyi dang po srid rtse 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po rgya mtsho rlob// g.yas kyi bar ma yab la 'khyud// g.yon gyi bar mas dung

dmar stob// g.yas kyi tha ma ru mtshon 'phyar// g.yon gyi tha ma me dpung brdeg/ mi zad gter gyi mchod par bzhes// sbom me mthe'u chung rtse mnan nas// gung mo rtse sprad bzhi la sbrengs// rgyal mo lnga yi phyag rgya

yin// g.yas pa mdzub mo bsgreng ba la// g.yon pa chags pa 'khyud pa ni// dus bzhi rgyal mo phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa khu tshur snying gar bsten// g.yon pa mtshon gyi byed pa yin// phra men rgya mtsho nyid kyi rgyu/ mtheb

mdzub rtse so so sprad// spyan gyi thad kar 'dzin pa ni// de ni rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya// mthe mo gnyis dang mdzub gnyis bsgreng// gsum po phan tshun thabs su btags// de ni sbas pa'i ma bzhi'i rgya// gung mo srin lag so

sor dgug/ mthe bong gnyis kyis so sor mnan// de ni khros pa'i rgyal mo'i rgya// mthe'u chung mthe bong rtse la mnan// lhag ma gsum po 'di ltar byas// thugs kyi dgyes sde rgya chen yin// phan tshun thabs su

btags pa la// phyi ru 'gyed nas 'od 'phros pas// sman mo rnams kyi phyag rgya yin// nyi shu rtsa brgyad po yi phyag rgya ni// gzhan dang 'gre ste 'dir ma bshad// me tog rgyan gyi mchod pa 'di// snang srid mdzes pa'i
mchod pa chen po bzhes// me bdug spos kyi dud pa chen po 'di// tshim pa'i mchod pa chen po bzhes su gsol// bdud rtsi chen po'i dam skong mchod par bzhes// 'dod chags khrag gi mchod pa dam

par bzhes// rmad byung rgyan gyi gtor ma'i mchod par bzhes// zhe sdang ting 'dzin ram gyi mchod par bzhes// 'dod chags sbyor byed mchod par bzhes// la la dril chen sgra sgrogs khro lo lo// la la rol pa'i rta bro
chems se chem// rol mo ye shes mchod pa chen po bzhes// gnam lcags ngur mo me yi mchod par bzhes// gnam la 'phur dang chu la 'phyo ba dang// sa la skyes pa'i mdangs kyi mchod par bzhes// ho dgongs su

gsol/ ma mo mkha' 'gro phyi nang gi phyogs su bsgyur bar dang/ 'brug gi sgra sgrog pa dang/ glog gi lce 'byin pa dang/ gnam lcags kyi rkan rdebs pa dang/ rgyu 'byung ba lnga kha lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal mo lnga dang/ las

mdzad srid pa khros pa'i dbang mo che bzhi// dwangs ma'i dbyings las shar ba'i ma chen bzhi dang/ rig pa rgyan gyi ma chen bzhi dang/ dman mor grags pa thams cad dang/ mkhyen pa dang ni byin gyis brlab tu

gsol// de nas rig pa don la bzlas// oM shrI he ru ka/ badzra bo d+hi tsit+ta sa ma ya hUM ho/ kro d+hI shwa rI pad+ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ thugs las ljags kyis rtse la 'phro// mkha' la 'du zhing dbyings su bsdu// dkyil 'khor

gnyis sdebs zhal skor bzlas// rang rang rtsa ba'i snying po spro// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ mchod pa rim par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// hUM thugs kyi kun mkhyen sku yi kun tu khyab// gsung gi sgra

sgrogs yon tan cir yang snang// phrin las rgya mtsho mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// ci mi 'ong ba'i spun drug bcu gsum po// rus min sprun drug tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rig pa'i dbyings las shar ba'i dam can
tshogs// thugs rje rtse gcig yid kyis dgongs nas gshegs// srid pa kun gyi las rnams grub pa mo// srid pa'i dman mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas gdan rnams bsgyel nas su// grub pa'i las rnams

byed par bsgo// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i cha lugs la// dur khrod 'bar bas sku la brgyan// phyag drug phyag chas skye shi sgrol// bskal pa me yi gzi mdangs can// yum dang gnyis su

med par rol// thugs rje dbyings nas rol par mdzad// thugs rje mi 'gyur dbyings nas sku sprul pa// mkha' drug rgyal mo mngon spyod las gyis shig/ mi dmigs skye med dbyings nas sku sprul pa// phra men rgya mtsho

la sogs las gyis shig/ snying rje chen po'i 'od las sku sprul ma// nyi ma thod phreng la sogs las gyis shig/ thugs kyi sprul pas khams gsum rdul du rlog khros pa'i dbang chen la sogs las gyis shig/ skye med
mi 'gyur dbyings nas don mdzad ma// sbas pa'i ma chen la sogs las gyis shig/ rig pa'i 'od las shar ba'i bzhad sgra can// thugs kyi dgyes sde la sogs las gyis shig/ snang srid thams cad

skye 'gro'i rnam 'phrul ma// chags byed cha snyoms la sogs las gyis shig/ dpag bsam shing bu khyer nas sprul pa'i lha// e ka tsa ti la sogs las gyis shig/ 'thor rlung drag pos snang srid b+h+yo zlog byed// nam
mkha'i rgyal mo la sogs las gyis shig/ 'dod chags gnas su stobs mdzad byams snyoms ma// 'dod khams ne 'tshal la sogs las gyis shig/ bdud kyi bu smad srid gsum b+h+yo bzlog mdzad// srin mo chen mo
la sogs las gyis shig/ thugs rje byams pas yab la brtse ba ma// las kyi srin mo la sogs las gyis shig/ brtul zhugs stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung 'joms ma// dmag dpon rgyal mo la sogs las gyis

shig/ rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin las rnams khas blangs pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad dbang po las gyis shig/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las// bskul ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// phra men rgya mtshos yang gsol
pa// bsgrub pa'i rim pa gang lags pa// mngon rdzogs dpal la bdag nyan 'tshal// rgyal po bde bas bka' stsal pa// dben la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// 'dab bzhi sgo bzhi yang dag ldan// yab yum bsnyen pa

rdzogs byas nas// kun tu bzang mo'i b+ha ga la// rgyal mo bzhi dang thun mong shar// hUM hUM hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ raM dza la ni phaT/ sing ting sa la phaT/ pha tsan+ti ha phaT/ yaM gar+b+he lang phaT/ ti phang phaT/ a par man+ta phaT/
dwangs sam 'di dang sa ma phaT/ sa yi dug nyul chen mos te// shar phyogs khams nas gshegs su gsol// me yi 'od nas rnam sprul ma// lho phyogs khams nas gshegs su gsol// chu yi dwangs mas sprul pa
mo// nub phyogs khams nas gshegs su gsol// rlung gi byed las skyes pa mo// byang phyogs klong nas gshegs su gsol// lha yi bu mo 'dab bzang mo// gshin rje'i bu mo ral pa can// klu yi bu mo yid 'phrog

ma// gnod sbyin bu mo gar mkhan ma// phyogs bzhi dag nas gshegs su gsol// thim pa'i rgyal mo'i bye brag ni// rgya mtsho gzugs kyi khog pa ru// gser mig 'bar ba'i sha yis bskang// rgya mtsho dgra yi khog pa

ru// tsa ra kar ba'i mdangs spyis bskang// na khro ta yi khog pa ru// stongs byed ma yi bcud kyis bltams// gnod sbyin 'bar ba'i rtse mo ru// gangs kyi zhun chu 'bar bas bskang// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis sku gnyis

bya// spyi dpal chen po mchod byas nas// rang rang sngags kyi mchod par bya// lha yi 'bar ba'i e spyil du// rten gyi 'khor lo dmigs pa yis// sri rtso na yi thag pas gdags// gzug mo byi thur dag ma stong// hUM
dpal gyi pho nya chen mo ni// ston zla gsum gyi ngos shed la/ khri gdugs gdal ba'i shar phyogs nas// srid pa bgreng bu sha za ma// shar nas dam sri sha dang phrol// dgun zla gsum gyi ngos shed las/

khri gdugs gdal ba'i lho phyogs nas// srid pa'i 'phrad nyal drod 'phrog ma// lho nas dam sri drod dang phrol// dbyar zla gsum gyi ngos shed la/ khri gdugs gdal ba'i nub phyogs nas// srid pa ta sbyor khrag 'dzag
ma// nub nas dam sri khrag dang phrol/ khri gdugs gdal ba'i byang phyogs nas// srid pa'i gan rkyal dbugs 'phrog ma// byang nas dam srid dbugs dang phrol// hUM gling bzhi mgyogs ma shar nas
gshegs// mkha' la khyung lding lho nas gshegs// dmar mo g.yag mgo nub nas gshegs// ser mo las mkhan byang nas gshegs// a la gnas pa'i dam sri ma// rgyal mo bzhi yi rno yis gcad// tri tsit+ta ya

khad kan// ri tsit+ta la thum lum/ kham tsit+ta la hUM/ a tsit+ta la ha phaT/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ dam sri rlag byed khrag gi lag cha/ phung byed dregs pa'i rno kha sgril gyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// dben
la gnyan pa'i gnas su ni// maN+Dal 'khor yug ldan pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba la// rdo rje 'bar ba me 'od ldan// yab yum bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas// yum gyi mkha' dkyil b+ha ga la// rtsibs

brgyad 'khor lo 'bar ba la// lha mo tshom bu spo bar bya/ tsa pa la phaT/ ma ring ni phaT/ dung pa ni phaT/ rag sha ni phaT/ tsit+ta la phaT// gar+b+he lang phaT/ u pa te phaT/ nu ma re phaT/ phyogs mtshams brgyad nas

bskul shes na// grub pa'i mtshan rtags bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM baM hoH lung stong ma yi rtse mo ru// sna tshogs lnga yi rtsi sbyar bas// thob pa'i rgyal mo mnyes par bya// rang rang sngags la ru lus sngags// thugs

kar sngags zer 'phro 'dus bskul// bzhi yi lho phyogs e yi gnas// srin po 'dul ba'i gzugs nyid la// lcags kyi dra bas rgya gram bya// gangs ri 'bar ba'i rtse la gzhag/ de nas pho nya mngag pa ste// hUM mi

dmigs ting 'dzin ye shes bde ba che// he ru hUM sras 'khor du bzhad// sprul pa seng ge'i mgo bo can// gangs kyi stongs nas ngar sgra 'byin// gcan gzan phra mo mang po 'dar cing 'dud// dam nyams rdul du

rlog pa'i dus la bab// hUM mi dmigs ting 'dzin ye shes bde ba che// sprul pa stag gi mgo bo can// dam nyams dgra bo sgral ba'i dus la bab// hUM mi dmigs phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan phyar/// sprul pa wa yi

mgo can dur khrod khyab par nyul// snying rje med par las kyis gsod par byed// dam nyams rdul du rlog pa'i dus la bab// hUM mi bzad khros pas byang phyogs dregs pa 'joms// mi dmigs pho nya mi sdug rdo
rje phyar// sprul pa spyang mo'i mgo can srog chags gzhan ma grol// rten la phab gnas gsum rnon pos// nag mo mgo can sbud pa ru// gdug pa can gyi shing gis dgang// srin mo khros nas me

bslangs la// snying po rgod kyi mjug mas me spar la// byed pa mo ni bzhi gnyis la// rang rang sngags kyis sreg byang bya// d+ha du ra yi khu ba dang/ mchi rkyen rgya tshil mchod par sbyar// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/
bshan pa mo brgyad sgrub pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// dben gnas gnyan pa'i gnas mchog tu// maN+Dal 'jim pa'i dri byugs la// gru gsum gcig la rtsibs brgyad ldan// che

mchog bsnyen pa rdzogs byas na/ yum gyi b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'khor// snying po thig le spros pa las// da ri hUM phaT/ ru lu hUM phaT/ ra ta hUM phaT/ rtsa te ka hUM phaT/ gu sha te hUM phaT/ a to hUM phaT/ bi ta swa phaT/ du ra

rtsa ye phaT/ dzaHhUM hA he phaT/ rgyan ldan sngags kyi mchod byas la// stong rtsa brgyad kyi 'phro 'du bya// rang rang sngags la ru lus sngags// mthing nag e yi dkyil 'khor du// sa tra na yi rkyal pa ru// nr-i tra na yi
gzugs bcug la// de nas dpal gyi pho nya la// hUM shar gyi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// dpal gyi bkrag 'phrog nam mkha'i gzi// sku mdog dkar ser sprin gyi ral pa can// spyi gtsug dmar po zhe sdang

skyed// skar mda' phyag gnyis gza' yi zhags pa 'phen// g.yas pa 'od zer dmar po g.yon pa khro chu tsags cha 'dzin// dri za mgo chang b+han d+ha ru// snying khrag dmar la da sdoms shig/ hUM lho yi phyogs nas
bskul ba ni// dpal gyi khrag 'thung nam mkha'i gzi// khrag mdog dmar mo bse yi ral pa can// spyi gtsug 'od zer dmar po skyes// g.yas pa 'od zer dmar po 'dzin// gshin rje mgo bcad b+han

d+ha ru// snying khrag dmar la da sdoms shig/ hUM nub kyi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// dpal gyi drod 'phrog nam mkha'i gzi// me 'phreng gu 'phreng ma yi ral pa can// spyi gtsug me yi 'dod chags dmar po skyais/ me

yi phyag rgya gar thabs byed// me mda' zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum tshul// klu bdud mgo bcad b+han d+ha ru// snying khrag dmar la da sdoms shig/ hUM byang gi phyogs nas bskul ba ni// dpal gyi dbugs 'phrog
nam mkha'i gzi// sku mdog ljang gu sprin gyi ral pa can// rlung gi phyag gnyis gar thabs 'gyed// g.yas pa rgya gram ral gri 'debs// gnod sbyin mgo bcad b+han d+ha ru// snying khrag dmar la da sdoms
zhig/ bkug la pu tra'i rgyal po ru// kro ta na yis btags nas su// 'byung ba rlung gi dkyil 'khor du// mon pa nag pos btags nas ni// srid pa ma stongs bar du gdug/ rdo rje mkha' mgro'i rgyud las/ jag
pa ma mo'i sprul pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// dur khrod ngan pa'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal tsan+dan dris byug la// pad bzhi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bcas// che mchog bsnyen pa rdzogs byas

nas// yum gyi mkha' las 'od 'phros pa// ku ma da ri phaT/ kang ka da ri phaT/ tsa mun da ri phaT/ chu la da ri da ri phaT/ ra tsa ha phaT/ ke ru he phaT/ ka ra ta phaT/ du na ye phaT/ rgyan ldan gtor ma mnyes byas

la// rang rang sngags la dza yis mdzes// stong rtsa brgyad du bsnyen pa bya// shar du skar mda' gsang gis mdzes// lho ru ne kra 'bru mar dgang// nub tu+u bdud kyi rtse mo ru// rgya ru ra yi khu bas dgang// rkang rjes

zad pa'i rabs chad thod pa ru// me tog 'bar ba'i sbrang rtsi bcud kyis dgang// ma hA de wa'i bu mo ste// ku ma da ra'i dus la bab// dpal chen thugs kyi bu mo ste// kang ka da ra'i dus la bab// gnod sbyin

legs pa'i bu mo ste// tsa mun da ra'i dus la bab// klu rgyal 'jog po'i bu mo ste// chu la da ra'i dus la bab// srin mo rgyu ba'i tshe srog bdag/ sprul pa'i rgyal mo'i dus la bab// 'jig gi thun la rgyu 'gro

ma// rgyan gyi rgyal mo'i dus la bab// nam phyed thun la bab pa'i tshe// dbang gi rgyal mo'i dus la bab// tho rangs thun la bab pa'i tshe// las kyi rgyal mo'i dus la bab/ khrag mtsho 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor

du// shin tu rno ba'i sa stong nas ni// rno dbal sngags kyis dbab par bya// gu gul tsit+ta li kha thim rbad/ ra to ni da ni pra to rbad/ dngas du ni tho rbad/ kri ta ru bi ti ni rbad/ nad dang mtshon gyi skal pa
yis// dus mtha'i me bzhin 'khrug par bsam// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ ga'u phung byed chen mo'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// grub pa'i sa gzhi brtag pa ru// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs bzhi

la// dur khrod thal bas bris byas te// dbus su rta mchog yab yum bskyed// mkha' la sras su yum bzhi bskyed// snying rtsa sha ma la b+h+yo/ tsa ba sa la b+h+yo/ ma ma la sa b+h+yo/ mthing nag 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
du// gdug pa'i pags par ra dkar gzhug/ de nas pho nya chen mo ni// byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor 'dus ma// sta sman zor gdong chen mo ni// chibs su lho yi stag la chibs// 'khor du gzigs sman rol po
'breng// byang shar dgra 'dul chen mo gshegs// glog stong 'khyug cing gshegs su gsol// nub byang mtshams kyi 'khor 'dul ma// nag mo gdong drug mche chen 'bebs// chibs su byang ka'i 'grong la
chibs// g.yas nas mi lpags g.yang gzhi rdeb// g.yon na mdung dmar ru mtshon 'debs// nub byang bdud 'dul dus la bab// 'brug stong ldir cing da tshur spyon// lho nub mtshams kyi 'khor rgyal mo/ khri
dman ldem drug chen mo ni// chibs su nam mkha'i glog la chibs// g.yas na dman brgya sha ra ra// g.yon nas log 'khrug lcibs se lcib// lho nub srin mo dus la bab// shar lho mtshams kyi

bdud 'dul ma// mtshan ni ba lang dre'u snam// chibs su drel rta phag la chibs// dri za 'dul byed chen mo gshegs su gsol// glog stong 'khyug cing da tshur spyon// gdug pa klad la bskor nas kyang// snang ba
chen po nang du 'chang// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'dus ma bzhi sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// dur khrod 'bar ba'i thod pa ru// zla gam bzhi la thig les brgyan// phra men bsnyen pa

rdzogs nas kyang// mkha' la 'od 'phros sprul pa rdzogs// ru ra ta ye phaT/ pa ri ta phaT/ dza ga sha ye hUM/ kha sa ye hUM/ rang rang bsnyen pa rdzogs byas nas// phyogs bzhi thig les zlum po bzhi/ ka ko la yi thig

pa dang// tro sa pho rog ra yi thig le dang// gser mig ma yi thig le dang// so ta nag po'i thig le dang// ro ti'i ming bcug la// tsa ra na yi 'ur rdos 'phang// hUM 'dod pa'i bu mo mi bzad ma// nam mkha'

dang ba'i sku mnga' ma// ye shes zla ba'i thugs mnga' ma// ting 'dzin nyi ma'i spyan mnga' ma// 'dod pa'i bu mo mi bzad ma// dred po'i bu mo gzugs ldan ma// rnga mo gwa bcibs glog bas mgyogs// sprul pa'i
bu mo mi bzad ma// 'dod pa'i bu mo mi bzad ma// rus sbal chibs ni glog bas mgyogs// zangs kyi sku byad klad la bskor// bshan pa 'bum gyi dbus na 'gying// 'dod pa'i bu mo sprul pa mo// me yi 'bar

ma lce brgyad ni// myur ba'i tshad ni glog bas mgyogs// lag pa'i snying 'bying zhal du 'dren// rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ khyo med ma bzhi sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// phra men rgya mtshos yang
gsol pa// pho yis sgrub pa ji ltar lags// rgyal ba yab la bdag nyan 'tshal// rgyal po de bas bka' stsal pa// dbus su gru gsum 'bar ba la// shel nag rgyal bur gzugs bcug la// phyag rgya bzhi yis

dgug gzhug bya// bstim gu gu thul thul bya// de nas pho nya rab dgye ste// hUM shar gyi phyogs nas bzhengs se bzheng// dung gi glang po chen po la// ya rkan gnam la ma rkan sa// mche ba gangs ri gtams pa
'dra// lce ni mun gyi glog bas mgyogs// de 'dra'i sems can chen po la// bse yi skyes bu 'phrul can zhon// sku la bse khrab khra bo gsol/ phyag na bse mdung dmar po bsnams// dbu la bse yi rmog zhu

gsol// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phra dog skyes// bdud g.yag 'brong gi gzhu mo la/ khro chu 'bar ba'i 'chang zung dkyil// gser gyi mchog ma 'bar ba la// dngul gyi sbyin gyis sdebs sbyar nas// zhing gi rgyus kyi rgyud
du bltams// smyug ma byang chub shing bu la// ye shes bzhi yi sgro yis bskyon// bde chen chos kyi dbyings nyid la// smyug ma 'od zer bde ba tsha tsha 'khrug/ 'phrog par rgyaub cig badzra ya// gzor ro

gzor ro tsit+ta ma phaT/ lho yi phyogs nas bzhengs se bzheng// gar mkhan shang shang rta pho la// ya rkan rba la ma rkan chu// mche ba mchu+u ri 'bar ba'i sku// lce ni mun gyi glog bas gsal// de 'dra'i sems can

chen po la// bse yi skyes bu gdug pa zhon// sku la bse khrab khra bo gsol// phyag na bse mdung dmar po bsnams// dbu la gse [\[]bse [\]]yi rmog zhu gsol// rin chen sngon po'i rmog skyes pa// gzhu bzung

g.yon gyi ltong srog g.yas kyi srog/ phog par rgyob cig rat+na ya// gzor ro gzor ro nA ga tsit+ta tra Tha ya// nub kyi phyogs nas bzhengs se bzheng// yid 'ong rma bya'i rta pho la// ya rkan me la ma rkan drod// mche ba
me so dmar po la// lce ni me lce glog bas mgyogs// de 'dra'i sems can chen po la// bse yi skyes bu gdug pa zhon// sku la bse khab khra bo gsol// phyag na gser mdung dmar po bsnams// dbu la bse yi

rmog zhu gsol// bye ru dmar po'i phra dog skyes// phog par rgyob cig nA ga ra// gzor ro gzor ro nA ga rtsa pa la tra ta phaT/ byang gi phyogs nas bzhengs se bzheng// gar mkhan shang shang rta pho la// ya rkan rlung

la ma rkan grang// mche ba nyi zer 'dzin pa 'dra// lce ni sprul pa'i glog bas gsal// de 'dra'i sems can chen po la// bse yi skyes bu 'phrul pa zhon// sku la bse khrab khra bo gsol// phyag na bse mdung dmar

po bsnams// dbu la bse yi rmog zhu la// rdo rje rgya gram phrag dog skyes// phog par rgyob cig kha ram ma// gzor ro gzor ro kha dun tsit+ta la hUM phaT/ skyes bu bzhi yis mdo rtse yis// gang gi gzugs la phab la

bsgrub// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bse yi skyes bu bzhi sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// mdung rtse sbas pa'i sa phyogs su// 'khor lo 'bar ba bzhi ru ldan// dbus su Ta ki rA tsa bskyed// rtsa dra

du tra hUM/ gartsa pa ra ti hUM/ rgyan ldan gtor ma mdzes byas nas// ra rtsa nag po'i lto ba ru// rU pa nr-i dang ming bris pas mgo la lha dang bsgral ba'i rdzas ston bzhag par bya/ de nas pho nya dgye byas te// hUM khro bo chen
po khams gsum ging ka ra// sngon po 'bar ba chibs su bcibs// rgya byed stod kyi slog pa la// 'bum byed smad kyi sham bu btags// zho dbugs dkar mo'i rmog zhu la// tsan+dan smug po'i 'dzing thod
bcings// bse mdung dmar po dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong la/ gnam lcags thog gi mdung rtse gsal// nag po nyi khri 'khor gyis bskor// dgra bo dbugs dang bral ba'i dus la bab/ khro mo chen mo khams
gsum dbang sdud ma// zhabs gnyis gyad dor gling bzhi ra ltas bskor// phyag gnyis g.yo 'gul srid pa'i ri bo 'debs// dgra bgegs snying la phur 'debs las kyi gshed
mar gshegs// shar phyogs khams na rgyu ba'i ging chen bzhi// me za brag gyon dgra bo'i rus la 'cha'// nang par nyin ma nyid dang dus gcig 'char// srog dbugs gzugs dang phral ba'i dus la
bab// lho phyogs khams nas rgyu ba'i ging chen bzhi// chu dbal sngon po chu lce zhon nas ni// srod la pa ba sangs dang dus gcig 'char// srog dbugs gzugs la dbang bzhi kun gyi khrag la khyab// dgra bo
dbugs dang phral ba'i dus la bab// nub phyogs khams nas rgyu ba'i ging chen bzhi// me dbal dmar po me lce zhon pa ni// nam phyed sgra gcan 'dzin dang dus gcig rgyu// srog dbugs drod la khyab cing dam

khams drod dang bral ba'i dus la bab// byang phyogs nyams nas rgyu ba'i ging chen bzhi// klu dbal sngon po rlung lce zhon nas ni// srog dbugs drod la khyab cing kun gyi dbugs la khyab// dgra bo dbugs dang

phral ba'i dus la bab// gong gi gzugs la phab byas nas// 'od yang 'bar bas lhu dum phrol// mgo bo rgya ba'i rab tu 'gyur// lte ba rgya mtsho'i nang du sgyur// lus po drag po'i me la bsregs/ rgyu ma 'byung po
rgyu sar mnan// pags pa'i spyi zlum lus la bskon// nag po mgo bcad rlung gtor bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bshan pa ging gi sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// brag dmar 'du ba'i rtse dag

tu// rdzas rnams rab tu ldan pa la// dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad ldan pa la// las dkyil 'khor los rab brgyan pa// ting 'dzin stong pa'i rang bzhin las// yab yum sngags kyis rdzogs par skya// oM a kro te

ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT// yum gyi mkha' la hUM bcu las// gdan gyi steng du hUM bcu gdon// de nas rang bzhin spyan drangs te// hUM chos sku mnyam nyid rol pa'i sku// smon lam dbang gis gshegs su
gsol// 'jam dpal khro bo ye shes lha// mnyam nyid rol pas gshegs su gsol// hUM steng nas nag po 'joms pa gshegs// shar nas khro bo bram gyon ni// nam mkha' brag 'dzin gshegs su
gsol// shar gyi a wa glang mgo can// smug nag cogs [\[]lcogs [\]]pa gshegs su gsol// lho phyogs khro bo ya ba ti// smug nag lcags kyu gshegs su gsol// lho nub lcogs pa mgo dgu ni// smug nag
ral gri gshegs su gsol// nub phyogs gshin rje dmigs pa ni// dmar nag thod mthing gshegs su gsol// nub byang gsod byed chen mo ni// sngo nag spu gri gshegs su gsol// byang phyogs rgyal po bdud
'joms ni// ljang nag thod pa gshegs su gsol// byang shar chos kyi rgyal po ni// dkar ser khram shing gshegs su gsol// 'og gi khro bo dmar po ni// dkar ser rtsis byang gshegs su

gsol// mgo dgu rkang brgyad dred sham can/ kham rgya mthu chen dmar po che// shel gyi kham rgya phag mo dang// thod mthong ma dang sngo nag mo// smug nag gru rtsa mu+u na tri// dus la rub cing dam la gnas// ma lus
las la gshegs su gsol// mchod po hri sngags khri 'bum bzlas// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor bskor// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'khor lo gsum// bzhi pa zla yi dkyil 'khor la// rgyas pa glang po he du

rten// dbang ni chung ma'i snying gar te// bsad pa gshin rje'i lto ba ru// rgyug pa dred dang rnga mo gnyis// dbye ba rta dang seng ge gnyis// smyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyab tu bya// lkugs pa lug gi lto bar bya// gnan pa ri

rab 'og tu bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ gshin rje'i pho brang gi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// zar ri rnyog pa kha bad can// steng du bri yi chag chag gdab// zla gam gcig la rtsibs bzhis brgyan// rtsa ba'i

sngags kyi yab yum bskyed// oM ma ru tse many+dzu shrI ku mA ra ya mAn+ta ka ma ba to me hUM/ rtsa ba rtsam ri shig snying rtsam la b+h+yo/ dzaHhUM baM hoH sa ma ya dza dzaH oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka dz+wa la dz+wa la hUM phaT/ 'bum bzlas/ oM

a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka bag sha ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka tsit+ta ta sa na tsit+ta hUM phaT/ re re yang 'bum 'bum mo// de nas las la sbyar te// de nas drag po e dkyil du// gangs la g.ya' yis

bstan la brag/ bkug la rten la bstim pa bsgral// oM hri ling shang kha ru dri dza yag+sha rbad/ bu che ma ga 'da' ru ru phra thum thum/ shel shel khyung khyung shog shog rbad ling mra ni dza/ rnam smin lus bshig go/ rdo rje
mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bshan pa dmar po'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// mon pa khros pa'i mdor ris la// e yig dbus su dgod pa ni// seng ge dmar mo'i lto ba ru// shar du shes lnga bstum nas

ni// phag pa'i thod pa bka' nas ni// yugs sa mo yi zhabs mas dkri// dpal gyi thugs las bkrag me sprul// g.yas pa ral gri khram shing tshul// g.yon pa yungs kar sho rdel brdeg/ oM a sding dang b+ha lding/

khyad lding/ yang to lding/ na ti ma ru ya rbad/ ti ti ma ru ya rbad/ ti ti nag po ri ta phaT/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ bdud nag po la gtad pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o//// yul dang dwangs ma rtsa
rnams ni// yul ni sems kyi rang bzhin te// dwangs ma thig le'i rang bzhin te// rtsa ni snyigs ma'i don du shar// thig le 'khrug pas yul 'khrugs te// da ni snyigs ma zhig par 'gyur// las rlung log pas
khyab byed 'khrugs// rgyu byed log byed log pas chos nyid 'khrugs// las rlung log pas sren 'khrug 'gyur/ khyab byed log na gung mo nyams// chos log pas mdzub 'khrugs te// dang po bad

kan skyed byed cing// gnyis pa mkhris pa skyed byed cing// gsum pa klung ni skye bar byed// rgyu ba'i rlung ni gsum kar khyab// rus pa'i nad ni skyed par byed// rnal 'byor nad kyis zin pa la// bskang gso'i cho

ga rgyas par byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las/ nad gso ba'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o//// nyon [\[]nyag [\]]cig yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nga yi gsang rgyud chen po 'di// phra men rgya mtsho nyid la
gtad// ma 'ongs sems can thams cad kun/ 'di la mos pa phrad par 'gyur// ma mos sems can phrad mi 'gyur// phrad na log na dngos grub yal// rdo rje dmyal ba ltung zhes bshad// dmod btsugs pa'i
le'u te nyer bzhi pa'o//// rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rgyud las srid pa phra men rgya mtshos bsdus pa rdzogs so////
